After the iOS v10 upgrade it still works on my iPhone 7 and my Mac but all I get on my iPad Air 2 is a blank white screen. I have reported the bug to the developer and I have also sent an email request for help. No response, nothing from them for two plus weeks. Very disappointed. Developers should be willing and able to support their customers. Think carefully before you buy this app.

name: My Medical
title: Comprehensive App
text:
Iâ€™m
On iOS 11.2.6
Support end at iOS 9. What a shame. Personally I like the app. Since my day Update and software restoration, my data savedâ€¦ however I canâ€™t seem to add it back go my iPhone 7 Plus. I put s lot of work IMO my record. Iâ€™m very disappointed. Perhaps you can advise me how to retrieve the backup . I hope youâ€™ll update the app in the near future. 
-â€”/â€”â€”â€¢
My only complaint is the print margins. Wish I had some wiggle room so that the doc can see the stapled headers. 
Also I wish I could print the short version in sort view. 
----
My doctors love the print out. I find this app very easy to use. Sit down with your Meds and put the information in. Yes it takes time but my medical history is always with me. I love this app. My doctors love this app and are always amazed.

name: My Medical
title: Medical history made simpler
text: I work in the medical field and although all data entry when switching to an electronic medical records system is a pain, this app works better then the majority of other apps out there. You can also upload radiographic images and reports, lab work, etc. which my things a lot more comprehensive.

name: My Medical
title: Use to love it
text: I have had this app for years and loved it. Shared it with doctors and hospitals and friends and family.  Now hate it. There is no more support but they donâ€™t tell you that, they just stop responding to emails. The Dropbox feature stopped working and that is a major feature that I need as well as others that have complained.  Itâ€™s sad the developer decided to stop supporting it and left so many people hanging.  If they would make the updates and support it they could get so many more people.

name: My Medical
title: The app lags- slow or NO customer support
text: I was pleased with my medical. Now, the syncing is so slow. Each time I enter my blood glucose levels, the app lags. In other words, I have to wait over two minutes to do anything else in My Medical. Of course, that means I cannot use the app much. Since I paid to have this function and the synching, which also doesn't always work, the app gets a low rating from me. I wanted to love this app so badly. **customer support has not responded to concern- waited for over a year!

The app is comprehensive and is relatively easy to use. Although it syncs between my iMac and iPhone, it recognizes my wifeâ€™s iPhone but will not transfer to her My Medical, which is where I most want it should I have a medical emergency. Says to Sync using Dropbox. Opened an account there but does not sync with updated Dropbox. Sad ğŸ˜

When iOS 11, was in public beta, I reported a problem with how the app posted times in itself, or sharing with the calendar app. Now that iOS 11 is out of testing, and is in regular use, thereâ€™s not been a response to reports about this.

Iâ€™d recommend looking another health records app, especially since thereâ€™s not been an update for about two years or so.

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful App!!!
text:
As of July 2017, I am into my sixth year with this app. It is still in essential in my opinion and does exactly what they say it will do. I am confused by those Who have given the app low ratings. My only experience with support has been outstanding. This app is all I need now when I go into a doctors office for the first time. Doctors love the thoroughness and emergency medical personnel or even more impressed.  I have had to use the app in emergency and regular doctor visit situations so I know where of I speak.  And no I am not related to the developer!

[Original review]

Has a wonderful variety of options to input everything you need to remember.  I have been carryinging a medical history for a year now on paper.  This has me ready to give up the paper and just carry my phone with a medical symbol sticker on the case.  I especially like the web site this app allows you to use to enable easier loading of data.  My only suggestion would be to add an ability to mark certain pills and doctors to appear in groupings for specific chronic treatment issues rather than to have to check all areas for what might otherwise be referenced through a special sub folder on diabetes for example.  I have already shared this app with one of my doctors and he loved it. 

Been using for over a year now and still love it!!  I have used it when visiting new doctors and checking into the hospital.  They have all been most impressed with how organized I am.  I tell everyone I meet who has a complex medical history or parents they assist or children whose immunizations they need to track about this app.  Best money I ever spent in the app store!

I've now been using this app for three years and still consider it the best money I ever spent on an app. There have been some issues along the way. So before turning on or off synching or such, be sure to back up data. The one time I needed to use it, it worked like a charm. Still highly recommended.

name: My Medical

text: No response from support

name: My Medical
title: Abandoned!
text: This app has been abandoned. It doesn’t deserves comments!

name: My Medical
title: Look no further.  There is nothing better.
text:
For some time I have been looking for a comprehensive and detailed app to monitor my labs and medication adjustments, and a chronology of doctor and hospital visits for my aging mother.  Since I travel a lot I often need this info. at my fingertips. Well a friend sent me an article in a weekly paper that highlighted the iphone app called My Medical. I cannot be more pleased. For one thing, I can add my whole family to the app. I have myself, my mother, my husband (and I'm on his iPhone after I told him to get this app). I even have our two dogs. It may sound crazy, but it's important to have their information like anyone else's.

The second thing that sets the My Medical app apart from any other is the way it is organized. The layout is simply wonderful and wonderfully simple. There is nothing to learn. Everything is in precisely the right place and at the same time, it seems to include everything I could possibly need. And that is no simple feat. I've tried other apps like this and they either don't do enough or they're utterly impossible to use. I love that I can list my meds separately from my previous history. I love charting out my weight...when it's going down :)  The form to email off various sections to my internist is priceless.  There are so many other gems inside this app that I cannot mention them all. You just need to try it for yourself. You will not be disappointed.

name: My Medical
title: Nearly Perfect PHR App
text:
I have this app on the Mac, iPhone, and iPad.  It is a very powerful app with significant functionality.  It allows you to enter and track your diagnoses, meds, test results, vitals, appointments, etc.  It accesses your contacts and calendar, so you can enter your office visits once and have them appear in your calendar.  It also has the functionality for you to track multiple people within your family, so is great for those of us dealing with aging parents and/or children.

Two things would make this a five star app.  Medication reminders and a better syncing solution.  While the app lets you enter all your meds and reminds you when to fulfill a prescription, it doesn't have notifications of when you are supposed to take your meds each day.  I still have to use a separate app for that.

In terms of syncing, I understand that iCloud was problematic.  However, the Mac version allows you to store your data on Dropbox.  I don't understand why the iOS versions also don't let you access that data from Dropbox, which would keep everything seamlessly in sync.  The current "send/receive over the same WiFi network" functionality is clunky and runs the risk of having data loss.

name: My Medical
title: LOVE this app!!
text: This app is well worth the money! Having gone through cancer treatment this past year, I had a LOT of medical items to keep track of: doctors, medications, test results, etc. This app is great for compiling everything you need into one place. Each time I visited a new doctor, I had gobs of paperwork to fill out that required so much information: who's your primary physician? What meds are you taking now? etc. All I had to do was open this app and everything I needed was in one place! No more searching through my contacts for each doctor's contact info. This app will pull all of your doctor contact info from your iphone contacts app so no need to retype anything. Plus, you can fill out all of your additional information on your computer and then sync it to your phone (the website does not store your personal data. It's just a conduit). It's much easier to use a full keyboard than the iPhone keyboard. This app has really made life so much easier. Don't hesitate to buy this app. Just do it. You'll wonder how you ever managed without it.

name: My Medical
title: Not what I was hoping for
text:
I'm disappointed in this app. It is difficult to navigate and it has no category for your history. It has a category for family history...where preset choices are offered i.e. cancer, high blood pressure, diabetes, etc that you can check off for your parents, siblings, etc , but it doesn't have that category for you....the patient...to record YOUR medical background with preset choices.  i find that odd.  

also, no easy way to input lab results or monitor BP.  The office visit section is also weird. It would be nice to keep a record of office visits already completed, ..but with this app, ones that are already finished are in with the ones that are in the future.  Really annoying.  The reminders for those appointments only go back two days. Many of my appointments are for next year...mammograms, annual physicals, and are not able to be made yet. It would be nice to have a reminder about these three months in advance so that I can call for the appointments. Many doctor offices do not make appointments a year in advance and you have to remember to do it at a later date.  Having a reminder two days before isn't helpful. 

I'm sorry I bought this app and wished I had researched further.

name: My Medical
title: Suggestions
text:
I just started using this app in February 2014. Seems okay, most reviewers that have been using an app of this type seem to love it over others that are available. 
 Two suggestions that I'd like to see. The first one is searchability, it would be nice to search a term, or search for a doctor, or search for something you know has been filed, you're just not sure where it was filed.
My second suggestion would be:  When adding information such as blood pressure in test and procedures, it would be nice if we could have that test with our default unit. 
For example- Currently when adding blood-pressure I have to go and add the number then I have to click on units and find mmHg. It would be so much easier if I could set mmHg as my standard for this input. Another example would be heart rate, having to select bpm, slows down the input of information.
Please give your app the ability to have our predetermined units show up by default on these tests and procedures.

name: My Medical
title: Synch Issues
text:
I'm quite happy with the app after using it for a couple if years. One if it's nice features is (was) that it automatically enters office visits in my calendar through iCloud. Now, they're changing to DropBox so I will be changing to another app. If you are a fan of DropBox and aren't concerned by its security issues, this is a very useful app. If you're an iOS device user, not so much. You might want to keep looking. The one technical design change that I would recommend is the ability to easily move prescriptions from current to old status. Otherwise, it's a great way to track and record your medical information.
Update:
There is now a way to change the status of prescriptions from current to old. No problem. They keep saying that iCloud synch is going to be taken away but haven't done it so far, so I'll keep using it. If not for the iCloud vs. Dropbox issue, I would give this app 5 stars. It really is quite useful and well organized for health record maintenance.

name: My Medical
title: Finally!!!
text: I have finally found a medical record app that is REALLY a solution and good product. I have been through app after app looking for one that I can completely rely on. It is a very large database that can handle complete medical histories and files. No more switching between documents, spreadsheets, special app for this and that. The wait is over. There are two other critical solutions with this: it exports to numerous formats and files, and it can be synchronized and backed up very easily. It can export to the medical standard ccr file that can be imported to other medical databases when/if necessary. It is synched through iCloud. It can be backed up as one file to any place you desire. You can transfer via WiFi (on the same network). Look no further. This is what you need. The developers listen and respond. They have had excellent support and constant improvements. They are there for the users. Don't wait!

name: My Medical
title: Amazing app!
text:
I have a chronic illness and multiple doctors and this app is absolutely wonderful!  In fact, I'm seeing a new doctor tomorrow and its so easy to send emails to myself and just print the records to bring with me.  I have two requests that would make it even better:
1) I keep a separate app for my prescriptions and refill dates because it will do push notifications (the red circles) to alert me that I need to reorder.  I really like this.  If you could add that to your app I would use your app exclusively.
2). I took the time to enter 15 years of test results for a couple things that are important for me to track.  I love being able to see a graph of the data but would like it even more if I could select a date range for the graph.. ie 2008-present.   
I really love this app overall and if you take the time to enter data it is so helpful as I always have my phone with me, wherever I go!
Thanks for making a great app!

name: My Medical
title: Is it really this good? YES
text:
I've been tracking these vitals in a combination of Excel, Access and Word, BP tracking apps, etc...  This app has it all in one place.  I really like the feature that if entering multiple meds, the Prescription information, once entered in Current Medications, is just a click away for repeat entries (ie. same pharmacy).  Makes data entry quick and easy.  Graphs are easy to read, emailed reports are very logically organized and readable (not just a raw data-dump of the information).  If you need to track yours or family members vitals, this is the app to get!  This app alone saved me money on several stand-alone (specific to a given vital record) tracking apps I was looking at.

Password protection is important and I like the fact that even when it's locked, if someone finds you and your phone, they can access the Emergency contact information without a password.

4 stars because I would like to see it lock on exit (unless it's an iPhone 4 multitask thing I haven't figured out yet).  I have to quit using the double-click and minus, otherwise everytime I just return the home screen and come back it's still unlocked.

Edit: I just changed to 5 Stars because I just discovered you can email yourself a backup should something happen the phone or the data file.  Crucial for an app of this type.

name: My Medical
title: Sunshine without iCloud
text: My original app was on the iPad. I used the website to download that info onto my iphone and all went well. The trouble started when I tried to use the iCloud to sync updates from the phone to the iPad. After several unsuccessful attempts and having to reenter data, I turned off the iCloud in apps on both devices. Then I used the iPhone backup feature to produce an email which I opened from the iPad. The restore choice I used first was "Add information to" the existing profile, but that produced some duplicate entries. So instead I deleted the outdated profile on the iPad and used the "Create a new profile" option when restoring from the same email. It worked great except I lost my documents! So I created a new profile containing only documents called "Mom's Documents". The docs are now protected and I can at least keep the devices in sync. I hope the bugs will be fixed in this otherwise great program.

name: My Medical
title: Bugs Galore
text:
This app has the potential to be the best medical app I've ever seen.  But there are some bugs.  

Bug # 1, if you choose to use iCloud sync…which ever app you turn icloud on last is what will be uploaded to the cloud.  For example, I purchased all three apps, the Mac, iPhone, & iPad versions.  So using the Mac I input my extensive medical history into the program.  Then I setup the app on my iPhone and iMac.  Rather than iCloud  uploading the info I just put into the system, it uploaded the blank data from the newly opened app to the iCloud and deleted everything I put into my Mac app.  
Bug # 2, I then tried to backup the app using a Continuality Care Report.  Every time I hit backup on my Mac, it locks the program up.  I can't input any data, I can't even close the app.  It is perpetually locked until I reboot my computer.  But oh wait…it won't let me do that either because the program won't close.  So basically you have to hard reboot your computer to unlock the program.

Now, lets go over the good things.  Once you get done with the trial and error of it, it works flawlessly.  (besides the lockup described above)  It syncs, and it does the ability to save any files in the app itself.  No need to keep redundant copies on your computer (be warned though) I wouldn't delete any files you have on your computer until the bugs are worked out).

name: My Medical
title: Superb app and great value
text:
As someone with a considerable number of medications, this app is precisely what I need to keep track of what's what. It handles the dose, side effects, and there's even a section for previous medications. At my last appointment I even handed the phone to my doctor for him to read my meds himself instead of me trying to tell him. The app is clearly well thought out. 

I also like how the app looks just like the iPhone’s own apps, for instance the Contacts app.  It has the same look and same way of inputting my info. There's no learning curve to use this app, no clutter, no confusion. I keep extensive records in some sections and as little as I need in other.

Particular kudos on the lab results section.  I like how you can specify different lab scans: x-ray, cat scan or mri. The cholesterol assessment is equally well done.

name: My Medical
title: Fact: Tetanus shot every 10 yrs; Date of your last shot?
text:
Mine? 1999, and yes, I am like a year overdue. LOL
I might not have noticed had it not been part of MyMedical. 
It is the best and most used APP I have. As ratings go, I rarely give out 4 stars and I've never given 5 until now. 

• It is easy to use either on your device or on your PC. 
• When you have questions ASK. 
• When you have input, GIVE. 
• There is a real person at the other end who listens and responds. 
• The APP is continually improving and becoming more robust. 

Very impressive. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS APP TO THE FOLLOW PEOPLE:
1: Would like to track their own medical information (especially those like me who see 6 specialists a week and can't keep up with meds)
2: Anyone with achool age children. Keeping track of vaccinations, their last visit to the dentist, and eye doctor.  
3: Anyone who cares for an elderly person (parent, grandparent): keep their information handy; their doctors information, Medications RX #s, Pharmacy, dosage, schedule, last time it was filled, allergy alerts, insurance/Medicare info, etc. 
4: Anyone interested in collecting their Family Medical History. It's important to ask everyone now, more important to document it and MOST important to consistantly update and distribute.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent Medical Database
text:
I really like this app. It has a couple of weak points, but overall it is wonderful for storing all kinds of medical information. I have versions on my Mac, iPad, and iPhone. 

Recently I was in a doctor's office and the nurse was asking my about medications. I pulled out my iPhone and opened My Medical and showed her the list. She was in awe, and said "why can't everyone do that?"

The only complaint I have is about syncing (hence the 4 stars). Syncing is via Dropbox, which is fine. However, there are times when new entries don't sync or take a long time to sync (like 24 hrs or more). Other times new entries will sync within minutes or even seconds. If something doesn't sync, you can transfer the info by exporting over WiFi, but you have to do this for each device individually.  If they can fix this, the app would be perfect.

name: My Medical
title: Add headache diary
text: I love this app. It is very helpful for keeping track of my blood pressure. When I show the graph to my physician he has a very good idea as to how I am doing in this regard. Also great to have medication and doses on hand when having to fill out forms. To make it perfect for me I would like it to have a diary area to track progress of any other problem. For me migraines would be most important. Now I have a separate app to keep track of migraines. The additional section could be just for notes, and I would designate the issue. For example, NOTES ON MIGRAINES or NOTES ON ARTHRITIS. I would be able to keep track of new medications I have tried and how well the are working. Even without this feature this app is extremely useful. I would just like to have all health issues in one place. Food for thought in a future update?

name: My Medical
title: Very useful. Well conceived & executed.
text:
I have been trying to keep all my medical info together by using my calendar, my To Do list and Documents to Go.  It was starting to become very unmanageable. I found this app in the nick of time. I am pleased with its concept, function and design. The e-mail entry and backup is an essential component. Charting is a nice feature as well.

I had a small hiccup with pharmacy phone numbers.  When I would attempt to add a pharmacy phone number to prescriptions I was faced with a list of six numbers and could not figure out which number was for which pharmacy.  Then I re-entered all the info with the number first and name following it so I could choose the appropriate number.

I needed somewhere to enter an expiration date for prescriptions and e-mailed Steven, the developer.  I received a reply within a few hours and found out that it is already in the works for the next update!  Also an alert for upcoming expiration dates is coming.  Six stars!   

One other wish I have would be for an extra field for notes to give a little more flexibility.  That would be seven stars!   

This app is well worth the price.  Very good product with excellent support.

name: My Medical
title: Seems the bugs are ironed out now
text:
After many updates and lots of frustration with this app, I'm finally pleased with it. I like the way I can keep all my documents in one place. Navigation is rough in places and it's not perfect.

I don't like the fact you have to buy a version for the iphone/ipod and yet another for the ipad. They're sort of an expensive app and if it was universal, it would be worth it. But I'm not convinced having it on all devices and buying it fo each one is worth it at all. It's not an app you're likely to use daily or even weekly or monthly unless you doctor a lot.

Many doctors now put records online for their patients. So one might question the need for an app like this. But, for now at least, I think it's nice to have on at least one of your devices.

name: My Medical
title: Indispensable
text: I can't say how much I enjoy having this App. I always hate going to the hospital or doctors office and having to fill out forms without having all my information with me. This app gives me a place to keep all my info, and my wife's info and the kids info all in one place. I wanted to transfer my info to my other iphone and an itouch, but could not get it to work. I tried several times, but no luck. I sent Steven an email about my problem, and just a couple of hours later I had my answer. I had forgotten to sync my second iphone, so it still had the older version of My Medical. I updated it, and it worked perfect. Now I have all my info on both iphones and my itouch. Thanks Steven for great service, and a wonderful App.

name: My Medical
title: Good application but can be better
text:
I like this application a lot.  I like the easy intuitive display, the ability to track both current and past medications.  The ability to track immunizations.  I am tracking my whole family--even tracking my dog's health.  Here are 2 things that would make it even better:
1)  The current medications should be easy to transfer into the past medications area without having to enter all the information all over again.  I have not found a way to do this and it should be easy to do.
2)  It would be nice for the program to have the medications set up so that you enter the first few letters and the name of the medicine comes out.
Over all a very good application.  I think the above would make it a great application.

name: My Medical
title: This App Rocks
text: After trying a fairly good program that the developers stopped supporting, I was thrilled to find this App. The other program was run through Google Health and I could not change the information within the App. My Medical keeps the information on your phone and the interface is easy to learn and easy to use. I agree with a prior review that suggested there be a prescription database which would offer suggestions based upon the first few letters typed. I am keeping my entire family's medical information, including my Mother's in the program. I also like the fact that you can share the data with other family members who have the program and with your physician. Great job!

name: My Medical
title: Totally awesome App
text: My Medical for the iPhone provided a much needed ability to have medical info with us 'on the go'.  The layout / functionality and intuitiveness of the app was top shelf.  Along came the iPad version, and later the Mac OS version and total coverage is nice to have.  The iCloud syncing works great, and the ability to be able to input data on the Mac, is a welcome relief for me - iDevice keyboards are definitely not my thing.  Tech support is very responsive and the author is very receptive to comments.  If you often care for other family members, (aged parents, grandkids, etc.) having their medical info at your fingertips at any given time could be crucial.   I highly recommend My Medical for iPhone, iPad, and Mac.

name: My Medical
title: User
text:
Excellent app. I agree with  JeninATX's suggestions, but overall have seen my life get simplified after using this to track five people in my family. I find it easy to figure out, have gotten compliments from my NP about it, and find it pretty thorough. Love being able to email reports to doctors. 
I have some suggestions also. 
1. When previous entries are offered as a choice, it would be easier if the blank entry box showed up at the top instead of at the bottom.
2. It would be helpful if a list of family were available to choose from for filling out Family History--often they will be the same for everybody. This would mean needing a way to identify the relative by a name and being able to change the relationship (i.e. my husband's sister is also my children's paternal aunt).

3. I am hoping that someday you will add features like charts that will show things like blood pressure over time, or separate apps that could track the info but allow the results to be integrated into the main app for reports, etc.

Great job, I can't wait til we all have electronic medical record cards but until then this is a great alternative.

name: My Medical
title: Great tool!
text: I highly recommend it! Reliable -- I can store my critical information in one place. I see many Doctors & adding them took only minutes since they are in my Contacts; I simply dowloaded their data into the APP.  I can store meds; Drug Name, Dosage, Frequency & Side Effects -- which I can quickly email to my Doc. or access easily to update a hard copy.  It has a place to track Office Visits, from the Date to the Outcome (great for notes & follow-up), -- I think the author has covered it all.  I can email data from within any of the sections directly to my Physician if I need to.  Nice, neat, clean, and very easy to use -- no useless data that is not relevant.  Exactly what I was looking for!

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful Timesaving App
text: This is a great app! As a mom and wife, this app is exactly what I was looking for. There used to be a time when I could keep all the different medical information straight...because it was just me and my husband. Now that we have added three children to the mix, it's getting to be a little difficult to remember who received what shot when and when did I have my knee operated on?? The website makes it very easy to enter large amounts of data. The e-mail feature comes right to my phone and imports effortlessly! I had a suggestion of having additional sorting options and the app developer got back to me with hours!! Overall, I am very well pleased.

name: My Medical
title: The best of the pick
text:
Spent a lot of time researching the various Apps that will allow you easily to enter your medical data/history - ideally away from the iPhone itself (too much tiny typing!) - and have it all instantly and simply available, well-arranged yet secure.

My Medical seemed the best… comprehensive; good reviews with respect to its stability; appealing interface; ease of use and so on.

It became obvious within less than five minutes that such other reviews were accurate.

The system of being able to copy and paste text etc into a form on the developer's website (which then emails My Medical owners a link via an iPhone mail account - click it and data is entered faultlessly into the App) was particularly appealing.

Further, the App really does allow you to commit a usefully rich range of medical data - and for multiple users, family members, those one cares for etc.

Support from the developer is quick, helpful and friendly.

There certainly appears to be no other App so comprehensive, easy to use, reliable and well-supported as My Medical. Excellent value!

name: My Medical
title: The BMW of Personal Medical Record Apps
text: I purchased other apps in this category and found them lacking in one way or the other.  This app is thoughtful and thorough.  With the newest update which allows you to enter data from your Mac or PC, the tedium of data entry on an iPhone has been removed.  The developer has thought of it all!  You will be very happy with this purchase.  Absolutely no buyers remorse!  Your medical doctors will be very impressed. Filling out the dreaded medical info on the clipboard at your NEW doctor's office will be much, much easier.  Some medical offices might even let you email the information to them.  Apps like this are the reason my iPhone is indispensable.

name: My Medical
title: Superb App! My Most Used App!!!
text:
Does everything I need it to and more! Awesome version (v1.1) upgrade too.

Version 1.2 upgrade was very impressive! Steven added some features I had been asking for (backup ability, more date fields, current meds migration to past meds and more).  This app is worth more than it's price and a lifesaver when filling out forms at a new specialist's office. Several of my doctors actually use info I store in the app. The app: "Print Magic" is a nice tool for sharing your med info with doctors. And now that there is web site for data importing I'm sure the people that asked me about this app will migrate their info over as well. Keep up the good work Steven.

name: My Medical
title: Now I'm not so happy- revised rating
text: I originally gave this app 5 stars because it functioned so well. Then my dad bought this app, because I liked it so much, and put it on his phone. He tried using the web site and import function for data entry, and we have had nothing but problems. Data appears to not import, but we have found that tapping on random buttons, like Edit while in the Allergies section will make the data appear. Dad could not get Physicians imported, and decided to do a search for them, and they appeared all of a sudden. We are both seeing the same problems, so it's not user error. Don't understand. The first night I used the web site for data entry, it was flawless. Now, it is useless. I've reported these problems, and the developer responded promptly. Hope they straighten it out soon.

name: My Medical
title: Very happy customer!
text: I don't know what I did before this app!  It completely lives up to my expectations...I wasn't sure it would fit my needs but after trying out the app I find it very useful and it covers pretty much all of my medical data.  What I like best is that it is such a snap to look up information, so I can consult any piece of data nice and quick. I'm always forgetting which of my meds requires which dose so I go to the medicines section which is automatically sorted by the name and look it up just like that.  That kind of service is a major convenience.  With the updates I have pictures of all of my meds in here too!

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful useful app!!!
text: I have a chronic illness that requires I keep up with many medications, procedures, and physicians. This has allowed me to keep all this info updated and handy. I recently had to go to the hospital and was having difficulty giving my medical history to the nurses and physicians. I was able to direct them to this app abd they wre able to get everything they needed while I was able to go on getting tge help I needed. It was a life saver and the EMTs and physicians were really impressed with the app. A MUST fir anyone who may need regular medical assistance. I've showed it to everyone I know and they all think it's amazing! Totally worth the price!!!!!!

name: My Medical
title: Excellent Progam!
text: Great value for a terrific program! Great features such as password protection, local storage on IPhone, medical info for multiple people and ability to email info in a thorough printout with good logical progression. The App is very user friendly and imports contact info for physicians and emergency contacts directly from your my contacts. I emailed suggestions to the author about possibly adding lab and test result findings as wel as previous injuries and hospitalizations. I recieved a very rapid response back from the author of the App within a few hours. I look forward to updates and future Apps by this author. Thanks for a job well done!

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
Are you sick of filling out forms every time you visit a medical professional?  Then this app is for you. It is an absolutely wonderful application. Keep track of all your medical information in one place. Print it out, email it to your physician, or just take you handheld device to the doctor's office with you and refer to it when necessary. You can fill all the information out on  your desktop and the information is emailed to your device and imported to the app.

The support for this application is prompt and personal. There are no problems the team ignores. I strongly urge everyone to download and use this application.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
If you need to keep track of medical information, DO NOT look any further ... buy this ap.  I stumbled upon it and am glad I did.  

The online information entry form worked flawlessy and, in a matter of minutes, the data I entered on the web site was emailed to me and uploaded to the program.  The only way this program could have been any easier to use is if someone else had done all my typing.  :-)  

I contacted the author Saturday evening with some questions, expecting to hear back Monday.  I heard back approximately 2 hours after I emailed him.  That kind of service is literally unheard of today.

name: My Medical
title: I love my apps
text: I would rate this app higher if it had the ability to sync across all devices.  It would also have to sync all the attached documents as well.  I am very happy that I can add all family members and it is very comprehensive.  I agree with other reviewers that the ability to add custom fields in all categories would be nice.  Each medical situation is different.  I use this app to maintain my 83 year old mom's information.  She  has many issues and is on 20 percriptions.  I also use it for my son who has asthma and my daughter with cerebral palsy and seizures.  This app is awesome to keep you organized especially with aging parents.  It was worth the money but please add sync ability like other apps ie: Evernote is a great example.

name: My Medical
title: Needs a few more things
text:
I started using this a long time ago, but was just too lazy to keep up with it.  I think it's a good app.  I've looked into several, but this one keeps coming up.  Now I have several medical problems that require me to take the time.  

I have a few suggestions:
1.  Many doctors have several location, but you can only add one address.  I have more than one doctor that practices at multiple locations.
2.  Several of the doctors have more than one phone number. I just recently had problems getting in touch with a doctor only to find out that their phone was out of order.  I called the hospital and got another number.  When the phone was repaired, then I went back to using the original number.  But, the other number is still good.  Although this was a minor incident, I think it's a good idea.  Plus, what about cell numbers?
3.  The practice's name would be helpful.

I apologize if I am repeating someone else's review.  I think there are more things that would be helpful, but that's it for now.

name: My Medical
title: Sharing Data with Another Device Missing on current version?
text: I've used this app for some time now.  It has been handy to share data with other family members, especially when they also have this app. However, the newest version  (2.1) appears to be missing this capability. The support site indicates, "[i]n the app, tap "Back Up or Send to Another Device" and fill out the "To:" field . . . ."  However, the newest version only lists "Create a Backup".  If you create a backup and click on the link received in an email, it will "restore" your database instead of adding to it.  This needs to be resolved quickly. Note one can exchange data between to phones with the app via Wi-Fi.

name: My Medical
title: Great help
text: This program is a great help. I see many different Doctors due to health problems and this helps keep everything together. It also helps me keep all of the doctors informed about what test have been done and how they came out as well what meds I am on and why. It also lets me track the rest of the family as well. I know that in an emergency I will be able to pull up this information to help treat myself and my family. I think this app is worth the money. I love to see an update that allows you to also store information medical implant information as well.

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful
text: This app is complete and concise. The data is extremely easy to record. Love the fact that it can be backed up and even be emailed as a PDF file. I was recently sent to the ER for a head injury and although conscious and lucid I had a hard time giving the physicians my complete history. I simply opened the app and handed it to them. They were astounded. I have an extensive medical history and this app takes all the guess work out when I forget certain details. I would recommend it to anyone in a heart beat!!!  Congratulations to those who created it!!!!

name: My Medical
title: Great app with much potential
text:
This is a great app for all the reasons stated by other reviewers: user interface, functionality, integration with email & address book. 

I love the lab results section, as I want to track lab values over time, but would really like to add more variables in addition to blood pressure and cholesterol (white blood cell, red blood cell, glucose, etc). Then those would be able to be graphed over time. It'd be even better to be able to add all values from a single lab report, rather than each value separately (having to select the date every time).

Those features would make this app perfect for me and earn 5 stars. :)

name: My Medical
title: I like it!
text: I bought the app and added my medical info. It's great that I can use the web to fill in the form and then email to my iPhone. Great time saver. Multiple people records is also a great idea. Overall I like it very much. I'd suggest a couple of things. One, to be able to add jpegs (x-rays . . .),  forms, doctors portraits, etc. anything medical I take a picture of with my iPhone. Two, under "Illness & Injuries" it would be good to be able to have a FULL calendar for the "Onset" category. Right now I can only add the current year dates. I have chronic illnesses and would like to have the actual starting date recorded for them. Look forward to any updates!

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text:
I have had my share of medical procedures. I have a lot of doctors. It is nice to have all your history available in one place.   I would like to see a couple of updates. Inside the app a red flag appears by the refill date prior to refill date. It is only noticed if you are in the app. It would be nice to have a flag show on the app screen that gives us a warning. 

I would also like to see a date when the script expires. You call the pharmacy and see you can't get last refill because it has expired delay getting a new script.

name: My Medical
title: Mostly great app but...
text:
I really like this app overall. It has made it much easier for me to keep track of my mom's medications and allergies. It would be perfect though if the following improvements were made:

1. When printing or making a pdf, it would be nice to choose which categories I wanted included. Sometimes I just want medications and allergies and nothing else, but it prints out everything which ends up being pages to sift through. 

2. Also, when printing or making a pdf, I wish it would organize the info into a spreadsheet. This makes it much easier for a doctor to review. 

3. Finally, I wish there was an online cloud version (like evernote or ireminder) so that my mom could add info from her computer and have it show up on my computer. 

These are the changes that I would like to see that would make it a truly great app, but I do like it overall and would recommend anyone using it who needs to keep up with several people's medical information.

name: My Medical
title: Fab App!
text:
Wonderful app and certainly more convenient than taking ziplock bags of meds to each dr appt! Email and txt views are also an added plus for sending to providers, and who could complain about the email backup option?  I've had the app for a few hours now and have finally finished filling everything in.  The photo ID for each patient prevents emergency workers from applying the wrong patient info to the wrong person, which is another plus.  Additionally, I'm glad the info isn't stored on servers anywhere (preserving strict privacy) and doesn't require wi-fi to access. 

A very minor bug I found:

- When "view information as text" or "send info by email" options are selected, emergency contacts' phone number is shown as "PrimaryTelForNumber" rather than the actual number. I would correct to show actual telephone numbers.

Great program, highly recommended! This is the best $2 I've spent thus far.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent program
text:
I have been searching for a very long time for a way to keep track of my personal medical information.  I have downloaded several others but they all failed to meet my expectations in one way or other.  This program has many features that I love such as ability to import info from your contact list, email,  and ability to have info on more than one person.  

I would like to see a way to track procedures/tests, when they were done and when they are due again.  Also suggested a dental catagory.  Would love to see customizable catagories with sub-catagories, for example: "Phsyical Exam", with all the dates for the exam not mixed up with dates from other entries.   

I emailed the developer on a few suggestions for an update and I received a response back in just a few hours.  Already working on updates from the suggestions received.  

Much potential!

name: My Medical
title: Great app.
text:
This is the only medical information app I've kept. I've tried others, but only My Medical remains in use.

Fast, easy importing of notes, documents, photos. I import entries from DayOne when needed & have many lab reports I've scanned using the phone. I have all of my medically related photos in the app & it remained perfectly intact when I switched to a new phone. I wish all my other apps were as stable.

I have a good deal of information stored here so I really appreciate the fast navigation. If I need something during a doctor's appointment, I can find what I need in a few seconds & the doctors really appreciate that. It's very useful, has a clean, updated look & I'd recommend it to anyone.

I removed one star because there's not much in the way of linking information to each specific doctor or prescription - that would make it near perfect. However, that's never slowed things down when I needed it to perform at the last minute.

name: My Medical
title: My first review…
text:
I have been using My Medical on my Mac for a number of years. A few years ago I got an iPad and iPhone, and loaded the iOS versions on them. I use Dropbox syncing, as My Medical no longer accesses iCloud, and I have had no problems. 
   So far, I have used their Support for questions on the methods of handling some of the info. Last week, I emailed them with a suggestion which would handle Prescriptions and Current Medications more efficiently. I was very surprised that I had an answer the next day.
   So all-in-all, if asked, I would recommend this set of apps.

name: My Medical
title: A real app with a lot of power built in
text: This is one of a few apps that really has been built with a lot of power that not only helps you but allows you to use it to help your family when you can't. I use this app to print out all of my medical history when I go to the emergency room so there's no question what medication I'm taking and what is going on with me. But the best part is I have the same information available for everyone in my family that I normally wouldn't have.

name: My Medical
title: Updates loses Info
text: When I first downloaded this App I was very excited. It does have some good points and some bad points. First, for the bad points. When you have an update on this app you lose all your Information and than have to type it all back in again. This did not make me very happy as I have a lot of info to enter. Second, for the good points of this app. The app does have a lot of areas to add your Medical History. It would be very helpful that the next time you have an update you make it so you don't lose all your information and than have to type it all back into the app.

name: My Medical
title: Great organizational tool
text: I love, love, love this app. As a wife and mother, I love having all our medical info in one place that I can take with me!  It keeps everything clear and ready for insurance application time or necessary info at an office visit. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because I agree with another reviewer that it can be a bit redundant. It would be nice if you could just put something in one place and then have the app distribute the pieces of info into appropriate categories. But I love that it can be printed, emailed and worked on online at the website. Great. Thanks.

name: My Medical
title: Just the best there is !!!
text: It didn't take long after I started entering my data for the last 8 years until I realized what a powerful ap this is -- everything I was looking for and more!  I was amazed at how thorough and well-organized the various blood test results presets were, and how easy it was to add other types of tests that discern they are numerical and generate graphs just like the pre-sets.  Outstanding work there Steven Chaitoff, I feel like I owe you more than the $1.99 I was charged for this little jewel.

name: My Medical
title: My medical information
text: I go to hospitals where I had been before. They say, "it does not matter that you were here yesterday with the same complaints, we do not keep your records in the computer. We have to start over-why are you here?" I' sick and feel like leaving. Now I just give my medical app information from A to Z and lay my head back down to rest. Thanks for setting my med. info in one easy App so I have less stress at the ER or wherever I might need it. I give it 5 stars!k

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: This is a GREAT app! My medical history is complicated and there's too much to try to recall when some medical person is firing questions at me. One wonderful feature of this app is the ability to enter massive amounts of information on your desktop, then import it into the iPod. Thst is much easier than doing a lot of data entry using the iPods screen. Now when I'm being questioned, I can respond with accurate information. Thank you Steve for producing a dynomite app!

name: My Medical
title: Simply the Best Medical Tracking application on the app store
text: Today I downloaded My Medical for my Mac. I was so impressed with this software that I purchased the iphone and iPad versions of this application. What's great is that you can send data to all of your devices. I was amazed at what this application can do. I am going to use this application to track my familys medical history and whats great is that I will have my medical history with me at all times. Well developed application. Highly Recommended.

name: My Medical
title: Have everyone get it
text: I love this app! I have tried to get all my family and friends to get this app. I have it on my phone and use it to keep track of mine and my fathers medical information and medications. Was very helpful when paramedics responded to my medical emergency at work. Even the paramedic wanted to know where I got it so that he could get it and have his family put it on their phones. Would be nice if the information could be synced across devices.

name: My Medical
title: Everything in One Organized Place and it Syncs Too
text: I am really thrilled with the Mac desktop version and the app which is on my iPhone, iPad and touch. All synced.  I had been using a silly Word doc to track all my shots, 3 Rxs, and office visits.  This is such a delight to use. So now I can think “Is my tetanus shot up-to-date” or "what that Rx I seldom use?" and the info is at hand.  Very, very helpful and I love that no one has my info.  I’d love an app just like this to track my financial info.

name: My Medical
title: When the in the Dr office or ER this has save my memory
text:
For the past two years my spouses medical history has been piling up.  There was so much information that a Dr yelled at me because I wasn't able to give him important information.
I am now on top of it.  On our last trip to the ER, the nurse's and Dr were impressed that I was able to provide them with so much information.
My fav feature; that I can sync it with my spouse's phone in less than a min.

name: My Medical
title: Awesome App....just a minor problem
text:
I love this app. It has all the info that the EMS would need.  The only thing I've noticed so far that I would add is the ability to add your heart rate to the blood pressure test, so it can be graphed along with the blood pressure.

Also, since I keep this app on the home screen, I'd like to have an icon that will draw attention to it. EMS may not be looking for this app if they are trying to go through the phone looking for numbers to call.

Other than that, this is a must have app!!

name: My Medical
title: Why the Ghost Clipboard & No Color?
text:
Nice APP except for the Ghost Clipboard in the background.  It is truly distracting.  Makes it look cheap !
Also why is there no COLOR in this app ? I know medical stuff can be boring but can't you put a little green or orange or any color except the dull overcast gray inside ? There is no contrast once the info is entered in.  I can't believe that during any of all the revisions, no one suggested any color other than (yawn) gray ! Even the APP is bright red when you want me to buy it.  
Come on, just a splash of bright green or orange !

name: My Medical
title: My Favorite App
text:
This is the best app I have on my iPhone.  I could not live without it.  It has made my life so easy!

Once, while traveling, I was taken to an ER.  The Doctors were amazed that I had all my medical history available at my finger tips.  It made my treatment go much faster and easier.  They said that if every patient had this kind of information available at the point of treatment, the results would be better patient outcomes.

name: My Medical
title: THE BEST personal medical app i have used
text: this app is the BEST designed and thought out app of its type.  it is straight forward and contains everything that a patient would need to have when seeing their doctor.  the fact that the data STAYS with the patient and doesn't go into "the cloud" is a definite plus.  being able to send a summary report, or just a partial report, via email ensures that there are no misinterpretations of handwritten notes.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This app is a great way to have all of your medical records on you at all times. You can put copies of your blood tests, radiology reports and doctors visit summaries in the app as well as other medical history information, including your prescription medications. The only shortcoming is that the copies are identified only by date. An ability to label the photoed info would allow instant recognition of the report you need to pull up. Today's app update retained all the information I previously had in the app.

name: My Medical
title: Top Notch
text: This very useful application works well because it simply keeps track of essential medical data in a very easy-to-use format. It is organized logically, it is simple to add or look up data, and it is adaptable. The developer responds quickly and personally  to suggestions, and I believe improved versions will add the capability to graph various lab or personal data, making it helpful to observe trends in one's healthcare. I have no complaints.

name: My Medical
title: Pitiful!
text:
Wow this just might be the most pitiful company, and customer service I have ever run up against!
Especially considering what's at stake (one's health). 
This was the first sort of expensive premium app i ever purchased. 
I purchased two; one for my mac, one for my iPhone, 
with the  simple idea that they would communicate with each other.
 
i needed to go see my cardiologist this Monday morning armed with the proper information. 
I spent weeks and weeks collecting all my health data I needed to have prepared for him. 
I had an issue with the syncing; I'm using dropbox but the units weren't speak to each other.
I wrote to support asking for some advice on how to get the two apps to communicate; no response,
wait a couple days, ask again, nothing.

it's been 10 days now, and all i receive from them is the "acknowledgment of your email" response.

for those of you who are syncing properly, it appears to be a useful app,
but if you have even a small hiccup, consider this fair warning.
eric

name: My Medical
title: Great App!
text: The best app we have ever purchased. Incredibly intuitive, powerful and simple to use. We rely on our adult son to help us and were delighted to be able to set this app up by ourselves. Son is delighted that we can share all of our information reliably between him and our doctors. I am hoping our doctors will recommend this to their patients as this kind of simplified communication could prevent the kind of misinformation that complicates eldercare.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: I really wish this app would share information between patients.  I'd like to keep records for my whole family.  I don't see an easy way to use the same contact info/primary care doc/emergency contact/etc for multiple people.  With a wife and 5 kids, it is tedious entering this for each person over and over again.  I wish the vaccination record would allow you to select one from a list.  With a bit of work I can see this being a 4 star app but I think it's a long way off from a 5 star app...

name: My Medical
title: Good job
text:
I'm diabetic and have high blood pressure. I take several pills. I have blood work done 3-4 times a year. I store all the results here and at a glance I can see what my numbers are doing. I keep my meds listed. I've told my kids if I'm ever in a situation that I can't respond, all my health info is right here. I keep it up to date. 
All of that to say, this is a good app to have. You don't know when you might need it. Thank you

name: My Medical
title: Was A Great App Until I Couldn
text: I was using this app on my iPad and iPhone.  For some reason, I cannot access it on my phone.  My password will not work and even when I indicated that I forgot the password, the password sent to me doesn't work.  I also deleted the app on my phone and re-installed it,  it is still asking for a password and will not take the one sent to me.  I am very disappointed since my phone is generally what I have with me when I go to the doctor's office.  Now, I do not have access to my medical information on my phone. And this is an app that I paid to use.

name: My Medical
title: Perfect
text: This is exactly what I was looking for.  It would be great to be able to move a prescription from the current medications to allergy.  This app would be complete of there was a section for dental visits i.e cleanings etc.  I agree with other reviewers there are things that could be more "clean" or organized like the immunization section.  Other than that I found what I was looking for.  Adding a picture for each profile would also be a great detail.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This app is very easy to use, great user interface.  Especially liked how you can update your records from the website, and then email it to yourself on your phone.  Then you just open the email on your phone, and it automatically updates your app.  Has subjects for a variety of health records, and was able to enter all my information in it.  Very reasonable price for all it includes.

name: My Medical
title: totally worth it
text: this is app is so worth $3... my husband and i have quite a few health problems, were on about 30 medications and have many doctors, this app helps us keep track of all this and so MUCH MORE.... its a very extremely useful app. only thing i would add is foods to avoid for certain health problems then it would be perfect for everything but they do have other apps for that so no worries.

name: My Medical
title: Great App
text: My Medical is a "great" app to keep track of your entire family's medication, names and phone numbers of doctors, dates of past hospitalizations, tests and procedures plus other important medical information.  This becomes very helpful that if in event of  an emergency you are asked what medications your "loved ones" are taking.  I've have found "My Medical"  extremely useful in exactly this situtation and well worth the price.

name: My Medical
title: Outstanding
text:
The best app for making a medical record.  Lost data comments refers to a problem in earlier versions which has since been corrected.  Program builds a very thorough database which your medical provider(s) will appreciate.  Program also has a good support team. This is a jewel of an app.
EMR vendors should take a close look at this program especially if Dragon dictation could be incorporated into the program.

name: My Medical
title: Great vaccine tracker
text: I have been using this for a few years now, and love it. I can track vaccines and other medical information for all of my family members. It stores backup information a folder in my own Dropbox account, which makes me feel confident that my information won't get lost with a bad software revision or if they were to go out of business or something.

name: My Medical
title: Password problems
text:
I have no problem using this app on my iPad but on my iPhone it continues to say my password is wrong. 

Within hours of sending a request for help I received an email from My Medical helping me solve the problem even though they indicated on their site the help desk would not be available fur a few days!!

This is an app that cares about their users! Thank you!!!

name: My Medical
title: Nice App
text:
I like the app, but I would like to see enhanced graphics on the start-up page and also with options to show key info when the app is opened. Like emergency contacts, next Dr.s appt, Dr. phone number...etc. 

It is cool you can also enter all your info on the website and transfer it to your phone. What I don't like is the annoying calanders for dates that you must use. You can not just simply enter a date without scrolling through the years and months.

I would also like to graph my weight and blood pressure readings and be able to send them to my doctor. I have to use two other apps to do this. Would be nice if one app would handle all of this.

If you really want to go all out....add a push to notify the user of Dr. appts, pick up meds from the pharmacy, etc.

Overall, great app.

name: My Medical
title: As a medical professional this is fantastic!
text: I wish my patients all had this app with all of their medical info, prescriptions, and doctors at their fingertips when they come to see me. I love that your info is not stored online.  My only request is that appointments are stored with their times.  Buy this, use this, and please spread the word to all of your friends and family!  Your medical professionals will love you for it.

name: My Medical
title: Very helpful
text: I now can have all medical records at my fingertips -- great for doctor appointments, especially new patients. It makes it so easy to not just store all of your medical records and information, but also share it with anyone via email or hard copy. Also, the method of backing up info via email seems really smart, secure and private. And I love that it stores actual test result reports (PDFs).

name: My Medical
title: Outstanding Application
text: I did have a problem and reported on my iPhone App Store. Don't do that - go to the developer's site and report problems!!  This app was literally a life saver for my husband in ER. Having all the background on his diagnosis as well as the doctors numbers, test results and medication gave us an edge. Maybe he would have been air flighted without it. Maybe. I recommend this app to everyone.

name: My Medical
title: This is everything!
text:
I have watched for something like this app. Found it and boy it is thorough. I have everything I need for entire family from appt.s and allergies to medications present and past with doses and side effects. I have emailed my information to my parents and to a physician and really like the clean simple to read data that it produces. 

Top notch app, stop look any further this is it!!

name: My Medical
title: Disappointed
text: Your very latest update is terrible.  I originally loved this app, but with each new update, it has gotten worse.    I can't rearrange categories anymore.  There is no "edit" on the category screen.  Some features are good, but your changes were not for the better.  I am disappointed in the latest update.  I can't change background, can't rearrange categories, and when I went into FAQ, tapped on a question, the answer came up for a split second and then disappeared.  Could not get answers.  Please fix these bugs.

name: My Medical
title: Fabulous app & outstanding developer!
text:
This app is worth ten times what I paid. I've put in a couple requests to the developer and he is very willing to add more features. 

If you can't remember all your medical history then this is the app for you.

All of my suggestions, along with MANY more, have turned this app truly outstanding. The developer has responded immediately to all my questions.

name: My Medical
title: I use MyMedical
text: Love the App. Would like to see an appointment issue list maker to make brief notes about whatto talk to Docs. about because I usually go in with multiple issues, and always forget to bring something up. Also, I take 13 mess and a collapsed list would be easier to go thru when nurse reads off what she has from my last visit. But it truly is great having all my med info at my fingertips for me and my kids. Thanks. Keep up the great app!

name: My Medical
title: Great ap!
text:
Incredibly well put together!  It is the perfect comprehensive ap to track all medical records. The only thing I could wish to be added is for hemoglobin and hematocrit to be graphed. (Thus is important data to watch if you are anemic.)
Update: my iPhone died and I had to get a new one.  When I restored and opened this app- all my data was there!!!  I am so thankful for the cloud backup!!!!  Thank you for a great app!!!

name: My Medical
title: Love this app to the max!
text:
I travel across usa for work,o end up at a different Dr every time I travel. When  I go to dr. I forget so many things, this app worth it's money!!
What it could use is:  a place to keep a photoof both sides of your health INS. Card & notes so you can remeber what your next appt is for, and questions to ask when you see your dr.  That would just be a bonus to an A++ app that it already is!

name: My Medical
title: Great app. With small changes
text:
I would like to see emergency info accessed without a password when you have a password enabled. Also in the lab test section, a few more tests like glucose in the menu that can be graphed. Very minor stuff but the app itself is very good. Worth the $$$$.
UPDATE ......new upgrade now is up!!  This Ap is all that you can want. The author of the Ap LISTENS. Would give it ten stars if I could.

name: My Medical
title: Love this App!
text: For years I have been trying to figure out a way to consolidate all of the various medical records into one place. With this app, I can do just that for each member of the family and have all of the information handy when it is most needed!  An added benefit is to track my progress regarding test results. Well done app and the support has been excellent.

name: My Medical
title: I love it !!
text:
Nice to have all records, yours & family, in one place. Especially for "new patient" check in! Also, for elderly parents, to help at Dr. appts., etc... I even use it for my kids (pets)!
1 - Have "history" section. There is the "family hx.", but not place for yours? And in a "check the box" fashion like new patient form.
2 - I would like to be able to rearrange front page. As add someone, they go to the top. I want mine always at top. For med personnel to find easily.
3 - For "Family Hx."; have boxes to check for common things, like on new patient form. Typing them all in is a "pain".
4 - Have a Top 3, to choose to have at top in red, like the "Emergency Contacts". So medical personnel can find most important info first!
ie: Contacts, Allergies, Conditions/Hx.

But, basically Love It !!  Thanx !!

name: My Medical
title: Great app great support
text: I use this app more frequently then most of my other apps.   I cannot tell you just how useful this is when I'm at the doctor and need to discuss a medication or other medical issue.   It's easily worth triple what I paid.   The developer is extremely helpful always responding to my emails the same day. What can I say. It's just an excellent and extremely useful app.

name: My Medical
title: Helps you in being an empowered patient!
text: The use of this app helps in making the patients more educated, engaged and empowered in their healthcare process. It is very user friendly and the support to help you solve any issues that you might run into is fantastic and timely. I would like to see the ability to link reminders in the calendar for followup testing.

name: My Medical
title: uploading
text: I really like the program but there is stil a syncing problem I have this program on my I pad and my Iphone but for some reason the Iphone will not up load to the cloud. this need ot get fixed. also need to advertise the fact that you can load a bulk of the informatiuon from your web site. becasue it is really annoying to load a large amount of info on you phone or ipad.

name: My Medical
title: Multiple uses
text:
This is the best medical App ever. ALL and I mean all your info can be stored here. You can note questions for the doctor for future visits. It is great to update records if your Doctor starts going electronically, as mine did. You switch doctors, info is at your fingertips!
Allergies, eyecare and advance directive is just some of the few great benefits to this App.
You can import documents from other sources, add documents and pictures.
I even use it for my pet's medical records. I foster dogs and when they get adopted I can email the new parents their pets medical history.
My Doctor looked through it and even remarked how great it was.
This App makes me wonder if one of the developers has a medical degree!!

name: My Medical
title: Very nice App. I'm impressed.
text:
I used the email feature to send my Meds & conditions to my computer so I could print them out for a doctor visit.

I like the way the information is displayed.

My only wish is that it had a built in library of Meds and Conditions that would pop up as you type.  But that would only be on my wish list, it in no way detracts from the form or function of this app.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical is my medical APP
text: Excellent APP for tracking and record keeping. Also works to plan questions for Doctor at next visit. Love the new syncing "merge". There could be a little more flexibility on sorting test results ... like chronological. I realize the chart does, but in list form. By the way, great responsive support too as my wife and I have received responses immediately from developer.

name: My Medical
title: Very Comprehensive
text: I started using the app today.  It is very thorough and easy to use. It is laid out in a logical fashion and allows for entering a complete medical history or as little as you need.  There are a few minor bugs that are inconvenient but don't impair the program.  I have contacted the app's author.  Since this is a new app, I expect the bugs to be fixed soon.

name: My Medical
title: This is a great app
text:
I love this app for tracking my family's health data - even my furry "kids".  

One enhancement request: need a way to easily convert current meds to past meds so that I don't have to re-enter them in the Past Meds section when, for example, an antibiotic course is completed. This is known as medication reconciliation in the medical field.

name: My Medical
title: Very helpful!
text: I have been using this app to keep track of meds for my son for a long time. It makes dealing with multiple doctors and school much easier. I don't rely on my memory when providing updates for doctor visits. We also use it to make sure we are giving the right medicine and dose and to manage refills.

name: My Medical
title: 5 Stars
text: Everything's in one place which comes in handy when one is asked for medical information. They've made it easy to share information. It takes only a little time and effort to catch on to the process of adding test results. Neat, clean and well organized. Well worth the cost.

name: My Medical
title: Keeps Crashing
text:
iPhone 5S. I used this successfully on my iPhone 4S. Now, on my new iPhone 5S it keeps crashing to the point where I cannot enter information!  Please fix!  I have now tried downloading and reinstalling this app again but it still crashes.  I am regretfully deleting this app until you fix this problem.  I still use it on my old iPod, but that device is dying and is not going to be available
to me much longer. 
Also, you have provision for people with visual limitations. Please add provision for those of us with limited hearing. Thank you.

name: My Medical
title: Awesome app!
text: So simple to use.  Nicely organized.  Customizable.  Allows you to upload documents, photos, etc. into files.  You are able to password protect the app so your information is secure.  I just love this app.  With 7 of us in the family, I have all the information I need right at my fingertips.

name: My Medical
title: PhylSGann
text: This an awesome app.  You can have all of your medical info at the touch of a finger for emergency workers to review.  This will save time when treating you, especially if there is not any family member with you.  I have shown the icon to all of my family so they can point it to medical personnel.  Thanks for doing this awesome and for free.  It could save your life!

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text:
Works well if you're single but I've not yet figured out how to get entered data to sync with my wife's application.*

*(Have upped my review from 2 stars to 5 stars.  One must go to the App Store or Google Play to update the App.  It doesn't automatically update, at least not in the App Store.  Once this is done, data transfers easily).

name: My Medical
title: Excellent Job
text: I love the app! It is the easiest way for me to manage my family's health information on the go. I have three young kids - which adds up to a lot of vaccines - and all of them are on my My Medical and so I feel very well organized (not to mention my own medical history). Thank you for this excellent product.

name: My Medical
title: What a great app!
text: I have an aging mother (88) and have lots of medical info to track for her. This is perfect! I appreciate that it does not go to the 'cloud'-still too many security issues there. I use it for my info too. Just learned about the website data entry when I read the other reviews. I will be using it now.

name: My Medical
title: AWSOME !
text: Have used this app for about 6 months and it is great. Once all my data was entered I have everything at my disposal. When going to the doctor I can email them any information right in the spot which is much easier and more accurate than having to go by memory. Super app!  High recommend !!

name: My Medical
title: Excellent App
text: I have been looking for a medical app that contains features that I needed and that was also flexible.  I found that more from this app. I love this app,  I use it all the time to keep track of all my appointments,medicine, etc.  what I like about this app, is that I take photos.  Great App.  I highly recommend that everyone gets this app. I am.

name: My Medical
title: You nailed it..
text: I love this app to keep the health records of my wife, my father and myself.  Data entry is easy enough, each update seems to bring nicer features. This app is always on my 'must have' list when others ask we what apps to get.  Keep up the great work and keep those enhancements coming.

name: My Medical
title: GREAT APP !!
text:
I've been hoping to find a good App that can keep be a comprehensive HEALTH RECORD with all that this one has.... Extremely well thought out and laid out ... Very User Friendly too.
The only thing I am really hoping for in an update, is more variety in the graphs...ie., the ability to combine graphs onto one screen. But highly recommend this App!!

name: My Medical
title: The best medical app out there.
text:
Thanks for such a great app. I truly believe this could save someones life by having all the info available to the doctor at the right time. Would love to see a pain journal with calendar dates. Also how about pictures for the meds. And alerts for doctor appointments and medication reminders. 

Thank you,
Dan

name: My Medical
title: Enter Least Important Info First
text: Love this app being able to go to the Web site to enter and then email it to your phone to download it!!  Just know that for some odd reason in a list it downloads the last first and the first last.  I'm also going to put my Mom's and my puppy dog's info in here.

name: My Medical
title: Nice App But...
text:
You have got to fix it so that when entering data in various fields on your web site, the use of the enter key does not wipe out all data.  When I hit the return key all data I had entered for an hour was gone. Frustrating!!!!!!!!!

Secondly, why do I have to enter all data in this small frame on your site?  Can't you create a web site data entry portal that lets me use my big screen?  Annoying.

name: My Medical
title: A Great App
text: They thought of everything, even being able to email all of your info to yourself or others. I just have to remember to change the info if/when medical info changes. This app is well worth the small amount of money.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text:
Great app and very comprehensive. The only thing I would additionally ask for is that I use this app for my family, including 3 small kids, and it would be nice to have somewhere to store recent illnesses (much like you can record immunizations). Only kids get things often and repeatedly (like Strep) that it would be nice to have a record. 
Great app though!

name: My Medical
title: Textuftif
text:
Fabulous APP don't know how I handled all my med info w/o it.  Very handy when visiting a new doctor's office or going to a hospital for tests.  I can just look on my new Medical App and have the answers I need right on my IPod Touch.  Fantastic!  Too bad I can't give it 6 stars ..... Only thing missing from the lists is Vitamin/Mineral
Supplements, but I let Steven know.

name: My Medical
title: Not very good
text: I am both a doctor and a patient, and I get frustrated every time I try to input information. There's far too many steps to input common stuff like vitals signs, whereas putting in new insurance info (which shouldn't change more frequently than vitals) requires fewer taps to navigate to. Why should common stuff be so cumbersome? I've seen it done better in other software at work, which is frustrating because I'd like to use this for my personal info

name: My Medical
title: Well designed.
text: As a fellow developer, I have to say what a wonderful job you guys did on this app. The attention to the user experience and flow makes this a joy to use, even on a small screen like the iPhone. Looking forward to buying the iPad and Mac versions when iCloud syncing is added. Great job!
