name: My Medical
title: Very helpful
text:
I have a lot of medical problems. I'm always forgetting to bring a list of my medical info when I see a new Dr but with this app I can keep the info at easy access. Thanks for coming up with this helpful and important app for people like me. 
The only thing I can think of to make it better would be a place to put diabetic information.

name: My Medical
title: GREAT app!
text: I love this app!  It has everything I need.  I looked through dozens of apps and was unsure of which one to get.  But then I found My Medical and it was like getting 3 apps in 1!  It really is all inclusive!  So glad I bought it!  Can't wait to see updates in the future, I'm sure it will make this app even better!

name: My Medical
title: This app. Is Awesome. Buy it NOW!!
text:
If you have an extensive medical history like myself...you will absolutely LOVE this. It compiles all medical data into a summary page to be read as text. It is very thorough and user friendly. Be prepared to spend some time entering all your data but it ays off in the end. 
Nice work to the creators!!

name: My Medical
title: No customer service!!!
text: Honestly,  the concept of this app is wonderful and works well on one device. The concept of syncing is a big mess.  I am technologically savy, however when I have reached the end of my expertise, I am looking for "expert" help. I completed entering my information, I went to sync between my devices and it duplicated each person by 10 times. I reached out to "my medical" over five times and they never reply. I have been waiting two months with no response.  Very disappointed and discouraging.

name: My Medical
title: Great Product
text: I think this is a great app. I can easily add / edit information from my ipad or iphone and sync the two devices. The sync is very fast and is nice when we go to the doctor's office to retrieve information quickly. I show this to all of my friends and recommend highly.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent
text: Love the app! â�¤Customer service is excellent. Had a question and it was answered within hours. As nothing is perfect, it would be nice if you could choose to add all labs or vitals at once rather than each on separately. ğŸ˜¢keep up the great work. I will recommend this app to family and friends!ğŸ˜ƒ

name: My Medical
title: Awesome
text: I downloaded this app and love it. It was well thought out. I applaud the company for being so complete. It gives me instant access to my medical history, current meds and hospital surgeries. I only hope the company would make a program compatable with Windows. Thank you for being so complete

name: My Medical
title: Meets all my needs
text: So far this product offers every feature that I have wanted and i have not noticed a bug yet.  Cool features include emergency contacts from contacts, password lock, easy move of prescription from current to past, etc. Great app!

name: My Medical
title: Superb
text: Invaluable app. Everything I need in one place. Do not have to scramble to find information. Always have what I need to fill out medical forms. Terrific support, Keeps apo up-to-date and fixes things when they go wrong. Nothing better for medical issues out there right now.

name: My Medical
title: Wonderfully useful and thorough
text: This app is very pertinent if you have any medical problems or take any meds on a regular basis. All your info that has to be filled out at any new Dr you see is all in 1 place. And you can email it all or read it as text, that was a great idea. Great app guys I find it very valuable.

name: My Medical
title: Fails to sync
text:
I know this seems unbelievable , especially at the prices they charge, But the devices do not think the information amongst themselves--And their â€“ rather inconvenient â€“ suggestion that you email them among the devices â€“ well there's no convenient way to do that as far as I can see.

Also missing places for multiple providers, and for multiple trials of medication.

Not ready to go--not at that price.

name: My Medical
title: Screwed up all my data AGAIN!!!!
text: After upgrading to v2 it wiped out everything I had.  Lost a lot of time and energy.  After trying again with v2.6 and turning on iCloud sync, wiped out everything I entered on my phone because apparently there wasn't anything on my laptop version.  Instead of asking which version to use it chose for meâ€¦ and chose wrong.  You have to be kidding me.  BEWAREâ€¦ if you value your precious medical info, this software will be glad to remove and delete it for your!!!

name: My Medical
title: Absolutely a must!
text: This should be included in the 10 apps you need on your phone!  Takes time to input information (which means if you need any info, but this is information you will need over and over and over.

name: My Medical
title: Love it!
text:
I bought this app when it first came out and it has been so useful to me when I go to the doctors. Love that all my important medical information and treatments can be stored in one app and the meds I take. 

Are you going to do anything with this app for the Apple watch?

name: My Medical
title: Ok but could be better
text: Read the review of this app on their website & was very impressed by the features. Would prefer to "try before the buy" but bought it based on the website descriptions & reviews. However, disappointed by it. It lacks the "coolness" of its website descriptions. Would like to be able to upload to each Office Visit the test results/ documentation discussed--a la Evernote or Awesome Note. Was not worth the price.

name: My Medical
title: I'm am loved #1
text: Take care of yourself  w/this app alot of things you might have forgotten is in the palm of your hand ! If you are injured or close to death vital records are the only chance at life u have. #1 app u should get . Takes care of your whole family!! And loved ones.

name: My Medical
title: Best medical app
text: My medical allows you to keep all of your medical records at your fingertips.  From office visits, surgeries, medicines currently taking or taken in the past, tests to insurance information... you have any or all of yours or a family member's information when you need it.

name: My Medical
title: I feel so much safer
text: Great App, lots of good features. Easy to use. With having personal medical problems, I feel safer knowing that my medical information is available if needed in emergency. I go no where with out my I Phone.  To me it a digital medical alert. Well worth the price.

name: My Medical
title: Nurse
text: I like the new change except for the medication part.  When putting in a new med you get the option to choose in their library. The meds listed are more related to the hospital and not home use. Otherwise I haven't had the problems others have listed.

name: My Medical
title: A must have app!
text: Absolutely wonderful app. Well thought out. Very specific and very, very detailed. Every single feature has been used for everyone of our family members leaving no room for error. Kiddos to the masterminds behind this app.

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic
text: Wonderful for keeping and maintaining medical info that one needs but doesn't have memorized due to infrequent use. Definitely will come in handy when I need to fill forms or even sending a copy of inputted records to my doctors. Highly recommend this app to anyone!!!

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: This app has already been very helpful. I have recommended it to family and friends. It is easy to use and stores all of my medical information. The only suggestion is that a field for bifocal addition is needed in the eye section.

name: My Medical
title: Very Helpful
text:
This is a great app - I'm able to keep track of medicines in order to answer questions at the dentist, eye doctor and physician. I'm able to keep track of appointments and sync those appointments in the app with the calendar on my ipod touch.

Thanks for the great app!

name: My Medical
title: Caregiver
text: I've been using My Medical for only a couple weeks but I really like it - it's easy to use & holds a lot of info.  It's been really helpful in keeping my mom's stuff organized.  It's increasingly difficult to remember her visits, meds, etc but not anymore!

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful App
text: Use it all the time!  Highly recommend.  Had a problem with phone and lost all info, but worked with tech to restore that and other apps with same loss and voila, I have my info from a backup!

name: My Medical
title: Two thumbs up!
text: Absolutely love this app. Well worth the $$$. Would recommend this to everyone. Very easy to use. It would be great medical personnel and police knew to look for this info especially for people who do not wear a medical alert tag. No complaints whatsoever!

name: My Medical
title: Exceptional!
text: My wife and I have used nearly every one of the many features of this app for 18 months with ease and much satisfaction. This is one of the best of more than 150 of my apps! User support, rarely needed, has been most responsive and personable.

name: My Medical
title: Best app ever!!!
text: I love this app. It stores all my info in one place. It makes it so easy. Plus I can copy it all and hand to a dr. Or nurse. It may take a bit to enter if you have a complex history. I'm told all the time what a great historian I am due to this app. Check it out

name: My Medical
title: Good app
text: Love all of the features this app has.  Different profiles for different members of the family, very easy to keep everything separated.  Then only issue I have right now is it doesn't post appointments to my calendar.  Please fix would be great if you would.  Thanks

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic
text: We have a son with many medical conditions and disabilities. This is a wonderful way to keep everything organized and up to date. Very nicely done!  Thank you for making my life easier.

name: My Medical
title: A Must Have!
text: This app is great--a must have. Very complete options for record keeping. My doctor was impressed. Has been extremely helpful in filling out forms and answering questions on several occasions. The best I've found!

name: My Medical
title: Very useful
text: I just finished seeing multiple Doctors , for multiple reasons. I wish I had had this app then. It takes some time to get it all down right , but once it's down it's down. I highly reccomend this app.

name: My Medical
title: Mostly good
text: It keeps all of the data I need to reference - I just wish the list views tended to provide a more condensed, quick view - like you'd expect from a list. Otherwise, it's been rock solid. I can't tell you how often I've had this open at doctor's appointments.

name: My Medical
title: Great Database
text: Being a data processing professional I am impressed with the robustness of this app.  I have been looking for a good app to store all of our medical records and have tried many but none has come close to what this app can do.

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic
text: This app is so great!  I've been trying to fully digitize my records for the past year but haven't found a format that I liked. The only thing I wish that it had is graphing of custom labs.  Definitely worth the $2!

name: My Medical
title: My Medical by Hyrax
text: The best and most comprehensive database for tracking doctors, appointments, meds, procedures. However, entering data is difficult. You must remember to go back to original My Data screen before adding any additional doctor, med, etc. or it closes down. Very annoying. But first decent medical data app since my Treo days.

name: My Medical
title: Get this !!!
text: This app has made my life so much easier. I used to carry around binders for each family member with all their medical info. Now, it is all in one place and I can access it all in one click!

name: My Medical
title: This is a must have app!
text:
I use on both iPhone & iPad and am anxiously waiting for a mac app.
It's clean & easy to use. Love that I can  use filters to create a report & then email it (great for getting a new doctor up to speed).

name: My Medical
title: Extremely useful
text: Must have app! I bought the iPhone, the iPad, and Mac version. Automatically sync feature between device is being added as the developer emailed me. Will be a greater app.

name: My Medical
title: A must
text: I wish I had this app when I was taking care of our parents.  How many times did I have to tell a new Dr. what the meds were!   It us also great to have the info about your children.

name: My Medical
title: Medical app review
text: Good application. Needs to make co-pay information larger since there's alot of copay information that need to be entered. Other than that it's a good app to have.  When your filling out Doctors questionaires this really comes in handy.

name: My Medical
title: Great Medical History App
text: Great app that is easy to use and let's you capture multiple histories for family members. Wish there was a medical database in the app for looking up meds, drug interactions, common tests and procedures. But overall a good app for having key medical info stored for your family.

name: My Medical
title: App user
text: I am 68 with a thick medical folder. This program is perfect in keeping all your information at your fingertips. Very user friendly with great responsive support.  At .99 cents this is a steal!!  Buy it, you won't regret it.

name: My Medical
title: Love this app, just one request
text: I'd love to have the option to add a family pet or pets. Also it would be nice to have the option to select family position (mom, dad, half sister, etc). Additionally if I were caring for a parent, it would be nice to add them in as well.

name: My Medical
title: Just what I was looking for!!
text: Beautiful app! Extremely well designed and easy to use. Would be perfect if you could add custom fields to the various input screens, especially insurance. At minimum there should be a notes field on every input screen.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical crashed right after I installed an update...
text:
I LOVE MyMedical. However, after the latest update, I can only get to the summary screen and the text list of what I entered. I can't get to my
data to email my prescription drug list to myself for my doctor visits!  I tried a re-sync of the iPhone, that didn't fix it. Next step?

name: My Medical
title: Great application
text: This app is worth every penny. The older I get the harder it is to remember things. This makes it so much easier by having all you med. Info at your fingertips. Thanks for such a great product!

name: My Medical
title: One of my must have apps
text: I don't know what I did before this app! I keep track of all our medical information in one place. No more guessing when, where or what we did medically.

name: My Medical
title: Finally!!
text:
I love this app!  Not only has it met my expectations but it has far surpassed them!  

FYI - most of the categories are customizable. Just have to take the time to get to know it and understand how to use it.

name: My Medical
title: My Medical is a GREAT application
text: It meets all my needs including exportation. When Apple's OS 4 broke the application, the developer responded to me within HOURS and was able to fix the issue within just 2 days. Great response time. Thanks!

name: My Medical
title: Love this app!
text: Wish I had thought of this! I've been wanting to organize my med info for years, but didn't want paper. This provides portability, convenience, and graphs lab results. Thnk you thank you

name: My Medical
title: I am terribly upset about this app
text: This has been a great app - it  hs everything I could possibly need.  it has always used iCloud as  backup but now they are changing to Dropbox..  well, Dropbox will not accept my password although it is totally accurate.  So if i update I will lose 50 years of info I have entered.  I also los it on a previous update.

name: My Medical
title: Love this app
text:
Loving this app since 2010. Put it on iPad 2011& still loving it. However, it wouldn't
run on iPad after last update. The wonderful folks at Support got it running same day I e-mailed them for help.  Works great & loving it again.

name: My Medical
title: Was Great until the last Version change
text: Was great until the latest version to support OS 6. Now it has issues with iCloud storage with duplicate files. Finally had to turn off iCloud access, and yes forget about their support. They must of worked for Microsoft at one time. By the way their iPad version is terrible. They made it more complicated to use and it is different from the iPhone version.

name: My Medical
title: Great app. Important medical info all in one place.
text: I think this is a great app. Having the ability to maintain complete medical information in one place, especially when traveling, is invaluable.  Thanks!

name: My Medical
title: Fantastic!!!!!
text: I have tried a bunch of these looking to replace an app on my palm that kept track of so much data and none came close-but this one finally does!!!! Invaluable at a doctors office filling out forms!! Thank you!!!

name: My Medical
title: Continues to crash
text: Even with this recent update, as soon as I enable iCloud sync and try to synchronize my data, it repeatedly crashes. Won't stay up for more than 5 seconds without crashing. I refuse to hunt down and enter again all the data for all my kids, wife and self; at least not in this unreliable app. If a new version isn't released soon with a fix, I'll delete this app.

name: My Medical
title: Too redundant
text: The idea behind this app is great, however I find myself entering the same information several times due to the layout.  Why do you need three areas to record medication?  Medications, prescriptions and past meds should be combined into one.  Also should diagnoses and injury/illness.  Also, I attempted to use the website form and it did not work.

name: My Medical
title: Med records
text: Very nice & worth the fee. Only suggestion is it needs a PC compatible version. Most of of my current records are on my PC. Would make entering info much easier. Only had for 2 days but look like it going to be a great addition to my phone.

name: My Medical
title: Great app but Needs some Improvement
text:
A great & detailed app. However 1 area that needs improvement is Test Results. Should have CBC & Chem7 available & all Test Results should be visible for a date at the same time...the way one gets from the lab. Another app (not as good as this one) does that, & it also repopulates with normal limits. Then it'll b 5 
Added 1/6/12: after latest Update, CRASHES on opening. Has become useless. Reduced to 1 star.

name: My Medical
title: Good
text: Good...but needs improvement. Max and mins should show up on graphs. Test that are done frequently like blood pressure need to be accessible on first page. More direct entry is needed for HDL, LDL, Ratios, etc. Add immunization and medical tests recommendations with due dates by gender. Also add PSA testing for men and other special female testing needs.

name: My Medical
title: Best app ever
text: This program has made it so much easier to keep everything about my husband and 5 kids in order and always at my fingertips

name: My Medical
title: Get this App
text: As a Nurse and former Paramedic, i can tell you no one expects an Emergency and when it does their memories turn to Jell-O.  This App has the ability to provide your important medical history that could save your life.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: Fantastic personal health record app.  Has an incredible amount of features - most of which I will never use.  Very well done, and the developer is constantly updating.  Bravo!

name: My Medical
title: littleNuz
text: I just started using the app and so far so good! I'm a nurse so I know how important it is to have all of this information readily available. I'm just wondering if there is a way to simply put the year of a sugery/test/procedure if you do not remember the exact date??

name: My Medical
title: Tech support
text: My wife and I both us the app and have been very happy with it but recently my wife's copy of the app locked up - will not accept any entry. We have sent numerous help requests over last three weeks via their website but no response. So now our medical data is locked in the ether. Mymedical does not provide chat or phone contact info so future buyers and current users beware.

name: My Medical
title: Great app!
text: This app met my requirements for making it easy to enter and organize data, do trending on test results, share information with providers, and at the same time keep private anything you want protected. Seems very stable.

name: My Medical
title: RPh
text: Had been looking for a good medical record app and finally found it. Great features and easy to use. Pulls from calendar, contacts, photos, and is comprehensive.  Will recommend it to clients!

name: My Medical
title: Crashes
text: I really like using this app it keeps on my medical records in place but lately it's been crashing every time I try to take a photo and save it and whatever I typed Does not save. Please fix I really enjoy using this app. I'll give it ⭐⭐⭐stars and when you fix it I'll give you ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: My Medical
title: My Medical
text: This app is soooo worth the cost. It takes some time to input everything but once it is there it is great!  Everyone should have this app. Thank you for making it !!!

name: My Medical
title: Good App, Lousy customer service
text: The app is well thought out and works very well including excellent coordination between devices. The negative is very serious. Forget trying to use the email support button on the application. After 4 days, I gave up waiting for the reply.

name: My Medical
title: Should have read the review first.
text: I really cannot rate this one higher or lower.  I should have read that your medical provider is a member or you cannot access your records nor can you just use the program to list your medications.  Unfortunately not a good app for me.

name: My Medical
title: Lost in space
text: The system was working great then three days ago nothing. I can't log into my information. When I try to get in, the site just closes. I sent help reports to the application website but have not heard from them. All my medical information for the past year is gone. I can understand problems happen but to not respond to request for help is not expectable.

name: My Medical
title: Looks promising
text:
Needed an app to keep track of medical info, and this looks simplified, direct-to-the-point and well thought-out. Rated it 4 stars because of two things:

1. There is no sorting function for the main page for the person. I'd like to put physicians before past medications, for example. 

2. One can only synchronize appointments with calendar; it would be nice if we had options to sync with other organizing apps (in my case, it's 2Do). 

Hint, hint app creator! We need these updates stat! Otherwise, a great app!

name: My Medical
title: Love it
text:
Love the app for keeping track of your parents and your kids. 
Only one suggestion,  wish you could add what doctor put patient on the medication & what it is supposed to be for.  Hopefully. They will keep improving.

name: My Medical
title: Nice basic app
text: Good for the basics but would like to see labs broken down into at least the more common ones done. Also a reminder system built in as to when you're due again for a lab or appt would be nice!

name: My Medical
title: Great PHR Application
text: I looked at every PHR app available for the iPhone, most of them more expensive than this one.  My Medical records everything I need and more.  I highly recommend this for anyone.

name: My Medical
title: Really Nice
text: Overall it's a nice app, I actually use it for my dogs since I can't find a decent medical app for them. With that said, I wish you could remove or hide certain categories but other than that, it's great.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent app to organize medical info
text: I have searched extensively to find an app that will compile test results in an orderly fashion as to not overwhelm my new doctor.  This is the only one and does an exelllent job!  Well worth the $

name: My Medical
title: Review
text: It's a very helpful and easy to use app. It's great when I go to doctors appts and need to retrieve information or to document information for tests at appts and to have the information right there with me

name: My Medical
title: Thank You!
text: I like this app very much and thank you for your time and effort in writing it.  I would like to see the medication and prescription combined.  Seems like a dupe of previously entered info.

name: My Medical
title: Worth every cent
text: Got this app after I had to call 911 for my boyfriend. It is a great app and I can tell that's it going to come in handy even at check ups. Super easy to use!!!

name: My Medical
title: Saving medication
text: I find that if I change a medication it doesn't always save it correctly. Am I doing something wrong?

name: My Medical
title: Unplazagirl
text: I have loved this program & it has been invaluable but since either the last iPhone upgrade or app update the app crashes every time I go into edit and try to add another physician

name: My Medical
title: None
text: Wonderful app!!!  Great customer service with quick response time. Definitely worth more than what is being charged.

name: My Medical
title: Great app
text: This application works great and the updates they have keep making it more user friendly! I highly recommend it!!

name: My Medical
title: Customer Service
text: The app has great possibilities. What troubles me is if a problem is encountered such as syncing not working properly and information is lost you can’t get a response from the developer. This is very frustrating. I notified the developer that I was upset with the lack of response from tech support and would write a review to warn prospective buyers. I have not heard from them. Caveat emptor!

name: My Medical
title: Works only on Mac.  No sync with IPad or IPhone
text:
Well organized and helpful program. If only it would sync with IPad or IPhone!  Company will not reply to multiple requests to fix this problem.

Look elsewhere if you want to have your medical information available with you at your doctor's office.

name: My Medical
title: Works very well with iCloud
text: I have this app on my Mac, iPad and iPhone. The sync works very well with iCloud. I would like some type of sync with my Mayo to transfer appointments, tests result and medication.

name: My Medical
title: I tell everyone about this app!
text: A great app to have if you want to keep track of medical info! Best app like this I've found, and I use it for all my family members!!

name: My Medical
title: Best App EVER!
text: I am a frequent visitor to the ER and hospital.  This app allows me to have my info instantly and the doctors and nurses love it.  I had one ER doc download it on the spot he was so impressed.  However, for it to be great you must input your info.

name: My Medical
title: Ok but-
text: This app tracks a lot of information, and that is what it's good at. Would like to see a summation of each person with their height weight etc and the export data cleaned up - just to look nicer and more appealing.

name: My Medical
title: Was wonderful, now it crashes on launch
text: This was wonderful and my doctor was impressed. Now it crashes every time I try to launch it. 10 years of info frozen in an inaccessible app. And I wasn't trying to sync across devices, just kept it on my phone. Please fix it enough that I can extract the info and I'll find something else!

name: My Medical
title: Horrible APP and NO Support
text: I purchased this app to work with the previous version.  My data would not import from iCloud and the vendor has never responded to me frequent attempts for support to correct this issue.  I do NOT RECOMMEND purchase of My Medical, since at some point all your information may not show up, and you have to resort back to all the paper copies.

name: My Medical
title: No iCloud support?!?!?
text: The only reason I bought this app is because it promised iCloud support for seamless integration between all of my devices that is secure and that I don't have to think about. Yet every release you force your users off of iCloud and onto Dropbox. I don't want to have to use a third party app for syncing!!! Please get your act together and figure out iCloud support as promised!!

name: My Medical
title: Worth every penny!!
text: This is the medical history app you've been looking for. I can't think of anything it lacks. You guys did a great job on this app. Thank you!

name: My Medical
title: Greatest Medical App!!!!
text: Thank you so much for developing this app!!!! I feel so much better having this on my iPhone with me at all times. So convient & so easy to use. I recommend this app for anyone!!!!

name: My Medical
title: Best app out there
text: Intuitive and easy to use. Have used it for a year while tracking a chronic illness. Love that I can email my records to my doctor.

name: My Medical
title: Suggestion
text: So far, I think this app will be a great addition to my iPhone. However, since I will be using it mainly to keep track of my little ones, I would love to see a growth chart added!

name: My Medical
title: Awesome app
text: One awesome app. I love logging in my medical test and seeing the graphs. Did show my doc this, and even had  e-mailed him some of the test graphs. Easy to use. Even keeps tract of doc appointments.  One awesome app

name: My Medical
title: Keeps crashing / no info!
text: I purchased this a few years ago and haven't opened it in a while. While never perfect, it worked well for the most part. Now I can't even access any of my info. The only options are Settings and Help. And that's when it doesn't crash on me. Which it seems to do w/in 15 sec every time I try it.

name: My Medical
title: My medical
text: I just love this app. Perfect if your taking care of a older mother or father just take to the doctors with you and you will have all the needed information

name: My Medical
title: Great app for my medical info
text: One suggestion is to add another category for over the counter meds/ products.  Then it would be perfect to add non RX medicines and personal care products.

name: My Medical
title: None
text: I do appreciate this must have app!  Two things I would add - appointments, or the ability to work with existing calendar and the option of including heart rate with BP.  Looking forward to updates!

name: My Medical
title: Great app, better than the paper I carried
text: Good app to store info. Would like to be able to scan prescriptions to add, and have it pull in side effects. Other than those suggestions very good!

name: My Medical
title: Great App
text: This is the best App for keeping track of ALL medical information. Only wish you could print all the information.

name: My Medical
title: Very satisfied
text: Keeps everything organized. The perfect app to keep track of all your vital statistics and your kids and families!! Secured with Touch ID too!!!

name: My Medical
title: AMAZING Lifesaver
text:
I have used this app since its release because of my health issues.  I am a disabled veteran and have many health issues that would be a nightmare to track if not for this app.  I am able to schedule all of my Dr. Appts, Lab Appts and keep track of everything.  I also have to track 11 prescriptions plus those that I have been removed from and thanks to this app, I just email a list to the Dr. before each appt.  I am also able to keep all of my blood work and keep track of improvements and failures on the heart disease side of life.

One of the other great aspects to this app is that it is very easy to enter data and then back it up straight to my own email.  My info stays with me and is not stored with someone else in the world...THANKS GUYS!!!  Once backed up in multiple places/ways...it is easliy recoverable and puts me right back to where I was.  Customer Service is OUTSTANDING...a reply to any email happens in less then 2 hours based on my multiple questions/issues over the years.  I have ALWAYS had my question or issue resolved usually within the same day!

Lastly I would recommend two things...Change the App Icon...it is ugly and does not draw attention to medical personnel that there is important info available in a medical emergency.  The current icon makes it look like a "To Do" / "Task" List and not a medical information app.  I would also recommend that if a person where in a medical emergency situation that they could open the app, hit a button that would dial 911 and provide a gps location to the dispatcher.  In this way, the app would be open and if the patient became unconsious then rescue would be on the way and the app would already be open when they arrived.

Otherwise, I HIGHLY recommend this app and will change my 4 stars to 5 when/if my recommendations are added.  Great App Guys!!!

name: My Medical
title: Good for Meds
text:
Keeping track of all your medical information as you get older is tedious and hard work.  If you enjoy that hard work, this app can help you, as it will lose your information on a regular basis, and you will have to re-enter it over and over.  Customer Service has informed me that this doesn't happen, it must be something I am doing wrong. Maybe.

If you have family members you can add their info as well, by making multiple profiles.   You can email yourself a back up.  You can also email a copy of the date you have enter so you can print it out for your doctor, which is very handy.    

A new feature in this version is iCloud; There is basically no help on this, the help is basic and only  shows you how to turn it on, it has no troubleshooting on how to get it to sync, when it will not sync; and customer service will not help unless you can pin point your question on how it's not working or not sync'n.  My Medical has a web site you can visit, has forms and a help page.

Entering medical information on the My Medical app can be done with your computer,  but can not be edited on your computer.  (so you will need to start over each time)

Lab Tests & Procedures-This feature is particularly un-helpful.  I have not found any doctor office that transfers this info like x-rays or labs.  You must have them and enter them yourself.   So If you do not save copies of medical info from various doctors, you will  not have the info to put in My Medical app.  

I give this app 2 stars only because I can easily find the medicines I take, and it helps me remember them at the doctors office when I'm filling out forms.

name: My Medical
title: Good, but could be much better
text:
Hope the developers read this. 

I have been looking like an app like this for a while, and although I was hesitant to purchase an app I couldn't try for free first I went ahead and purchased it.

The good it does what it says. What could be better?

Here's my suggestions:
Medications - many apps will let you pick from a list, which includes interactions, side effects, pill identification marks & even pictures. With this app you have to type in all the info yourself, no additional drug info, and you have to find & save (or take a picture of the pill) and add it yourself.

Vaccinations:
Everytime you add a vaccination the app adds a block. It would be better to have one block per vaccination, that shows the latest record & when you click on the box it opens to records for that vaccine, ie 1 box for polio, not 5.

Tests: would like to be able to add individual portions of tests & select which ones to compare ie WBC, without having to uncheck all the filters, only way to currently do this is enter it separately. This would also help when a dr only runs a portion of the test. For example glucose is included in CMP, but when dr only ran glucose, if i only entered it as glucose, it won't show up in the chart.

Switch to number pad option for entering blood work test results, also no need to open in a new window, just makes entering data slower.

Don't need to be able to see all results when I open window, CBC boxes are long and takes a while to scroll through info. Try accordion style.

Also, there is no way to put in a reference range in on blood work, which would be helpful.

A few final suggestions: add ER visits, not the same as hospitalizations; add selection tool for surgeries, why do I need a box to type in tonsillectomy; lab tests & imaging should be separated, also add facility location option for labs and imaging, blood work ran in ER may be ran by a different lab than a doctors office & X-rays & scans may be done by someone outside your PCP.

That's all for now, I will re-evaluate as the app is updated.

2. It would be nice to have a customized button in each section to have a field heading I can add to section without using notes all the time. It really can use something like that. Sometimes notes isn’t a good place to put that info. 

Besides my suggestions. I use this app all the time. I highly recommend it! I’ve been using it for two years and the missing pharmacy section is my only complaint.The other is a suggestion. It’s  been a useful app and I refer to it several times a week. Very helpful app!  Highly recommend it!
Gene

name: My Medical
title: Dropbox Sync No Longer Works
text: Add me to the list of people who are looking elsewhere for a replacement app.  Dropbox Sync no longer works, and that is essential for my wife and I keeping our medical records updated across 4 devices (iPad and iPhone for each).

name: My Medical
title: Great App and Great Support.  Update: BEEN ABANDONED!
text:
This is a Great app. I have contacted Steve, the seller and I received  a response in less than 24 hours. Now that is Great support !! I have had several doctors comment on this app saying " Thats a Cool App" and they love the print out of all my medical history. With all the updates this app just keeps getting better and better. You can't beat the price of this app either.

Update: 08/18/2016
I have email the developer twice in the last week. 
I think this app has been ABANDONED by the developer..  It's such a shame..
Apple should do something about this, you pay for an app and then the developer either abandoned it or fines a new way to get more money out of you.. I don't mind paying for good apps, but ......getting rip off is a b......

name: My Medical
title: WTH?
text:
I had this loaded up w/ tons of data and now it's all gone. (With one of the updates.) 
What good is the ability to transfer your data if it's all deleted?

name: My Medical
title: Detailed records + pics!
text:
I've been looking for a way to add photos of each individual pill to correspond to the large list of medications I keep track of for my lovely 82 year old Mother and this App was the answer. She knows her pills well, but as the years come, I needed a visual record. 
I looked for the past week at all other Apps both free and for purchase. I read the reviews. I even downloaded some free ones to try. None compared to My Medical. I just finished entering the list online and emailed it to myself. Worked GREAT! My list was long, 45min, so this feature was also an influential factor. 
I'm happy to recommend this to anyone and thank you for a well thought out and constructed iPhone App. Well worth it!

name: My Medical
title: Great App I Would Recommend
text: I am currently caring for an elderly mother and uncle.  It is great to have a list of medication and health history for them. I love that you can have multiple people listed. It makes filling paperwork at the Dr.'s office so much easier and to have all this information at your finger tips in an emergency.

name: My Medical
title: Wow.  Excellent app.
text:
This is quite an app.  Very much worth the $3.  I'm impressed to see that most of the suggestions in older reviews have already been implemented in the app.  For the people who couldn't get password protection to switch on: I had to restart my phone, but then it worked fine from then on. 

I have one suggestion for now.  The app is mostly great with merging in new data you enter using the website, but there is a problem with resolving conflicts.  If you happened to slightly change an entry both on your phone and in the web interface, the app doesn't let you know, or prompt you to resolve the conflict, it just creates two records that are slightly different.  It can get extremely annoying trying to pick out the correct details manually from multiple records.  Small issue in an otherwise fantastic and clearly well-supported app.

name: My Medical
title: Must have Medical app.
text: I was diagnosed with multiple tumor sites last Summer, been to a mired of Drs. since. Great for keeping track of all the appointments, tests,  and results.  Only gripe I have is some Drs. won't let you E-mail to them.

name: My Medical
title: Very Helpful App. ...really saved my but!!!!
text:
Luckily I got this app about a month before I knew how much I was going to need it! I entered all the info, which was a bit of a major pain, and about two weeks later, I was admitted to the emergency room with an infection. 

This app was an absolute "God Send" The ER staff had all my Med list, my Primary Care MD, all my insurance info, everything they needed! Since then I've used it a dozen more times when I've gone to my eye doctor's office, or to verify prescriptions, at the drug store!

I'd highly recommend this app! You can keep not only your records, but spouses, parents , and kids records as well, including Meds,  Doctors , and contact/allergy info, ...basically anything you can think of!

name: My Medical
title: Great buy
text: Please add an alarm feature for meds to be taken, ability to organize the ranking of the users on the main screen and more themes too. Thank you

name: My Medical
title: Best medical records app
text: This is the best and most comprehensive personal records iPhone app!  The interface is attractive, yet user-friendly and logical.  Entering and editing data are easy. I also love the iPad version and how it resembles a medical chart folder!  My only suggestion would be to have a desktop version.

name: My Medical
title: Awesome
text: I love this app. It helps me keep everyones medical information straight.

name: My Medical
title: Updated super fast
text: iOS 4 update caused a problem but was immediately fixed.  App is great for keeping everyone's info together and ready to use.  One of my most used apps.

name: My Medical
title: What happened?
text: Used to be great, but all the sudden all of my data got erased and it says it can't load. Try to create new profile and whole program crashes!!! What's going on? Please fix

name: My Medical
title: Mr.
text: Unstable app. You  will lose data and it has never been able to sync. I've used IOS 7 and 8 as well as iCloud (earlier) and Dropbox. It will not sync!

name: My Medical
title: Lost all my data
text: I turned on Dropbox and the app ended up creating 4 records with duplicated data.  And then 4 without any data but my pass code saved.  Unfortunately I had just entered a significant amount of data and hadn't backed it up.   It was hard to enter a lot of data, the user interface isn't really designed for iPhone or iPad  well.  It's more of a MacBook app I think.  I won't be keeping data there anymore. Excel is better.

name: My Medical
title: IOS 7 Update Nicely Done
text:
After Google Health shut down I had to scramble to find a replacement. I’ve been using this app for about a year now and it does a great job helping me keep track of my medical related activities. It is very comprehensive and organized. I am able to document everything. 

I have tried several medical apps since Google Health and I have finally settled on this one as it is the best. 

The IOS 7 update makes it very pleasing on ones eyes.

name: My Medical
title: Won't work after iOS 7 update
text: Used this exclusively for last 2+ years for family if six. After iOS 7, all data has been lost, app continuously crashes, and won't even stay open long enough to email their support link.

name: My Medical
title: Great App, but Crashes
text:
I've used this app for some time, and was impressed with its comprehensiveness. However, since the iOS7 upgrade, the app crashes constantly, rendering it useless to me.
I love this app: I hope they fix it soon.

name: My Medical
title: Excellent as Before
text: When I first downloaded the update for iOS7, had several problems with crashing or even finding my info. Since last fix, everything seems to be as good as ever.

name: My Medical
title: After IOS 7 crashes
text: Before the upgrade I rely on this app for my medical needs. After iOS 7 upgrade, it just opens and immediately closes.

name: My Medical
title: Was great - now awful
text: This was a great app that I relied on. I had all of the family's medical information on the app and for two years it was brilliant. Now, perhaps after iOS 7 all the data is gone and the app continuously crashes. Too bad it was a five star app.

name: My Medical
title: Outstanding
text: Outstanding app--best of its kind. Icon's glint needs to be removed for compliance with iOS7. UI could also use a bit of updating.

name: My Medical
title: This is AMAZING!!!
text:
I use this app for Grandparents and my self. I love the fact that it synchronizes thru iCloud! So if I forget my MacBook at home, or if I forgot to charge my iPad, I know that all my information has synchronizes thru iCloud just like my contacts, calendars, an reminders right on my iPhone. Sad to say I don't love having to pay almost $30 to get all My Medical App (My Medical for MacBook Pro - $21.19 w/ tax) (My Medical for iPad - $4.23 w/ tax) (My Medical for iPhone - $4.23 w/ tax)
Don't get me wrong, the $30 was worth it but it still is a bite on the expensive side.

name: My Medical
title: Windows
text: I have the IPad and IPhone version.When will there be a Windows desktop version?

name: My Medical
title: Lost everything
text: I woke up this morning went into the app.I lost everything nothing there now.You know how long it took to put all that information in? I would give the app - if I could.

name: My Medical
title: The BEST
text: This is the best medical information keeper in the app store. All your info is in one place, makes filling out the forms for your first Dr appointment a snap, no more guessing about dates, procedures, medications. Heck just send it via email!! Thanks for  a great app.

name: My Medical
title: Wonderful
text: I love keeping my doctors' contact info, kids' immunization records, and family medical history all in one place.  Plus all our medications, procedures, hospitilizations, etc. etc. etc.  It is great that you can enter your data through the website and send it to your iphone for immediate input.  I also got a comprehensive, super-fast response to my e-mail question.

name: My Medical
title: totally cool!
text: SOOO easy to enter info from your computer and send it to your iPod (or whatever) via email. Easy to update. Endless number of entries for medications, doctors, etc. Could do without the automatic calendar to enter a date. Tried a few other similar apps and they weren't anywhere near as comprehensive or flexible, or easy to use.

name: My Medical
title: Great app!
text: I love this app. I wish I had known about it sooner. I have a heart problem so I need to let my drs know of myedications, allergies and so forth. I tried to make my own but this is much better and I can read it as a text and even send it to e-mail. I can also print it and have it in my purse at all times.  So it's worth the small amount I paid.

name: My Medical
title: Not able to import data
text: I purchased this application, because it reportedly had the capability of entering data on a website and then the ability to import the data entered through an email sent to my iPhone. I entered data and requested that an email be sent to 2 different email addresses. The first email address I tried to send it to didn't receive the email at all. The second one went into my spam folder (a day later), but when I tried following the directions to get the data imported, I was not able to. I sent an email to the developer asking for help, but never got a response. I am disappointed.

name: My Medical
title: MD
text: A complete disappointment. Simply a word document with broad categories and no defined structure that would be acceptable ti any clinician.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Easy Format
text: I have had quite a few medical procedures nice 10 years. Over and over I have had to complete doctors with my medical history. This new application everything I had done and I can just print out and hand it to my doctors.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Can't Access My New Account!
text: I just created an account but when I tried to sign in it wouldn't let me.  Just like another reviewer I even hit "forgot password" even though I didn't.  The site said it would send me an email immediately but lo and behold, NO EMAIL!  Now, I've waited five minutes, gone back to my email and found two new ones; one from Nordstrom and the other from The Outlet.  I will not be using this app so will go ahead and delete it.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: History I
text: Excellent, safe place to keep medical records and very convenient to have them at hand and ready instead of digging through files.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Healthspek Aug2013
text:
I've always wanted to keep my own medical information in one place and have easy access whenever I need it.  Presto!  Healthspek came along with the answer.  While keying in relevant stats one becomes more aware of the necessity to know all meds, the dosages, the duration of and why they're taken; to be aware of all medical procedures, and their dates and also know ones family members medical history.  Healthspek is on the money.  This app takes into account all the questions a person is likely to be asked at a health care facility.  Features of conversion of info into a .pdf file are brilliant, as is the assignment of an I.D. that a physician can be given and have instant access to review information.  One biggie, the App is VERY user-friendly.
Persons living outside the USA may use this with ease.  I love it.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: The best and most practical app for the iPad
text: I have recommended this app to anyone who will listen. I am an iPad trainer and this is the first app I demo. I also show it off at each of my doctor appointments, and they are amazed when they print out all my medical history at the office. I have been suggesting that the doctors office recommend its to all of their patients. Instead of seeing " I take 2 blue pills in the morning" on the doctors forms the will have a print out of all their meds spelled correctly and with the correct amount. I have suggested that they add the ability to add lab reports. It is coming they said. Everyone with an iPad should use this app and it will be available on the iPhone.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Indispensable!
text: Keep up-to-date on iPad and fire up app on iPhone when at doctor's appointment to answer any questions about past treatments from years ago that one would never remember. I simply hand over phone after switching to record mode and, voila! Doc can scroll through all vaccinations, surgeries, and other sundry entries. This app is simply a must. I set up a file for my daughter as well. She was always calling me with questions; not any more. Thanks HealthSpek.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Most complete available!
text:
I have been looking for a long time for something to track health information for my family. My wife has so many issues, medications, allergies, etc., I have lost track. I resorted to Word documents which still wasn't ideal. 

Not only is this app well designed for tracking family health information, the companion iPhone viewer app will come in handy the next time we visit an ER. 

Give it a try today. You will be very pleased!

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Not great
text: Seems like it will work ok but i'm having issues with it while trying to enter my info. When entering family history info it keeps crashing and making me loose some of the info i just entered. Also there doesn't seem to be a way to format the family history info. I try to make a new line for different info like each condition but after i save it and go to another page then come back everything is once again on one line which makes it very difficult to read. Please fix.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Excellent App!
text:
I have quite a few meds to keep track of and I love that I simply push a button to fax my refill for each medication to my pharmacy! There is a visual tracker and I feel like I am more up to date with my meds than I ever was without this app.
I take it with me to all my doctor appointments when I need to go through all my medications.  It has been helpful to me in so many ways!

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Great App!
text: This is a well written app that allows you to control your medical record and be in charge of your health.  The app allows you to give access to anyone needing your medical record.  Whether its a visit to the emergency room or to a new allergy doctor you can be assured that they will have your most up to date healthcare record. Love it!  And I love that I can request refills from Walgreens!  Nice that I can add my husbands info and link to mine.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Need More Features
text: Great app but removed it.  Need more labs integrated like CBC panel, to manually add then have to put in results for all the readings in notes section would be too daunting.  Would like ability to add own attachments, not just request from dr which is a major nice thing to have.  Emailed myself PDF file of years of lab results but couldn't view the file within the app.  It's a great start on the app, has what most don't, but missing too much for me to manually redo everything I already have in place in another app.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Awesome
text: I have been using this app now for about 2 months.  It is all I need.  I keep records for my elderly mother who has a LOT of meds and goes to the doctor frequently.  This app has it all.  In addition, the developers are working to make it better using consumer comments and suggestions.  I highly recommend it for anyone who has more than themselves to keep up with.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: The future of health care.
text: This app is exactly what the health care industry has been missing. Ease of use, consolidation of records and the ability to continually grow as the industry changes. I can already see many ways that the average person can benefit from such a well developed tool. Very well done, Healthspek. Looking forward to using the app and watching it help transform modern medicine.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Amazing App!
text: This is an amazing app...used for storing all medical information for all family members.  It also has medicine reminders and tons of other features.  I emailed their support about my personal information safety and he responded within hours.  I'm confident now after more research that this is a secure and amazing app and I'm looking forward to more updates!!

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Great App!
text: Healthspek is a great tool for easily managing you and your family's medical information. It's easy to sign up and install, and has a very intuitive interface for simple navigation. I recommend this app to anyone looking to streamline and better manage all aspects of their personal health.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Yes!
text: Love this app and I would highly recommend it.  I'm able to keep all medical records for me, my husband, and my 2 daughters in one spot.  This app is easy to navigate.  I got the medical carrying card as well- I love that in an emergency, I have crucial information with me- and any doc can access my records immediately.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Found it!
text: Ever searching.  Finally.   Been looking for a while for an app that helps with my records. Syncing seems to be an issue with some other records. Healthspeck has no issue with it. Plus, so far it is the easiest to use of the ones I've used.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Easy to use
text: The ease of use on this app is great! I also love that I have all of our information at the touch of a button, and I don't have to fumble through millions of pages to find information.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Amazing
text: Amazing way to keep your medical records with you no matter how far you travel from home!  This app is one of the most useful means of Internet use to date. I love that I can update information instantly.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Information Saver
text: This is a great place to track conditions and other things relating to health.  I really like how it backs it up to a cloud so you won't lose all your info.  The formatting is very nicely laid out as well.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Great app
text: This is the best app out there for keeping track of your medical records.  I use it for my family but also for my elderly parent.  I recently found out that it will sync with my PC and iPhone.

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Love the Card!

name: Healthspek - Personal Health Record & Family Health Record - Complete Medical Record
title: Michael Reardon MD
text:
I was so pleased to find this medical app today. I love the layout, ease of use and attention to detail. It reminds me of google health which was discontinued. This app is in many ways better than google health which I felt was the best available a few years ago.
      If you use this app then please give them your input. These guys are into CQI (continuous quality improvement) and they always want to make it better.
        I love the way you can email your entire record. I can see this app allowing download of lab results etc in the future.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Useful app
text: Tired of managing your family's health data across multiple Patient Portals? Medfusion Plus pulls everything together, keeps it up-to-date automatically and puts you in charge of your data. Great app.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Fantastic find!
text: This app was so helpful for me to consolidate my family’s health records and send to our new doctors ...so many hurdles with a move to a new location, really happy to have found this helpful app to eliminate some of that burden!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Best by far
text: Before getting admitted for curing my prolonged illness, the doctors used the health data of mine from this app to exactly understand my condition. I am so happy to have this app on my phone.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Top class
text: This is a top app. The high-quality app is used to maintain and access all your family's health data in one place.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Beneficial app
text: This is a beneficial app. This awesome app can be used to maintain /access all your family's health data in one place instantly. It is a really good one and works properly.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Too good
text: This app is too good. I really enjoy using this app. The features are really classy. I would like to recommend it to all my friends and family.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Terrible App!!
text: This app is by far the worst app I’ve ever used. I was instructed to used this app prior to my appointment, supposedly to make the registration process more efficient. You can’t enter your information because it leaves out what the question is. It’s so frustrating!!!! This apps needs major work in order for it to work properly and efficiently!!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Good features
text: This app has got great features, I really like using it to create a health data record. It works smoothly.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Medical records
text: Great way to keep up with all of my records and my families

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Terrible.  A Conplete Mess
text: This app is confusion and terrible.  You need multiple user names for multiple providers.  Searching and linking a doctor doesn’t work and is a mess.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: No clue how it works!
text: It crashes every time under latest iOS on iPhone 8+. Will be deleting it.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Poor
text: App has never let me log in. You have to go to the actual patient portal on the internet. App is useless

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Hate this app
text: This app is awful. It sends me in circles to load Medfusion Plus over and over again. A waist of my time.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: App doesn’t t update after initial installation
text: Would be nice it it worked, time to uninstall

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Used to work but now worthless clutter
text: I used to love this app and found it very useful since all of my doctors and hospitals used different portals and this made it so easy to just log into one for appointments, notes and results.  Now, all of a sudden, it can’t pull anything forward from half of my portals and I’ve confirmed they have data sitting there with the same login info and no new layers of encryption.  The other half have things being pulled forward with vague info like medical appointment on such and such date at such and such time, with the main address for the facility, but no provider name to give me any clue as to who I am supposed to see or if I am supposed to be at the main location or a satellite office.  I have looked to the developers website to report these issues but find NO place to reach customer support unless you are a business affiliate.  Really poor customer service standard.  Things didn’t always work like this because I can remember specifically reporting portal issues to them in the past and receiving excellent customer service and attention to help address and correct those issues at that time within hours at that time.  I don’t know what changed or why, but shame it did because they have truly hobbled this app and made it impossible to try to get help fixing things without having to resort to leaving bad reviews in the hopes they will read and respond so you can get help and later revise the review.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Powerful App
text:
The ability to use Medfusion Plus to monitor relatives and family members (as well as your own health) in all aspects of their medical care is one of the best features of the app. In one place you can see appointments, medications, review test results etc. Multiple family members and accounts can be added making this a powerful “one stop shop” to actively take part and monitor patient care of those you care about the most. The ability to communicate securely via multiple patient portals also makes this the only app you need in regard to medical monitoring.  

Powerful beginning to a revolutionary idea.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Finally!
text: An app that truly helps a family consolidate and manage the delivery of care across their entire network of care givers.  I now have a way to check all past and future appointments, as well as previous and current medications, lab results, immunization and allergies for my entire family.  The initial setup takes a few minutes as you need to register each patient portal for your family.  But once registered, the information is automatically gathered and presented each time the app is opened.  So far so good.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Saves Lives
text:
Medfusion Plus is a life saver. A very concise and easily accessible application. Plus   displays all our medical information similar to our doctors records. Along with displaying doctor appointments from multiple physicians. I was able to speak to the support team and found them to humble and hungry to make our lives better through keeping us and our individual medical teams on the same page. 

In worst case scenarios, I now feeling confident knowing that I have all my medical information in the palm of my hand.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Awesome app!
text: To be fair, I haven't used it too much yet, but I've used it enough to know it's very good. A couple things stood out so far. It keeps you signed in, which I love, yes you can sign out, but I'm lazy and I enjoy opening the app and getting right to work. I can't speak about the benefits for casual users, but for someone like me who is very involved with his health, this app is fantastic, very easy to check your labs/appointments, medications, and probably more that I haven't got into yet.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Healthcare data right where I want it!
text: I used to keep track of all my healthcare data using an Excel spreadsheet - yeah, it was a real drag. I could never stay on top of keeping it updated with all my immunizations and lab report findings. With Medfusion Plus, all I have to do is whip out my phone, open the app, and it's all right there in front of me so I can kiss my spreadsheet goodbye! *Plus* the app keeps track of all my upcoming appointments so I won't forget. So handy!!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: I have only one complaint
text: I love this app and being able to keep all my health information easily accessible.  However, since it is my medical information, I don't understand why my doctor has to remove anything from my record on here in order for it to be correct? If anyone knows my medical information, it is me.  And I should be able to update it on my own.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Some things should never change...
text: I never leave reviews and normally never have a problem but the entire process getting this app to work was horrible. To make a long story short...it never worked for me and customer support was horrid. All I received was a wasted 20 call I made to support with fake resolutions to get me off the phone and emails from them saying my case must be resolved cause I haven't called back. Even after I emailed them back to say it wasn't! Not even bothering with this app. I'll just deal with my Drs as I have in the past.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Medfusion Plus
text: This is a great app that allows you to get your multiple "medical portals" in one location. Easy to create your accounts/link your family's accounts. This app allows you to have access to your medical information, medications & appointments. Great to have this information when traveling too!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: One place for all my health data
text:
Loved it when years of lab result history loaded and I could see trends I haven't had the data to previously see 

Easy to use and definitely start to see the potential for more that can be done with sensor and other data

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Years of numbers all right there
text: Incredibly useful for keeping track of all those lab results over time. The app went back and found all my old bloodwork labs so several years worth of info is now right at my fingertips. Very cool.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Great in theory
text: Problems with connection time while retrieving medical reports. All in one app for med notes is nice idea but still need to plug in separate passwords for each (plus the one for the app). May as well go to web site of provider for fewer problems in retrieving med data. Also navigation on iPhone does not allow me to click on icons I can see on my iPad. So I couldn't retrieve my data for one of my providers anyhow :(

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Truly Great
text: This is the best way to view all your healthcare data in one spot, period. Seeing all my labs for the past few years in one place was incredible. I've never had that view into my health data before.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Health data organized in one place
text: This app organizes all of your data from patient portals across your whole family. Support was responsive to new provider requests. It's simple and to the point. It just works.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Very easy to use
text: I was able to easily log into several of my portal accounts and Medfusion Plus magically pulled in all my health and appointment data.  Will come in handy next time I have to see a specialist.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Do NOT Download
text:
Do NOT Download this app. It is not ready for patients.

There is no way any practice using this App with Greenway EMR should be meeting Meaningful Use requirements from the government.

As a patient I have several portal apps and this is by far the worst.  I have now deleted the app for fear it does more harm than good PLUS the app is so non-functional that the staff suggest I need to log in with a full computer if I want to message my doctor.

As an EMR Professional I am scared for any providers office that uses this technology.   It DOES NOT meet Meaningful Use and the government needs to be made aware.

How anyone could write a great review WITHOUT submitting their name is ridiculous. All the positive reviews have to have been made by employees.

John G Amero

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Excellent App!
text: I loaded it last night and was grateful to have it this morning!  Went to a new doctor and handily had all my meds, vitals, even pulled up test results.  The new doc was totally impressed!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Pretty useful, but...
text: Very powerful app. I like the ability to have my medical records in my hands. But... I would like to see ability to use fingerprint security to access rather than putting in password.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Laptop or Desktop
text: This program MUST HAVE an OS version so it can be used on Apple desktops or laptops.  Many of the documents I receive are filled with information in tiny fonts, so tiny it is virtually impossible to read the data on an iPhone or iPad.  I must have a larger screen.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Finally an App that does it all!!
text:
After using Medfusion Plus a couple of weeks, I happy to see it does everything you're looking for in a app...and it's all in one place!

All my providers? Check!
Family members' provider/info? Check!
Lab results? Check!
Appointment history? Check!
Communicates with Health Kit? Check!

Looking forward to what the future holds for Plus!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Terrible App
text: Totally worthless. Can't really do much with this but see messages. Forget about reviewing lab results, takes forever to load 1000 results and have to archive each one? Who are you kidding. To make things even worse , no website portal. Recommending to my Dr to find something better.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Worst app
text:
Worst app ever.. it never updates properly with all the provider updates even after successful authentication. Logged a call twice with non responsive and useless support.

I better login to individual providers website than this app.

Worst app and non-responsive useless support I have ever seen.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Great Tool!
text: What a wonderful app and invaluable tool for managing my health, as well as that of my special needs aunt!

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Waste of Time
text: I have yet to get any information from this app or from patient portal. I have added multiple hc providers and either none download to this app or the app does'nt work. Spent all day trying to get it to work with no success.

name: Medfusion Plus

text: This app is by far the best app I’ve ever used. I was instructed to use this app prior to my appointment,

name: Medfusion Plus

name: Medfusion Plus

Update:
I am now able to log in. App is working as described.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Top class
text: This is a top app. The high-quality app is used to maintain and access all your family's health data in one place.

name: Medfusion Plus
title: Good features
