I got this app a few months ago. I love it!  With it I can email my doctor, view my lab results and reports, view my medical list and order refill, etc. All of these are at my finger tip and I do not have to go to my PC anymore. 

I recommend it to all my family members and relatives. 

For those who have issues with it, please try it again because the app improves itself constantly.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Awesome App
text: You set the bar high KP. The app works beautifully and I have better luck and better accuracy with scheduling my appointments through this than over the phone. My only addition would be to add an "other" option for the appointment reason scheduling so you can write a quick note of why you would like the appointment. Love that I can message my doctor right from my phone.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Not bad but is useless on iPad
text: This app is great as it allows me to easily email my doctor and do other simple prescription things as well as appointment scheduling.  However the app hasn't been updated for some time and is not real compatible with the iPad. The app just looks like a large portrait phone app on the iPad.  Would be nice if they did an upgrade since the resolutions of displays and devices has got so much better in recent years.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Very buggy
text:
Having a mobile app to book appointments, order medication and view lab results is very convenient. However, the Kaiser app has so many odd little quirks it's almost pointless to use the app for anything. When I try to complete basic tasks like read a message from my doctor or view my prescription the app force closes without any warning. Then I'm forced to log back into the app, thankfully the app has the finger print passcode feature enabled. Otherwise the app might be a total waste. 

Who ever over at Kaiser is working on this app is doing a really poor job at keeping up with bugs.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Finally a KP app! Love this app!
text: I love this app. It's so convenient. You can visit your message center, write to doctors and receive their responses without having to go online. You can also refill your prescriptions so easily. You choose from the list of your prescriptions, choose how you want to receive it, and choose where you want to pick it up/delivered. I've been waiting for this app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Medical  people stop complainðŸ˜¡
text: I don't know why people like to said something not true??? This app really nice and easy! Fast for looking appointment anywhere you want sand and receive massage from your dactor same time or same day so that's what we looking for. And phone call it's only taken you one minutes with customer service to respond to you and thy so nice and helpful

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Modern convenience.
text: This app makes it very convenient to make doctors appointments and communicate with your doctor very easy-to-use. The only reason I didn't give a five star rating was due to the fact it should allow you to stay signed in without having to enter my password every time  I want to use it. It's my device no one else has the password to it. why can't I be given the option to stay signed in?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app
text: I love being able to see my appointments, prescriptions and doctor emails instead of logging on to the computer. Now if only we could get shuttle bus schedules. Also it looks like only the largest kaiser facilities show up when I search for "find a location near me". Overall I find this easier to navigate than the website so I'm giving it 5 stars.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Terrible performance and other issues
text:
For Christ sake fix the performance specially on the login and checking of message or test result page.

Also I get an email in my private inbox even when I am getting an OOo from my doctor. Can you please give some snapshot of the reply in the email notification. I just spent 10 mins to get to the email reply from my doctor and found out he was OOO.

The appointment set up has very poor options. I can always get to a doctor sooner if I call and request an appointment. That's not fair. The nurses and users of the app should see the same database of appointments.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good app but some functionality issues
text: It's useful, but loading can be slow/fails often.  Sometimes when I try to email my doctor, look up my record, or look up different departments, it gets stuck and fails to load and tells me to try again/having server issues or something. If it was as smooth as the online interface I would give 5 stars.  Might want to include "about this test" for blood work results also.  Overall, ok app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Member
text: Though the app can be sluggish at times, all the info I need is at my fingertips. I just retrieved a message from my doctor during a meeting break and did not have to do the same by going to my computer. I can access my lab results and get trend graphs right on my iPhone. I have ordered refills and scheduled routine appointments from my iPhone and located closest location to where I am at due to GPS. Pretty handy app that enables more productivity...I like it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love it!
text: I just downloaded the app onto my iPhone 6+ with the latest software update for iOS 8.4. All of the features worked perfectly the first time I used it after loading it. It worked perfectly, which is more than I can say for the website - it has always kept me running me in circles and infinite  loops.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App is great resources by buggy
text: This app is a great resource and I use it frequently to communicate with my doctors and check my upcoming appointments. However, the dashboard menu doesn't refresh properly (e.g., the messages and appointments don't refresh and incorrectly show that there are no message or upcoming appointment when I know there are). The information does show correctly inside each section but the dashboard doesn't.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Needs some work...
text: I really like this app. But, I have tried to refill Rx through the mail, but when my dr has to be contacted first or my credit card # was in wrong, the order just disappears. There is no email notification that your Rx wasn't filled and that it isn't coming. It would be very helpful to get an email when the Rx has been filled and when it's been shipped and also if something goes wrong and it couldn't be filled.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Used to Work Nicely, Now Can't Login
text: This app used to offer a great way to access medical records, appointment info, lab results, etc. for myself, my husband & my elderly parents.  Unfortunately with version 2 it started saying we couldn't access any of our personal information after we had logged in. With the most recent update, it won't even let us login on any of our iPhones or iPads. The only thing that works (sort of) is the Facilities Locator and that is out of date as I found when looking for the address of the nearest emergency room a few days ago!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good but not perfect
text:
This app is quite nice. The appointment scheduler should be redesigned. They have my primary care doctor listed at all 6 locations, but the app won't let me view it in it's entirety. So often times I'm selecting the wrong one causing me to start the entire process over several times. VERY annoying. Also when it comes to selecting the kind of appointment and dates, the wording is very confusing and I end up selecting the wrong one.

Besides that, very nice app.
Thanks Kaiser

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Phenomenal
text: I love this app. It makes all of my medical needs that much easier to fulfill. I haven't had a single problem with it and I'm surprised with how well it works after seeing a handful of negative comments, but I'm glad I decided to get it. A big thank you to Kaiser Permanente for working with my needs and being so  up-to-date with new technology.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Very good design & functionality
text:
Easy to use, lots of good info at your finger tips. Accurately helped me find other KP facilities outside my normal service area. Was looking for a KP pharmacy in Pasadena. Address, directions, as well as business hrs and days open was very helpful. Easy to refill prescriptions.
But use to be able to see other family members Rxs to refill. Now have to know member number and prescription number.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good, but doesn't do some things it should do
text: While you can email your doctor with little fuss (but DO "copy" your message before trying to send, since there's a bug that might make you do over your text) and refill Rx with little trouble, DESPITE the app's description you CANNOT email other departments, like patient services or app help, from within this app. It also doesn't support "print".

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Please Integrate to HealthKit
text:
Two things:
- Integrate app to HealthKit for those who wish to get all their health data in one place
- For appointments, in case my Doctor is not available; shouldn't I be able to schedule a visit with  another one? Last time I needed to schedule a Well Baby appointment and our Pediatric Dr was not available. I believe the whole Pediatrics Dept was not closed and probably another Dr. Could've seen our baby. This goes for other departments for routine visits.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Too Complicated
text:
I have used the Kaiser app for 2 years with no problems. It was good and easy to understand.  This new revision looks really good but is difficult to use.  It took me 10 minutes to find a place to log out.  Email your doctor has been replaced by send a message.  Message and email are not the same thing. The pharmacy is good but not as easy as the last time.  I am using this app on an ipad 2.
It needs to be more intuitive.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Wanted it to work
text:
Since the kaiser web site uses flash, I really wanted this app to work. We woke up in a hotel out of town with a sick child. Trying to use the locater feature was far more challenging than it needed to be. 

For example knowing where all the lab/diagnostic offices were by default along with adult pt was really unnecessary. I think having a one click emergency/after care button based on location would be a great add. After several tries we figured out how it worked. In a concerned moment having to guess around for a location was not ideal.

Another plus with the app and the kaiser site in general would be the ability to manage your children's info under our own login. Right now this is not possible.

Lastly, any attempt to access any of my own records with the app results in an error. Looking forward to a future more thoroughly thought out version.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app
text:
This app provides an excellent history in all categories of your medical issues, your need for medication, ordering process and test results. I'm impressed and look forward to this linking with Apple's new health kit.
For all you naysayers and critics, just imagine not having this information and ability to communicate with your Kaiser Doctors, Nurses and Administrators. Kudos  KP.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Simple, Helpful, and Beautiful
text:
Everything I would ever need from the website included in a beautifully organized and designed app!

My only suggestion here (and on the website) would to add the ability to make follow-up appointments with your specialist. The only option right now is the primary care physician.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: up coming appts and message reply issue
text:
The app shows that I have no upcoming appointments, even though there are a few appointments set. However, you can see the actual appointments when you click on the appointments button. 

I received a message from my provider. However, when I tried to reply to the email, it keeps giving an error message that there was a delivery failure and message was not sent.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Appointment feature has faults
text: Wow this Kp app is not good. This is taking FOREVER to just get an appointment.  The app can show me my medical record, lab results, old doctor messages but can't provide appointment services with my MR #? That's crazy. I've been trying to get an appointment for two weeks already. It takes 3-5 days to get a message from Kp asking for information they need before making appt. It's faster to deal with appointment services via phone which is also super slow. Disappointing and frustrating.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App crashes when I try to get my ID card
text: This app crashed when I try to get my ID card. It's funny because they have these little smartphone-shaped flyers on the offices encouraging members to get the app and to put their photo on the ID card. You can't even load the ID card so putting your photo on it isn't an option. I sure do hope they fix this issue, and fast. The price is increasing by 17.6 or 17.8%. The least they could do is fix the app and lower the ridiculous prices on the over-the-counter items they sell in the pharmacy! Ridiculous!!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Crashes too often
text: We as patients are supposed to rely on this app! It crashes too often and doesn't respond quickly when buttons clicked on if it responds at all! Will just exit for no reason! How can I rely on something that doesn't work. It used to work but the last few months there have been nothing but problems with the app! Trying to get through on the phone to Kaiser is a nightmare in itself. I don't have hours to spend on hold trying to make an appointment! No I can't even count on the app to help!!!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Must have app
text:
I love this app. I can refill prescriptions and look at upcoming appointments so easily. 
I really like that you can have appointment info automatically copied and put on iCal! It saves so much time. My schedule is busy and I'm always having to go to different medical offices for different appointments. No more getting appointments and locations confused!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: A little buggy and could use more work, but still helpful
text: To start, to fix the Touch ID feature, go to your settings (on the bottom left tab) and re-enable Touch ID. That fixed it for me. Anyway more features could be used or brought to the app, such as the drug encyclopedia as well as the list of common diseases and Kaiser's methods of treating them. Otherwise the app is ok.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Crashes upon message access
text: They will need to update to ensure functionality with Apple iOS 9. Was a good app until recently. By the way, some may encounter further problems as Apple's iOS 9.0.1 just issued and many folks unable to download that version over wifi as was the case with me. Numerous complaints online about that. It all complicates the matter for app developers. Had to delete Kaiser app for now until I see newest version that is compatible with iOS 9 and above on iPhone.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy to use and fast!
text: I tried to make an appointment online at least 4 different times and it kept saying the system wasn't working. I just downloaded the app and made and appointment and refilled RX in 5 minutes! So easy and convenient. Will definitely use this rather than the website.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: SO Disappointing!
text:
I thought I finally had a convenient way to refill prescriptions and make appointments but not so with this App. I tried filling a prescription (2 nights in a row) but after entering my Visa info (& shouldn't I not have to do that since Kaiser already has my card info on file?) the app would just get stuck and leave me wondering if my script was filled. It wasn't. Now I have to call anyway. Same
Thing with Appointments. Please improve this or dump it all together so people don't get their hopes up to be able to use it. ðŸ˜•

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Pretty Good
text: Not perfect but then better than what existed before.   Needs some refinement.  Great to have access to emails, lab results and scheduling.  Having ability to access medications, medications and conditions is better than memory or a laminated card in ones wallet.  Bravo to Kaiser for setting a pace for all other providers to follow.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Bill pay
text: While I'm happy to have the bill pay option in the app, I can't actually see any of the bills that show in the bill history, and the payment history REALLY needs to show ALL payments, regardless of how they're made!  AND it would be great if you could see the detail behind the amount due -- as in what it's for. I owe an amount, but it also says I've already paid that exact amount. I can't find a bill for that amount, so I'm really confused.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Straight to the Point
text: I've never experienced the app shutting down before or after the update, but maybe it's been fixed since the past reviews. As far as having an app that's quick and easy, I really like this one. You don't really need an elaborate one for medical info/appointments.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Appointment scheduling
text: I'm unable to schedule an appointment on this app. When you select a preferred day for your appointment, it only shows availability for the next day (not your preferred day) and the option to view the next 4 available times doesn't work. Not only that, you're only given 3 seconds to book any available time! That needs to change. And if there are no available appointments on a preferred day, then a reason needs to be given.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: appointments
text: An easy, intuitive interface, but forget trying to make an appointment. After trying to make an appointment this week, for fun I just started going down everyday for three months and no appointment was available. I got on the phone and got an appointment that same afternoon with my primary care physician. Ordering refills is a breeze with this app, though I haven't tried ordering for other members of my family.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app!
text: Wow! I'm impressed. This has all the functionality that I'd want in an app and it works well. Haven't had any buggy issues and it has all the features I'd use on the web. Appointments, emailing my doctor, prescription refills, etc. easy to use and navigate. I have to admit, I'm a bit surprised how well done it is.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Could be better
text: When you receive a Secure Message from a Provider, you get an email with a KP link. When you click on the link, it opens the KP app, but it does not have the functionality to open the message itself. Rather, you get an error message, which tells you to open the full website, via your browser. Extra steps required to read your message; very clunky.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Offers all the functions I use from the regular KP site
text: I am extremely satisfied with this app. It allows me to perform all the same functions that I use from the regular KP site, including viewing my appointments, finding services, contacting my doctor, viewing test results, and more. Thank you Kaiser Permanente for creating this app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Awesome App
text:
This app is awesome. I use on my iPhone 6+ and have it set up to use my fingerprint to unlock the app. Easy to make appointments with primary care doc, order Rx refills, and email (some) doctors. 
I love it! 
People post about not being able to copy/paste password but why don't they set up and use the fingerprint feature?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Itâ€™s a great app, except for one annoyance
text:
I love this app. It does everything the website does (as far as I know), and I love being able to read messages from my doctors (I have too many at KP).

But, the password system drives me insane. I know that KP is overly concerned about privacy issues. Iâ€™m glad of that. But there has got to be a better way. I have a very complicated password for KP. I do not memorize it, because itâ€™s not memorizable (itâ€™s random letters, numbers and characters). I do this because I care about my privacy.

But Iâ€™ve got to copy the password out of 1Password then paste it into the password field of the login. And I canâ€™t do that. So, this app becomes almost useless to me. 

Furthermore, KP needs to allow either Keychain or password paste.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: A Good Start
text:
Looking forward to future enhancements that bring the app closer to what the web site provides. It's a good start and I appreciate the ongoing efforts Kaiser makes to enhance the overall online experience. 

My too enhancement requests. 

1. Make an iPad / iPhone universal version. It's not that hard and would help those of us with multiple devices and those who have iPads and no other computer. 
2. In the Contact Us or the About the App sections, provide a place for feedback and bug reports. 
3. Add a way to get to the preventive health reminders. It's the only major area that is missing in the app but present on the web site. 
4. Enhance the web site and the app to provide online access to things like outstanding lab orders.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App works great
text: You can do everything you need to on this app with no issues. View tests, request meds, make appointments, send messages. Can't see anything to complain about save the fact they took away the ability to open it using the fingerprint reader.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Needs mobile payment!!
text:
The app is clean, the interface is straight to the point, and very user friendly. There's no jibber jabber which is why I wanted to give the app 5 or 4 stars.

But the app is lacking. The app needs to give the user the ability to make their online payments for their premium. Which is why I'm giving this app a 3 for now. As soon as Kaiser steps their game up, this app will be nothing but a 5 to me!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Emailing very frustrating
text: I had to use this app to email my doctor. One email went half way written when I accidentally pressed send button. It went without one question. Another email lost when almost fully typed, when I accidentally pressed back button. Again no question asked, went to previous screen and lost the email. I do not type very fast an press the screen in wrong places by accident,   but shouldn't it be more idiot proof?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great!
text:
I'm new to Kaiser and have been very pleased with their services so far and the doctors. The web site was awesome an provided everything I needed. Only trouble was having to manually find locations and add them to my phone for directions and phone numbers. 

Enter this app! It has everything the website has and it makes it even easier to get directions to a location and also minimizes errors when entering the info into your phone. 

Couldn't be happier with this app after just 5 minutes exploring the app. What a stellar offering for a brand new offering. 

Thanks kaiser!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love it!
text: Not sure why everyone seems to have problems with this app. I haven't had any issues and honestly I love it! I can see my upcoming appointments, send a msg to my dr and  view my lab tests within a few hours of taking my tests!  I recommend this app it's easy to use and so far has worked great for me :)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Need version for iPad
text: Don't like this version. Prefer old version better. Somehow there needs to be a better app for use with ipad because fonts are just too large This version is more for the iPhone. Also, after downloading this version, the KP logo disappeared from the icon. It now is just a white square with some black lines in it. Very annoying to see that on my home screen. This needs to be fixed. Tried deleting and redownloading it, but still the same.  Will delete app until it is fixed.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy access to Kaiser
text: I like having this app on my phone to be able to order prescriptions, see messages from my doctor, send messages, etc. it works great for me, I've not had any problems. It's been especially helpful as I've gone through a recent surgery.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Was Great Until Latest Update
text: iPhone 5s and latest iOS, the app buttons are unresponsive alot of the time.  Current appointment disappeared once the start time past, it didn't even show in past appointment list.  Map and list view screen were not responding.  Maybe its my touch screen, dunno for sure but as I was searching for the Dr office number, by the time I got to my destination I gave up on the app and Googled it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: KP
text:
Liked the listing of my own prescriptions.
Didn't like the fact that there is no item for filling prescriptions for another member any more.  I used that option on 95% of my orders in the past.

I eventually discovered that I could input the other person's RX number and then was able to order for her.  It's now a hidden option.  Sloppy design!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: AWESOMEğŸ‘�â�•
text: All the functionality of "My Health Manager" in the palm of your hand. Other reviews are way too critical. This app is momentous for KP members. Schedule appointments, get lab results (even with graphs an charts), order perscriptions, access to your health record... The only feature missing is a claims viewing feature (however KP does not yet have this functionality on the web). Well done Kaiser! ğŸ‘�ğŸ�¥ğŸ�‰

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Problems??
text: I'm not having any of the logon or ordering problems mentioned in some other reviews, using the iPhone6 and version 4.9.  Also, the Touch ID is back, but must be reauthorized in the Settings within the app.  I'm sorry to hear that others have been having trouble.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Where's the ability to add a photo to the ID Card?
text: In the latest update, we were supposed to have be able to have our photo on our medical card; where's the ability to add a photo to the medical ID Card?  Nonetheless, I do like the addition of tonight ID. Please fix the problem to make it readily available and easy to add your photo ID. Thanks!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Worst App Ever
text: I've had this app for a long time and my Rx list is completely wrong and when I search for a prescription I NEED ASAP, it's "not found" which is extremely frustrating. I also can't contact my doctors when I have questions and can't find their contact info ANYWHERE. I hate this app... you would think kaiser being a prestigious company would have an amazing app that has all info available to you... But it doesn't. To me, my little cousin could do a better job at making this actually work.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This app rocks!
text: So much better than using the website. I can see my test results, schedule an appt, easily refill a prescription, and email my doctor from one single spot.  I don't have to go through a million links and I'm notified of updates, all on one page.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU!
text: I'm on the road and I remembered that I forgot to schedule a follow up appt. and refill a prescription.   I was searching to see if KP had an app and I guess it was just released.   Did both tasks with ease. Definitely beats calling it in. Very handy app and one more reason why I don't need to carry the laptop anymore. :)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easier than their website for email
text:
Emailing the doctor is fast.
4 stars because we can't upload a photo or two to attach to emails like on the website.
Easy to switch between myself and each of my 3 children to write emails, and view lab work. I have not used the appointment feature yet.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Keyboard not showing
text: Love the app but when I upgraded to iOS 10 today the keyboard doesn't show to allow me to enter my password at the login screen. I have to push 'done' on the login page and then the iOS keyboard appears. Please fix it. iPhone 6 plus

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Excellent
text: I have used this app many times. It is great to be able to use the Touch ID which makes logging in so quick and convenient. I can look at all my test results, email my doctor and refill prescriptions very easily. No problems at all!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Needs Work
text:
The app is great.  However, it also needs a lot of work as there are a couple of things that I couldn't do.  1)Making an appointment.  Others have said that they used to be able to make an appointment, but cannot anymore.  2)I can't respond to a message from one of my doctors.

Hope Kaiser makes those changes and include them in the next update.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: It's not working anymore
text: I liked the app because I was able to do so many things like see appointments and such. Now it ALWAYA gives an error saying the appointments can't be loaded and trust me I KNOW there ate appointments scheduled for me u fortunately I can't see when they are on this app. It does load past appointments but I need the coming appointments. The message section works to receive messages, haven't tried to send one yet through the app. Can you PLEASE fix the appointment section on this app and it will be worth it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Functional easy app
text: It's basic,simple, quick and has all the basic info you need. All my health records and my family's are accessible and a breeze to schedule and cancel appointments. It's also easy to send/receive messages to my doctors , lab results etc. love this app 100%

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works good but a few bugs
text: Messages are frozen and can't load.  Also can't send messages anymore.  It was working.  I even reinstalled and still the same issue.  I think it occurred when I switched the type of message from Doctor to member services.  Also Touch ID doesn't work anymore.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Convenient
text: It does everything I need and I don't have to boot up my desktop to get to it. To the one who couldn't find the online card, I just selected that icon in the upper left, with the three lines and it gave me a lot of options, one being "member ID card". Works great for me.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: User friendly but can't schedule appointments
text: This app is actually awesome if you frequently have appts and prescriptions and need phone numbers/to check messages, need directions, etc. Unfortunately the scheduling page doesn't work.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Where's the iPad app?
text: They need to make an app for the iPad. And it's annoying hen I'm trying to check if my medications have be refilled and I have to type in the RX number on the bottle every time why can't I just touch check prescription status and have it show me the status of everything I'm trying to refill for myself. Such a hassle

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Nice work
text: I do this sort of thing for a living, am a Kaiser member, and have often wondered when there would be an iOS app from Kaiser. The main thing I'd like to see in the next version is a universal app that sizes properly for iPad. This app works just fine in iPad, but only in the small iPhone screen size. For a 1.0 release, well done!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Kaiser Permanente- great Docs, service, care, app
text: Kaiser Permanente- great Docs, service, care, app. This app allows one to email Docs, schedule appointments with GP, see test recent and precious test results. Very rarely do I write reviews - KP, keep up the great works. This app saves me time, improves communication with Docs and other KP staff, and keeps me informed. Thank you.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Need work
text: I logged in and used this app several time but today it would not log me in, keep saying wrong user name or password. I know it's the weight user name and password because I can log in on my PC with no problem. Trying to figure out the problem I got my self lucked out, long story short now I have to wait 3 to 7 business days to gat my password in the mail.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Very frustrating!!!!
text: Mother of 4 with zero time to fuss with apps that continuously crash. I tried to make a child well check appt for my 4yr old and when I finally got to select my appt time, the darn app crashed 5 times, not allowing me to select my appt times. This of course moved my original appt from 4 days from now, to next month!!!!  How absurd!  I understand appts fill up quick at Kaiser, that's why I thought the ease of the app would help in that matter. Nope!!!!  Will not use this again, until it is fixed.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Appointments
text:
Used to be I could just make an appointment for both my kids no problem. Now, I just get a System Error, not able to process request for younger one. I also get this on the website.  No problem setting one for myself or my elder child.

Other than that, I like this app. RX refills, email with the Dr, and labs right there. Fix the appointment issues and it'll be fantastic.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Very easy to use
text: I never had the pre-update version, but the new version is great.  Super easy to check test results (your doctor will email you to interpret them and what they mean for you) easy to make appointments, fill prescriptions etc.  everything I need....

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love this app
text: Killer user experience. I work with several providers and health plans and this sets the bar for usability. I would like to see the password issue fixed that others have referred to, but live everything else about the new app. Kudos to kaiser for getting it right.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works great
text:
Logged in, messaged my doc, could even review past test results. Very intuitive to use. Nice work! 

One recommendation: be able to upload/attach a photo when messaging doctor. We can do it from the website but not from the app. Thanks!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app
text: I love this app makes it so easy to talk to your doctors and to check on test you have done. Get to see if your Prescriptions are due or ready for pick up. The only problem i have with the App is it signs you off if your are emailing your doctor. Needs to give you more time to write what you need to say to your doctor.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Needs a facelift...
text:
The app is good from what I can see so far...but it really needs a UI update. I mean it's 2016 now, what's the real hold up. As far as functionality I haven't had any complaints so far...but still, looks terrible ğŸ˜’.

**Update: looks ALOT better now. Shout out to the dev team.**

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: On the right track
text: There are a number of improvements to be made, but overall the app feels better than the Kaiser website. Probably the biggest exception at the moment is making appointments.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Could have given it 5+ but...
text: Its a great app & very convenient. I'm able to message and view/make appts, but it's pretty slow. Sometimes when I try to click on something, it becomes unresponsive or takes a long time to get to the page of where  I want it to be. My only issue so far.. I'm using an iPhone 5C

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great start
text:
Great for seeing messages, making appointments and viewing lab results for myself and child. 

Interface on sending messages to doctors could use an update. The signoff button is where most app place a send/done/submit button.  I cannot count the number of times I have drafted a note to a doctor and then accidentally signoff, forcing me to log back in and rewrite.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Won't even let me login...
text: Go to the website, can login just fine with my ID and password, try to login on the app... tells me I have the wrong password when I'm typing in the exact same thing. The old group health app used to do the same thing to me and I would have to reset the password every time I tried to use the app. So I have to use safari instead of this app so what's even the point of them having an app when it doesn't even let users login?...

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Kaiser did a great job
text:
Really nice app.  Can schedule appointments, order refills, get test results and a lot more.  Love how I can do all of this for myself or my kids.  

One suggestion- would really like a digital membership card with the app so I can stop carrying  around my kaiser card.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Email picture?
text: You'd think after all those commercials about how easy it is to send your dr. a picture of your ailment, they'd make that feature available on the app?! How frustrating is it that you have to take the pic on your phone, then upload it to ur computer, then email! I know, sorry it's a bit of #firstworldproblems, but still!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Essential
text: If you're a Kaiser Permanente patient you need this app. All your info in your hand. I noticed that the latest update took away the ability to graph and compare your test results. This is a very needed function. How do I know if I'm on the right track with my diet and exercise plan? Hopefully we'll get it back soon.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Terrible UX
text: Just try making an appointment - that should be enough to tell you this doesn't work. If there's nothing available on the day you choose you need to literally go back and forth between screens individually day by day until you find something. Did you even test this app with real people? The only saving grace is some of the other features, but without this one what's the point?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: I love Kaiser
text: I love the Kaiser app!!  I have some major medical issues that are much easier to deal with by having the app installed.  It is convenient to get lab results and appt reminders, or to email a dr.  It is convenient to be able to go to the app and order prescription refills as well.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Stopped working with the update
text: Ever since the last update, I cannot get messages to open at all. I used to be very happy with this because I frequently need to contact my doctor and order lots of prescriptions. I'm not frequently near my computer and need this to be fixed. I know I have unread messages to get to as well. Crashing isn't cool. No one else in these reviews likes it either.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love this app!
text:
I am a very happy Kaiser subscriber! A major part of that happiness is this app! 
I LOVE that I can email my doctors, refill prescriptions, make appointments, and manage my health history all without making a phone call!  This aspect of care makes managing my health personal and convenient. 
Thanks Kaiser!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't send MESSAGES!!!
text:
This app is 70% very useful and the 30% gives me a hard time. I use the app to communicate with my and my sons doctors but most of the time once I have written the message and press send it'll tell me that the message failed so I press resend and it still fails thus I just lost the message I wrote. So frustrating!!!! Makes me go crazy especially when it's something important!!! Please fix this major issue ASAP!!!
Sincerely,
Irritated Mommy ğŸ˜¡

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Seems to be Ok but needs to be informative
text: The app seems to be good. Quite helpful. I would give it a 5 star if it also shows little info regarding tests/vaccines. What is it? What if my value is lower or higher than defined range. That would make this app informative too. And also please do mention due dates of vaccines not taken.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Mobile records, email doc, get meds
text: This is a great app. Email your doctor or refill a prescription on the go.  I wanted to tell my friend what my cholesterol level was and I could find it right on my phone.  I can even refill prescriptions for my parents.  Great job Kaiser.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't figure out how to act for a family member with the new upgrade!
text: I love the app, however, since the new upgrade, I can't "act for a family member"any longer with is a HUGE inconvenience, and  really makes the usefulness of the app decrease. I loved being able to manage mine and my family's healthcare with the app and no longer can do this. Really disappointing!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Warning!!
text: Kaiser App desperately needs to post the amount of time you have to email your doctor.  After you've spent valuable time writing and submitting your email, you're told you've "timed out" and your content is lost.  It would be easy for Kaiser App to state the amount of time you have to compose/send your email on their copious "Email your doctor" pages.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Convenient app
text: The app seems to get the job done. The only thing I'd like to see is the app put out notifications for for message replies sent back from my doctor. I get an email notification but not an iOS notification. Also, notifications for upcoming appointments would be nice too.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Pretty good but needs work
text: The app works good and has a lot. My main gripe is that appointments don't give you full details. The address was missing the "south" so the gps took me to the wrong place. Also, a building number should really be included when it's in a complex. Notifications would be nice too.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Support most website features
text: I can make an appointment, check existing appointments, check test results, check medical records for my kids as well as for myself. It supports Touch ID so I don't need to type a password every time.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Scheduling appointments
text: Being able to schedule appointments is the best feature but you should also be given the option to schedule with any available doctor if your primary doctor is unavailable. It would save a lot of time instead of then having to call in and speak with a receptionist

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good but missed one feature
text: This is a very good app that is intuitive and allows you to email your doctor, schedule or cancel appointments, refill prescriptions and see lab results.  Why it loses one star is because when you use Facility Locator the Department and Specialties numbers display but cannot be tapped on to dial.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Password managers rendered inoperable.
text:
Like others, I use a password manager. This allows me to be able to copy and paste passwords, and not have to remember them. Now that they have disabled copy and past of passwords, the app is useless. 

I don't feel like I should have to remember a 20 character randomly generated password.  That's why I have the password manager. 

If I could give this update a minus rating, I would. As it is, I have to give it 1 star, which is 3 stars too much.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Same useless crashing update?!
text: As noted by all the other reviews as of now, the update with enhancements added crashes the app immediately upon launching the app. This evening you guys released the same exact up date again but when I go to download it again it tell me that it's no longer available no matter what I do to take it off. Really? Not only is your app unusable but event the update you guys released an update that's literally useless? Get it together Kaiser!!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: I hate updates
text: I'm stuck with a Gen 1 iPad and don't have the money at this time to buy a new one. This app is just one in a number of apps I have had to delete in the last few months because the iOS people and the app creators don't feel the need to support the older devices. I over paid to buy this iPad just like others over paid to get newer iPads. I wonder how long it will be before I have a large paper weight that originally cost over $400.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App!
text: This is a great application.  I can order my medications online, schedule or cancel an Appointment, view my medical record all from my iPhone.  I love it because I'm always on the go.  Just a few clicks and my meds are mailed ordered and delivered right at house.  This application is awesome!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Messages crashes constantly
text: Just got this new update last week, and the messages will not load. App keeps crashing. I hard reset my phone, uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Nothing works. Maybe it's iOS 9? Either way, I can't do anything as soon as I click messages, it dumps the app to the home screen. 7 times in a row. And I've been trying for over a week.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Email kinks
text:
For the most part, its an ok app. Quick access to test results & receive email from doctors. 

However, has lots of email problems: email replies failing (all the time) or not being able to reply to each message. not having access to a draft email if it doesnt send, logs you out went you refresh. 

As for appointments, too bad you cant make changes via app....maybe something to look into for future.
However, great to be able to see your appointments, including your proxy (ie my childs) schedule too. Plus it automatically has all your kaiser doctors/nurses prelisted in email section
Still worth downloading.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great except has issues
text: Generally I like this app. Good appt. info, my records, good interface etc. however it times out when I try to email my doctor. I think it would take anyone more than a minute or two to write an email to their doctor. Please update to show amount of time left til timeout or extend the timeout period for the app in the email writing part!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Feature Improvement
text: I would love to see a feature on this app, that could utilize the camera on the smartphone. For instance, you could take a picture of that rash or such and email it to your doctor to see if a condition worsens and what he or she may recommend be the next best thing to do.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't paste passwords in current version
text: I use this app all the time, especially for ordering prescriptions. The current version has disabled the ability to paste into the Password field. This shows a lack of appreciation for online security by the developers of this app. As a portal to my personal medical information, I expect security to be a top consideration. How can a "security 101" feature like the ability to use password managers get dropped?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great Convenience
text: One of the reasons I enjoy using Kaiser for my healthcare is the ability to access my records easily in this app. Could it be faster? Sure! But the problem has more to do with signal than anything else.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Isn't allowing appointments
text: I've tried over the last six months to schedule an appointment numerous times. It just won't let me or even access the pharmacy. This is being extremely annoying I used to love this app but as of this year I don't use because of these difficulties. Also we should be able to schedule an appointment with the counseling department also from the app maybe for the next update the would life easier !

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: I hate everything about this company
text: It's 11:37 pm and I've been trying to schedule an appointment for 45 minutes to have my finger checked because it's leaking puss and this dumb app won't even help me schedule anything!!! Before this my home address that was sent by my workplace to Kaiser was wrong, and I couldn't even log on. I had to call in, wait like a week for a letter containing my password, and now this dumb app doesn't even let me schedule anything! Should have chosen Blue Cross.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Worthless.
text: Anytime I attempt to use this app I have to either reset my password,  which I know is correct, because I write it down; or, as happened today, enter all my information to retrieve my user ID, which I also know is correct, only to be given a response that I have entered in the data incorrectly. I know my name, birthdate, the region I live in and entered the medical record number on my physical ID card- but somehow I'm not giving the correct data. Terrible.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This needs work....
text: The Touch ID works about 1 in 10 times, it will pop up successfully take your fingerprint then just not put in your password.... It does not remember any of your favorite facilities. Also please put the "go the cart" button at the top of the top of the pharmacy screen so you don't have to scroll all the way to bottom to find it. Also it does not work on KP wifi!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Overall good
text:
Easy to use. I've had very little problems & most fix with swiping the app off & going back to it. 
I would like to be able to send my doctor files like  I can on the website. 
I like the ease of having everything at my fingertips.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Nice but...
text: I constantly have to reset the theme. It doesn't display that I have a new message. It is nice to be able to contact dr and refill anything that I need. But sometimes it glitches. Have wrote to kaiser about it and they haven't done anything about it. It's great, but if you have a problem you are on your own. They won't help you with the app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: At my finger tips
text: In addition to the easy refill button I would also like to be able to help keep my medical record accurate by telling my doctor which medications I am currently still taking

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: So far so good
text: I'm a fairly a new Kaiser member and so far I've been able to check my test results, email my doctor and fill prescriptions so I guess the app has done what I needed. It was runs slow here and  there but nothing major. I give 4 stars because nothing is perfect.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Very nice UI. Password is a pain.
text: Beautifully designed and user friendly interface. More friendly than website. But the password re-entering issue is a major pain in the rear. My password is long and complex for security. I cannot remember. Now I need to change it to something simple I can remember - easy to defeat! What's the point?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Broken and not optimized for iPhone 6 Plus
text:
It's pretty bad here. The login asks for your fingerprint - then still requires you to type your password. Loading calendar appointments is slow. When you try to save an appointment to your calendar, you can't specify the calendar account. This makes it impossible to save to your calendar if you have multiple calendars I think. 

The screen isn't optimized for iPhone 6 Plus either.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Constant errors
text: This app used to be useful and the addition of the fingerprint access even better. Thats when issues started with this app. The app is dial up slow, there's always errors, the app crashes, appointment info doesn't always show, the make an appointment app just is laughable. I wouldn't mind losing the finger print access if the stability from the prior version would return. I use the website instead of the app now...

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't reply to messages.
text: I love this app, but I HATE that every time I have to respond to my doctor is by making a whole new conversation. The little arrow at the bottom on the right is a tease. Other than that I love this app. I love how I can do everything and see my lab results all from my phone!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works, but needs improvement
text:
Downloaded, logged on with no problem, however some features come up a bit slow.  

Would like to see improvements in interface and efficiency.  Keep working at it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Password Issues
text:
As others have already talked about - if you use a password manager, you know to create and manage complex passwords, then you are out of luck.  You cannot copy/paste into the app.  

As a lastpass user, the app is beyond my ability to use - as I cannot remember a 26 character password to enter manually each time.  I guess I could weaken my password greatly, just so that I could remember/key it in.  But isn't that poor practice?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: New review-July 2016
text:
When I order refills through the app, it does not give you a price. This is a problem because I have to call and find out. This creates an extra step, making the whole process useless. There are so many problems with this app. Why bother having an app-it's basically useless. 

I STILL cannot reply to any emails in this app- it won't send-a little box says 'message failed to send'. I have to write a NEW EMAIL every time!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: A lot better, close to 5 stars
text: I'd give this 4.5 stars because it still needs some tweaking. Closer to great than just good but it can also have to do with the availability of my doctors office and how quick they reply.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Email doc needs to attach pictures
text: App is in general pretty functional except you can't attach a photo from your phone when you use the app to email your doctor. It seems pretty obvious to me half the point of a health care app on a phone is to be able to send pictures to your provider conveniently.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: It's ok
text: I like that I can send my doctor emails and receive test results through my phone. What I don't like is that I can't make appointments on the app after a certain time, usually after midnight when I get home from work.  Maybe the system does maintenance at a certain time? Whatever the reason, it's annoying.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App is Satifactory
text: This App is acceptable for what it is: a portal that makes your health record, Doctor/Patient e-mails, laboratory test results, and pharmacy Rx's readily available without the hassle of opening the webpage on your iPhone. Enables patient to reorder Rx's conveniently, pull up test results, and contact doctor with ease. That's about what I expected.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Survivor
text:
I'm a Cancer free patient with MANY appointments, lab test, etc. I'm still currently getting treatment. This app has been wonderful for me. Med refills, scheduling appointments, seeing my lab results quick. And communicating with ALL my care team in one app has helped ease my anxiety. 

Thank you KP!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Teen dilemma
text: With Kaiser, if you have a teen over 13, as a parent you are not entitled to all of their medical information even though they are not even 18 yet, and not adults. This app has a rating of 17+ which means my teen cannot even get it on her phone to receive all the appointment notifications and test results. How in the world am I supposed to manage the health care of my "minor" child who is not old enough to manage her own? Ridiculous.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Last update broke passwords
text: Please please update the app and return the ability to paste passwords into the sign in field. Not all of us have easily hacked passwords. I copy mine in from my password manager. Also, the password verifier on the TouchID setting will not accept the same password that allows me to log in. The security and consistency are really lacking on this latest version.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy to use
text: Easy for at a glance review of appointments or results. However Touch ID locks up app launch each time. I always have to attempt to launch app 2 or 3 times before it loads successfully.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: An update would be nice
text: Okay but could definitely be improved... Frequent errors and problems loading. Would be great if it would show when you had a new message from the app on your home screen, like snapchat or Facebook, as opposed to having to open your email to view the email alert telling you there's a new message.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love it but can to add
text: Great app, very convenient and easy to use, I wish they'd add the other features like the ones in " my doctor online" app like reminders to schedule preventive health visits for you and your family.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app with some adjuments needed
text: This app is really good. But would like to be able to see and access information for my daughter also. Is there a way that you can change it for minors info to be accessible by the parents also.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App and easy to use
text: This is great Kaiser app. Easy to use and no technical problem. Few fingers tips away and I'm done making appointments, checking lab results and more. If you are a kaiser patient, you should have this!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love this new version!
text: I love being able to choose who I view information for by just touching a name. Now I can quickly see my information or the info for my kids in one-touch. Great re-design!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Cannot see past visit information for family member
text: This app is ok in terms of seeing your own health information. However it's not so user friendly when you need to do something for your family member, for example my 6 month baby. I want to see the weight and height measurement but I can't.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good and simple. One flaw.
text: I like this app and I'm grateful that Kaiser has created it. There is one big flaw with this app and that is that if you're trying to email your doctor and you get a phone call it will log you out and erase everything that you just typed.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This app never works! I mean NEVER!
text: This app is absolutely useless! Every time I attempt to schedule an appointment I make it to the very end, to confirm my appointment, and it tells me that this feature is currently unavailable please try again later. Just tried it again, what can I say I'm a gluten for punishment, and my family info is currently unavailable, so now I can't even attempt to schedule an appointment! Incredibly frustrating!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: No card icon
text: Today I received a Kaiser mailing telling me that I can obtain a digital card if I download the app and sign in. Well, I did that on my phone and my wife's phone and, try as I might, I cannot locate a "card icon" on the app. I've searched everywhere on the sappy, on both phones and still I can't find the card icon. I hope that I'm the problem and it isn't the app. I'll check back for more feedback from other users.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Constant Crashing
text: Updated to iOS 9 on my IPhone 6 and KP suddenly crashes constantly. I have 3 messages in my inbox which are important, but I cannot access them. Since my doctors are accustomed to communicating with me through this app, I don't have any other form of message, and don't even know which one to call.  I may perish before KP app updates me, so I'm writing my will, just in case. Thanks KP. I'm leaving you my impressive collection of empty rX bottles.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Excellent app
text: I need to check the address of my dermatology doctor and find it very easy in this app, today is my appointment and really do it easy for me, highly recommended to download the app! Very great-full with this tool!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't email kids' doctor?
text: Great app for my use, but unfortunately despite being able to choose to view information for my daughter , it always redirects back to my view. Therefore, I cannot email my daughter's doctor, which would be helpful. (She is an infant and does not have her own account)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Exceptional App
text: Wonderful to be able to carry everything with me...my prescriptions, appointments, e-mails to/from my doctor, etc.  I would like to see Optical Prescription included at some point. Thanks for continuing to make KP ever better!!!!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great app, much improved after the redesign
text: This is a relatively full featured, attractively designed app. I wish that I could write a custom reason when scheduling an appointment, but otherwise I have nothing but good things to say.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Why have an app?
text: My biggest problem with this app is that you can do very little in it. Want to make an appointment? Sorry, not available at this time, please call or visit our website. Want to check messages from your doctor? Oh sorry, that feature is not currently available in the app, please log into the website. Seriously, get with the times and make this thing usable.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: New upgrade has bugs with App
text:
When you open the app it lets you get to the main dashboard but the minute you try & open things like pharmacy or your messages it closes the app. I tried to restart my phone & log back back in but I'm still having issues. ðŸ˜ž 
Please fix these bugs, when you do I'll rewrite my rating. Thank you

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Basic app with helpful access
text: As of November 21, 2014 this app is not optimized for iOS8 on an iPad so it looks pretty bad. It does let you access your medical info, send messages to your provider, and schedule appointments so it's useful. I hope it gets updated soon, though.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Use To Be Fantastic
text: Got a little better after the update. Thank you! However the app is like off center. It's protrudes up into the top status bar where it shows my time/battery/signal strength so options are like up there. So the format needs to be fixed because it looks weird.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Use To Be Fantastic
text: Got a little better after the update. Thank you! However the app is like off center. It's protrudes up into the top status bar where it shows my time/battery/signal strength so options are like up there. So the format needs to be fixed because it looks weird.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Fabulous
text: What I've been waiting for. This is a supper convenient way to reach my doctor, see labs and refill prescriptions. I'm also able to take care of my elderly mom and manage all of her needs.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Not the best
text: It's not great at telling me where my appointment is approximately 10 minutes before. It just disappears. And then I'm stuck at NorCal region. Hah. People move, you know? I can't get to SoCal region on the app and make an appointment with a doctor. So the app has now become all the more useless for me. Bummer. Wanna do something about changing location of where I can make an appt? It's taunting me. I can see locations but its useless because I can't make appointments anyway.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great App
text: I have kids. I use this app all the time. Well made, has all the information I need. Great job kp! Love that I can look up everything on me and the kids easily and quickly. Worth every bit of 5 stars.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works great!
text: I don’t know why people are having problems with this fab app on their iPhone 6t. It is working as expected for me. (Delete the app and download from iTunes again if all else fails.)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Worked Great
text: It seems they've worked out the kinks other reviewers have mentioned.  I was able to access all the features.   Very handy app to have on hand.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: No response
text: I've written before and no response. Making an appointment is difficult always kicks me out system. Also I don't see where to add my children's medical record number to view their information as we'll. only let's you log in one persons medical record number

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Polished interface
text: And instant access to everything you could want, including member services, and the appointments line. It's perfectly functional and it looks great. Well done.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love the upgrades
text: I can see all my family's messages in one inbox without switching profiles. So much easier and smoother for me as a parent. Love the upgrades and new look.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Just one more thing!!!!!!!
text:
With more of us doing so many things from our iPad's today it would be so nice if there were a version of this app for it. So please please give us an iPad version. Did I say Please!!!!

At that point I could and would gives it five stars

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Kaiser Permanente app
text:
Useless - cant even start the app succesfully. Upon startup you get "bad response received from server" error. The only button available is "OK", and when you click it, you get the same "bad response received from server" message, ad infinitum. 

Tried to access App Support button from the iTunes store for the app...and guess what... That too gave some server configuration error.

I hope the medical card is more robust than the app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Failed to impress
text: For claiming to be the leader for innovative technology in healthcare industry, its mobile app is clunky, doesn't work well and not impressive. Iv had better experience with MyHealth app from SutterHealth. I wanted to use the KP app to check messages and every time I tried to log in, using my Touch ID, it kept saying no internet connection, when obviously I have internet connection to open my emails, and wrote this review!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Almost there
text: App is great for some things, but not others. For instance, cannot complete prescription refill process, due to credit card processing stalling out. Please address this issue. It would also be nice to have the video conferencing feature with your physician, like they already have in NoCal.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Crashes
text: Worked before on my iPhone 5. Now it will stretch the logo and crash right after. EDIT: reinstalled and it seems to be working again. It's convenient but it's annoying to have to uninstall and reinstall.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy to Use!
text: I love this app, and because it's so easy to navigate I decided to leave a review. In less than a minute I can have my prescription order placed, and know it's going to be sent to me on time. Great app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Useful!
text: Very useful app. There might be this option and I just haven't found it, but the only other thing I would like are reminder notification that advise me when I have an appointment coming up. Other than that, I like this!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Needs a reply option
text:
This app is great, however I'm giving it only two stars because you are not given an option to reply to an email. The reply "button" is there but you can not click on it. Which makes me wonder why is it there for? 
Hopefully they can fix/add this feature soon.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Use iPhone to make appointments
text: We do have a feature request: from within the iPhone we need the ability to make appointments. There are many reasons for that function to be added.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: A bit quirky
text: It's nice to have a mobile app but it is still easier to use the web portal than this app.  When you try to select the addressee of your email, the intended recipient must be highlighted, and then you  press "done", and then the name appears in the address box.  Quite counter- intuitive.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This app is better than the site!
text: Probably the first app that I am impressed with that actually works better than the actual site. Making appointments is super easy. I love it.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Amazing!
text: I can easily send and receive msgs from my docs, book appointments, and even refill prescriptions! And it hasn't crashed yet! This is Not a kaiser employee post--I just really enjoy having a hospital app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Great to view info but not for transactions
text: It's great I am able to view my medical record. However, when I ordered a refill on my prescription, I never received it. I know I checked out correctly and even received a confirmationessage that it has been ordered. Next time I will just call or go on their web site, instead of the mobile app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Good start
text: This app is quite useful. For much easier use, though, I'd love to have the option to stay logged in so I wouldn't need to enter a user ID and password every time I want to access it. At a minimum, please add the capability for the app to store the user ID. (Many other secure app, such as those for banks, allow this.)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Love it, perfect for on the go
text: I love this app, it gives me access to my medical records no matter where I'm at and I can either book an appointment or email my doctor or view my labs all from my phone! Love it, thank you kp :)

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App's inbox doesn't function properly.
text:
I am unable to read any message in my inbox. It retrieves and lists the header info only - showing who sent the email and what date/time it was sent.

Also, lab results and emails should have an option to view unread items only. Kaiser, you need some developers that care about making the app WORK.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: This app is the best!
text: So happy kaiser finally has a mobile app! I have been waiting for this for a while. I love that I can email my doctor from wherever I am. I would highly recommend this to my friends. Awesome app!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Doesn't work half the time
text: Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. Several times it has asked me to come back because it was not working. Unreliable. They need to get some app builders to work on it. An app is not just a website reduced in size. The user experience and user interface is not user friendly.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Nope
text: The app is good for messages and for appointment reminders...that's really it. I'm unable to use the refill scripts or make appointments as it says not available on mobile. Really? Why have that on the app if you can't use it? I have had this app for more than a year and it's not changed. Honestly better off just using the main website which is a cluster in itself. Come on KP, you can do better.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Must have!!
text: Seamless easy to navigate app. Can fill meds on the go and make appointments too. I love that I can read and send messages to my doctors too and find lab results. Kp continues to be the best healthcare I have ever had.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Setting up appointments NEEDS fix
text:
Setting up appointments on the app can be tricky and frustrating. 

If you press "done" on the top right corner, you're screwed. You will have to do the whole process over again. Instead, you must scroll down and press "continue."
I'm 23 years old and very fond of technology, yet the misleading "done" on the top right corner still gets me every time. So I'm sure it's affecting the older folk. 

Also, it asks for your ideal date of appointment TWICE. The first time you have to type out the date in mm/dd/year format. Then, it doesn't take into account this date you inputed when you have to select the date the second time. So annoying. 

Come on, Kaiser.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Awesome!
text: Couldn't believe I could order a prescription right from the app, and test results are way easier to read vs the mobile browser. Great app all around!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Freezes frequently. Too slow
text: Very disappointing. Seems to me to be simple bug fixes and this should happen sooner rather than later. Has the potential to be a great app but freezing all of the time and having to close the app and reopen to a black a screen, is not efficiency at its best. I'd rather log on to the full website.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Kaiser finally did something right >.<
text: HATE going to kaiser because I usually go in an hour before my appointment and end up waiting at least 2 hours PAST my appointment time. EVERY TIME! But this app is cool. Thanks!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Doesn't work well for moms
text: I was- and still am- really excited to utilize this app, but while it has options to view my children's messages and schedule appointments for them, those options default to MY account and information. Frustrating, because I almost never make apts for myself. Nice potential with some fixes.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can you add a print function?
text:
I like the app for booking appointments and checking results but today I found myself wanting to print an email from my doctor. Can you guys add that function in the next update?
Thanks

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Almost perfect
text:
The only feature I would love to see would be a simple refill button next to the list of precriptions currently prescribed.

Otherwise perfect!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Scheduling!!!
text:
Making a doctors appointment is way too much to go through ! I click on what kind of appointment I want then it tells me "Please answer the following questions.
Please remember to take your Total Health Assessment online before your next appointment. The link can be found to the left under Related Links." I don't see related links !

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Touch ID Needs Work
text: The Touch ID often is ignored. When one signs out, one goes back to the sign on screen after touching the Cancel button. If one is not quick to touch the Home button, the app signs on again.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Simple, better than the web site. But maps lock up
text:
ID card in app? - They brag up front in the description, then scroll down to where they bury the "only available in" note. 

The Good - it's simple. 

The Bad - maps are slow to load data (compared to maps app anyway). It locks up the app when you change zoom or change filter.  It seems to chew up the battery life quickly (35% to 15%) in only a few minutes. 

The Very bad - no way to track a mail order prescription. I was in the dark once you click send.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Password Pasting
text: It seems they have disabled pasting in your password. I now have a long secure unique password I could never remember that I can't enter while on my mobile device. All while I also have Touch ID enabled within the app as well. Please re enable pasting of the passwords. Without it I can't launch the app without simplifying my password to something short and less secure.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Easy to use
text: I was able to email my doctor, make an appointment and refill my medicine with the Mail order pharmacy. Quick and easy.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Awesome healthcare app
text: Love this app!  Being able to send secure messages to my doctor, refill a prescription, schedule an appointment, and see my test results all from my phone is the most cool thing EVER!

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: RoCoPeek
text: Is there any way to get a text message, from the app, when prescriptions are ready for pickup as well as which ones are ready?

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: It's ok
text: I am not sure why I am not given the option to reply on some messages to my doctor and not on others... Also, the scroll selection when writing a message is very difficult to use... Selecting my doctor, reasons, etc... Is very difficult to actually select and move on to the next area.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Terrible App
text: I was able to write and 'send' a message to my doctor, after I few days I checked on my laptop to see why my doctor had not responded and the message was gone. I also cannot see future appointments.  For days I've been receiving an error message when I try to view my appointments. At least I can refill prescriptions and set up mail order delivery.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Can't book appointments
text:
The most useful part of this app never works for me. Booking an appointment requires a preferred date, however no matter what date I choose there is no available time (unless I call, and then there is no problem!)
It should at least have "next available dates" as an option...

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: App is a must have
text: If you have kaiser then you know what a pain their health system can be to navigate. Once you have this app it becomes a breeze. No more hold times or frustrating conversations with powerless call room attendants. GET THIS APP or pony up more cash for a PPO.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Convenient!
text: I love being able refill prescriptions, make appointments, see my lab results and email my doctors!  Great APP! Oh! Also, educational health information can be found.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Just reload
text: If the app crashes, try deleting it then reloading it from the App Store.  Worked for me.  This app works nicely, way better than it used to.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Finally...
text: I love this App, I was waiting for it to be released. It is so easy to use and love the fact that you are able to do pretty much what you do on the computer.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works great
text: I am using it to communicate with my doctor and I found the mail function really seamless. Simple and clean interface overall

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Where is the insurance card?
text: This app is fine as far as getting messages from Kaiser but what I wanted was to keep my insurance card on my phone and I don't see a way to do this. It looked like there was a button at the bottom but that does not appear on my version and I can't find a way to add it. Will be deleting.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Map feature is very slow!
text: When I tried to look up kaiser location, it was very very slow. Got stuck many times and no success so far. Other than the location function, other features are nice.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Works well
text: This is a rare app that's about as fast as the website and can get most things done. Touch ID works fine so the complaints about that inaccurate in my experience.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Junk!
text:
Doesn't work anymore. Fingerprint and password entry stopped working. Told me I had to change my password because of too many attempts. Went to Safari. Mobile site kinda worked. Went to reply my doctor. Hit send. Invalid response. Ugh. 
So, I went to their full site and all ok there. 
Just can't use their app or mobile site. 
I guess they gave up on their app.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Worked great until it stopped working
text: I've had this app for about 3 weeks. It worked great until yesterday. I used the message your doctor tool and since then the app won't fully open. I can't get past the sign in page:/

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Not so bad
text: The app is helpful and makes scheduling appointments and filling prescriptions easy but there should be an alert option for when your prescription needs to be refilled, being away in school I have to get it mailed to me and I need to know when I can do it ASAP.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Cannot delete messages
text: I keep getting errors when I try to delete read messages. I've tried closing app & restarting - nothing works. I do like that I can all of my family's messages in one screen- very helpful compared to full site.

name: Kaiser Permanente
title: Useful-has bugs. Great without the bugs.
text:
Lets you see quite a bit of info. Very helpful.
