name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Touch ID issue
text:
First of all, I really like this mobile App.    Simple, super fast find what I need. It’s like as soon as I login I can instantly find my ID card via the “View ID Card” quick link. And same way to quickly find my payment info or make payment,etc.   I would give 5 star but with the issue below I found, which to me is an important feature needed. 

I wanted to use touch ID to log in.  So I went to MENU/Profile/Login and Security to enable the Touch ID feature.  To test that, I logged out of the App first, right away I got prompted with either using Touch ID to log back in or clicking Cancel to cancel the Touch ID feature and use regular login  by manually entering password.  If I choose the Touch ID and I got no problem log back in which is good.  However if I’m done and want to completely log off, the only choice is to click Cancel, which seems to be designed to cancel the Touch ID feature.   The problem with that is if I want to login again,  I’ll have to use the regular log, i.e. manually enter my password.   But I want to be able to log in with Touch ID whenever I launch the mobile App.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: What?
text: So I am a new Anthem card holder and literally just finished the registration process before writing this. I completed it on my iPhone in the safari web browser but it asked me to check out the app, which I usually prefer anyways. When I got to the App Store to download it I was worried it wouldn’t be worth it bc of all the 1 star reviews complaining about not being able to view the electronic copy of the ID card. So after deciding to check out the app for myself to see, I found out that there is absolutely no issue with the app and I pulled up the ID card in seconds. By simply selecting “Menu” -> “My Coverage” -> “ID Card” an image of the ID card will pop up with a front and back. I hope this helps bc I know how stressful it is to not have a copy of the card!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App does not work
text:
I have used the app successfully in the past but it froze today and will not show info.  Tried deleting and reloading and that was even worse.  Tried calling the number listed in another comment and that took me to anthem customer service and a person who wanted to log into my personal
Information.  Not what I needed. The APP does not work on an iPhone, I already got all the info from my computer.  Had a question to try to solve at the doctor’s office to show them that Anthem had paid a claim and I knew before they did but the app failed spectacularly.  They were not impressed with the app or with Anthem at that point.  My phone works with my other apps because I thought there might be a problem with it, but no, it is local to Anthem only.  So will delete it again. Guess I should not be surprised since app only has a 1.6 rating. I am glad the insurance is way better than the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Help! Multiple issues
text: Had trouble having the profile info save. It said it sent a text to verify phone number but it did not. There is no saved number - it is still “awaiting verification” despite dozens of attempts. Unfortunately we have two user profiles set up on the same app/ phone. Need to remove one user’s info but cannot find any way to do this. Have deleted the app multiple times (which warns you will delete all I do and data and I am hoping so!) but when I download the app again, ALL our info for both users is still there. Need help from the app developer! We have two uncompleted profiles on a single app and phone because it will not accept and verify phone number and no way to really delete a user profile.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless and a huge waste of time
text:
I downloaded this because any time I tried to access eligible provider info. or claim status on the Anthem website, I always got error messages. Well, guess what - the app gives me the exact same error messages. Find a provider? “We are unable to retrieve your information at this time. Try again later.”  (I did. It’s always the same message.” Access claim information for the past 12 months? Nope. Only pharmacy claims are listed. And, best of all, when I tried the messaging system to (a) get the information I needed and (b) let Anthem know about the bugs, that resulted in an error message, too: “Something went wrong on our end. Try again later.”  
Deleting now.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: No ID Card
text: I just had open enrollment and got my new ID cards (minus one for some reason). The card info had details on their app where you can use a digital version. Sound great, no need to carry a card! I downloaded the app and everything worked fine. However, two days later (after the new year) the app no longer shows an option to display my ID card, which makes it completely useless. I also can't find anyone else that has this problem or a way to fix it. Now I have to order another card and wait 10+days for it to arrive. Hope I don't have a medical emergency until then.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: I don’t need support, I need an app that is simple to use!
text: All I need to is SIMPLY refill prescriptions!  Wouldn’t you think that refilling a scrip would be on their home page?!  No!  You have to go through so many steps, that you won’t remember next time you have to refill a script.  We use to just go through the Anthem Blue Cross website, click on prescriptions, that was it!  When we went through Anthem website  recently, we could not access Express Scripts to refill my  prescriptions for over 2 weeks. Called Express Scripts today, stayed on phone for 30 minuets!  I was told I have to use this app from now on!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Limited functionality
text: There is almost no functionality in the app. It is for viewing limited information and that’s about it. You cannot download or view EOBs and the load time for loading the claims or cards takes almost 30 seconds. I have 30 seconds, but it is well above average for a 2018 app. Also, Anthem purposely designed a mobile version of the site that imitates the app and you cannot request the desktop version without getting logged out, so it is impossible to view or download an EOB from a mobile device. Terrible user experience.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: USELESS!!!!
text: UPDATE: THIS AP STILL ISN’T WORKING!!! This app used to work... somewhere after an update it stopped working and doesn't allow me to log on. Touch ID stopped working, and when I put in my log-in information I get a pop-up warning that I am not registered to use the mobile app. What?? I've used it in the past, and even have a postcard that says I am registered to use Anthem Anywhere. Called tech support and was told the app is "being refreshed" and to uninstall and reinstall the app. After more than several attempts doing just that, still no luck. Please fix this app so it works again!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: The potential is there
text:
I downloaded the app because, like many others, I liked having a digital copy of my ID card. Upon downloading and my first use, it was great!

Then it would not log me in—it would just spin and spin and spin. This is quite frustrating when you are at the dr w/o a physical card bc you were only sent one ID card and have five people covered in your insurance...

Now there are only two options on my home screen: find a dr and member profile. I can no longer access my ID card?! What’s the point?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Ok?
text:
This app, as well as the Anthem site in general, is completely broke. I have an established account and have logged in in the past, but can’t log-in, can’t request info to retrieve my log-in credentials, can’t call customer support because the number they provide gives me a robot that tells me to “call the number on the back of my id” card before hanging up. 

The whole reason I’m trying to sign-in/call is because I need to request a replacement insurance card.

Soooo, I guess I’m just not going to the doctor until my benefits renew in November and new cards get mailed out? Thanks, Anthem!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible App
text: So disappointed with this app. I thought it would be easier to have an app rather than log on to the website but this app is bad. You can’t even get your data to match what’s on the website? Shouldn’t you have all data fed from the same location? I keep getting notifications that claims were rejected but when I log onto the website they show as either approved or pending. All of my claims show as out of network on the app but that’s not the case on the website. All of my doctors are in network. You have a long way to go on the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Can’t pay premiums
text: I can’t pay my premiums through the app OR website from a mobile device, even from specialized browsers that let me request Anthem’s desktop site - it still forces the mobile site on me, which doesn’t allow for making payments like the desktop site. The “mobile app” is just the lousy, limited mobile site ported into an app icon. There’s no point and I have to call every month to make my payment instead of paying through the website, which I used to be able to do before the “mobile improvements.”

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible UI
text: I've never experienced an app so terrible that I felt the need to write a review until now. It's impossible to type in a text field unless you click the field a million times to bring up a keyboard. I also haven't even been able to check a box. It's definitely not my phone, every other app works fine. Somehow they managed to mess up the simple aspect of data entry. Once you are able to even get past the login screen, it takes an abysmal amount of time to switch between different features.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pretty Bad
text: This app is still really buggy, slow, and built sloppily. For instance, you can’t set up text alerts because the data entry field is broken so you cannot add a number to receive text messages. At least it’s on par with the insurance coverage they provide which is pretty terrible as well.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Unable to login
text: Keep getting “Something went wrong” message. Doesn’t happen on mobile safari or desktop browser. I called technical support, they reset password to test it themselves. Felt shady but let them do it anyway. The technical customer service was very bad, and bad background noise. He was also talking to someone loud and laughing, completely unprofessional! Anyway, they finally acknowledged the problem and said would open a ticket and contact me when resolved. It’s been a week and still wouldn’t work.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: “Unable to Retrieve your Information”
text:
This app constantly loads for up to 5 minutes at a time and often is “Unable to find your information.” Sometimes it works sometimes it doesn’t. When it does though, it’s only a matter of time before you reach another error. 

This has happened several time when I have clicked on a doctor that I want to see, only to be unable to view the information due to an app error

The app fails to fulfill its most basic and only function.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Horrible
text: My employer changed us over to anthem blue cross starting this month and it has been an all around horrible experience. I though that with this app information would be easily accessible since now I have to pay a deductible on Rx and I wanted to keep track but I can never access the app because “it looks like something went wrong.” There has never been a time where I haven’t gotten an error message. It took me 2 weeks to just be able to even make an account through the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worthless
text: Just not even worth the data to download it. Zero functionality to look at your own information and claims. I would recommend removing from AppStore due to it having zero value. A picture of an ID card is better, takes up less memory and doesn’t track your activity and location. This is complete waste of everyone’s time and everyone should be given a dollar for the lack of effort Anthem and the developers did on this piece. This needs a negative star rating option.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Only good for digital copy of benefit card
text: Accessing anthem on a mobile device through either a smart phone browser or the app is both useless and pointless. Neither of them grant you the access that looking at it from a computer browser would. You cannot check your claims or HSA balance without a computer. The only literal benefit to this app is that if you happened to be a new patient somewhere and forgot your card, you can access a digital copy of the front and back of it.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Absolutely Terrible App
text: This app is awful. I mean awful. Besides it being a web app it’s out of date and just not optimized. The chat feature is full of bugs (sends duplicate messages, constantly exits out of the text box as you type, buttons overlap not allowing you to send, ect). I don’t even care it’s not iPhone X optimized but it just doesn’t work. Get your act together Anthem/BCBS. I’d cost you a few thousand dollars to fix this app. That’s peanuts to you. It would also greatly improve the quality of care we can get.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: What the what?
text:
Um, Anthem...
Y’all know this thing doesn’t work, right?  All it does is load a homepage.  The links are slow to load.  There’s no ID card.  You can’t access your own profile.

I mean I have a laundry list of things that don’t work.  Doesn’t anyone in your IT Dept/App Developer actually log in and try to use this thing?  There’s no customer interface whatsoever.  This App is a perfect waste of space on my phone.  Can we at least get something to semi-resemble the pictures in the overview advertised in the App Store?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pointless
text: If you are using this simply as a digital ID card then it serves its purpose. This app doesn’t allow you to do anything else you would want to do from the website. The iOS website version is identical and useless. If you want to check your claims, how much you owe on your deductible, or anything else you can’t do it from the app. You have to log onto a desk top or true lap top computer to access the real website, and any useful information that an app is supposed to simplify for you.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Customer service chat does not work on IPhone 7
text: Tap into the text entry field and start typing and as soon as the customer service rep types and a speech bubble appears for him/her, I lose focus on the text entry field and my input keyboard is dismissed. Clicking back into the text entry field does not bring the keyboard back up and once I click into the text field, I cannot click outside of it. Pathetic that an app for a major insurance carrier is this bad, and that’s coming from a ux design professional of 20+ years.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App won’t start
text:
I downloaded the app and gave it my credentials and it worked just fine. Until I was standing in a providers office with them wanting my I’d card. I don’t like a fat wallet so I don’t carry physical cards—I use smartphone apps whenever possible. So when the silly app wouldn’t start I had to run home to retrieve the physical card. I’ve tried deleting and then reinstalling the app. No good. Why have an app that won’t work. I would have thought you would be more prepared to do business than you are. 

-Dennis

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great app to use when cust. Serv. Is open
text: Great and easy app to use but only when customer service is open. I can access anything and find everything but as soon as customer service closes the app locks me out or won’t let me access anything with out prompting call service which is closed making this app useless outside of regular service hours. Avoid this app until the developer can figure out how to make an app that doesn’t need a call center to work properly.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Please write a better app
text:
The app kicks me off all the time. I have had to re-register numerous times. When this happens I have to spend an hour on the phone to fix it. I can click on my insurance card but when I click on my wife's of my daughters it comes up once in a blue moon. When I search for a doctor it never works. Solution-go look into insurance apps that have 4-5 star ratings and do something similar or hire the person that created it. 
YOUR APP IS HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!          
DO SOMETHING ABOUT IT!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Something Isn’t Working
text: I primarily downloaded this app so I could have a digital copy of my health insurance card, but it didn’t seem like that part of the app was working, giving me a “Something isn’t working” message. I went into my Messages to see if I could report this issue, but, “Something isn’t working” there, either. I’m not sure what else does work in this app, but the one thing I wanted it to do didn’t work.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App is completely not usable, for anything.
text: Had nothing but problems with this app. Numerous something isn’t working messages, emails unable to send, basically every function is non-functioning. I couldn’t even get the search for physician function to work properly. According to this app’s search results, there are ZERO in-network doctors, hospitals, and clinics in my metropolitan area of 200,000 people. I don’t see how this was even allowed to be released to the public. Nothing works.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Complete FAIL!
text:
What the heck?! I went through the whole process, it actually found me, only for this app to fail miserably! When I installed all of my info, including all of my security questions, all it says is that something went wrong. It doesn’t tell me what went wrong so I can’t fix whatever is wrong. My answers AREN’T wrong! I’m completely frustrated!
I’ve tried reinstalling at least four times, but I’m giving up on it. I’m deleting this idiotic app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: “Our app isn’t working right now...”
text:
I received an email offering this new advancement in health service. I downloaded it and the very first message I received on screen was “Our app isn’t working right now.” 
Really? I’ve already been overly displeased with ABCBS - it was bad enough when they wouldn’t cover my husband’s ER visit last fall for which he wound up having SURGERY. This is just insulting....and loaded with ignorance. Get it together before you offer any other, ahem, “conveniences”.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Cannot view claims anymore
text: I have had this app for about six months and everything worked fine until the last 60 days. I am not able to see any claims on the app. The convenience ceases to exist. Per the app I should be able to see claims for the past 12 months and am not able to. I have to go to my email and click on a link sent by anthem and then I can see a claim. I have updated the app in hopes of some resolve.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Customer Service Advocate SC
text: App is really easy to maneuver. Everything you need, from searching providers to different coverage options to viewing your ID card, front and back, right at your fingertips! Love it!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: No log in
text: I downloaded the app and tried to register. It kept telling me to call the number so I decided to try my computer instead. The website worked fine and let me register no probably. I figured I’d try the app again with a log in now and it won’t let me sign in now still telling me to call the number. Not helpful at all! The website isn’t much better but you can actually sign in on there.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Slow
text: This app is really slow. It take way longer than it should to load and to go from page to page within it. It’s a pain to use because I can’t just check it in a pinch. I have to make sure I have plenty of time to do what I need to because of how slow it is.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Won't load
text: I have an IPhone 6 and this app and the other one just won't load. The app downloads and opens but won't get past the first loading screen to let me put in login details. Trash app if I can't even get to the first screen. And yes I deleted and reinstalled the app. They said health insurance would be easy. Come on Anthem, it's 2018 is it that hard to make a decent working app, especially if people's health could depend on it.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible app
text: App has minimal features and those it has don’t work. I can’t view my ID card or anything else. The app needs to let us see our individual and family deductible and how much is net/remaining and also view recent claims. It should also let us see our benefits and EOB’s. The app is worthless. About all you can do is try to search for a doctor and that doesn’t even show you who all is available.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: New app user. New insurance provider
text: I was able to see my insurance card after escalation to higher level team member. While this issue was resolved I continued to have issue navigating to other areas.  Error messages constantly. I removed the app and will try again later. It is helpful to have this App at fingertip because my new insurance is Doctor Specific, not by group of Doctors at same location.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Didn’t have what I hoped
text: It’s a nice little app if you’re just looking for the basics. My main reason for downloading was to be able to see if procedures were covered and what copays were, etc. you won’t find anything of that nature in this app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Garbage
text: Worst app ever. What’s the point. My choices are in the menu are home and support. When you go home there is nothing on the screen but menu that leads to only those two places. Support only gives you frequently asked questions which is blank. I thought this was supposed to help me find a physician in my area not do literally nothing. Don’t download not worth the memory on your phone.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App is much better than before
text: Easy to use and has the major functions. Easy to see deductible info and HRA/HSA. Great ID card view and easy to fax or send via email. Thanks for updating the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Limited info and buggy
text: None of my claims details show up even though they were more than 30 days ago. The message sender does not work at all: the “Subject” pull-down menu is empty but the message will not send because it errors out if you don’t pick a subject. Pretty disappointing app from a multimillion dollar corporation.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Completely useless
text: Downloaded app because the anthem web portal for customers is so buggy it doesn’t work 60% of the time. However with the app you can’t submit a claim, check in the status of a claim, or view any of your benefit info. The thing is slow useless supplement to the slow broken website.  Anthem seriously needs to get its tech on track - it’s an embarrassment.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: No problems here.
text: Maybe it was updated but there is a giant button on the screen to see your I.d. card and it works.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: great app
text: I see a lot of 1-star, almost didnt download the app.  However, I was curious of the reported problem. I am using iPhone 6s+ ios version 11.3. The app responds quickly, no issue experienced.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Don't work
text: I have iPhone 6s and just installed it worked fine on 1st opening but just blank white screen when I try reopening it. I use Touch ID that is only thing that comes up it's just blank other than that. Also I was hoping it would have my actual insurance card info but from what little I saw of this app I couldn't find it so it's basically useless to me anyway

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Can’t register - “something not working”
text: Despite an update a week ago, I can’t register. I just get a message saying “something not working”. I’ve started from the beginning a few times and I can’t get it to work.  I suspect there is some condition on user name or passwords that are not stated in the instructions.  Since this is my first interaction after switching insurance companies I am very unimpressed.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Good app
text:
The app is working great for me. No issues. Touch ID capability is convenient.

Hey people: when the website is down, so apparently is the app. It's not specific to the app or to mobile devices.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Do you pay your programmer in bananas?
text: This is possibly the worst app I've seen in quite a while! And from an insurance company with what is basically a license to print money. I hope your VPs get some good golfing with money you don't spend on programmers and health coverage for participants. Oh, and what's with two basically identical apps by you in app store, without even a hint what the difference is between them?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: won't let me past security questions
text: Come on , this is my 10th time trying to register my card, i get to the security questions then it pops up something went wrong, well yeah it's my 10th trying and they still can't get it right! i'm sure you get paid good money to run the app, FOR THE LOVE OF HEALTH INSURANCE "GET IT RIGHT"!!!! i pay too much for insurance not to be able to use a app- i would give NO stars if i could

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: HANDY
text: if I forget my card itâ€™s right there. Anthem BCBS has been so good at answering my messages when I have a question and my phone calls. theyâ€™ve even called me to check in on my health. THANK YOU BCBS!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Does NOT work
text:
I would give NO stars if I could. I was never able to log in using the same info I use on the internet. I went back to the internet to log on and because I was not able to log into this app my account was locked with instructions to call. 

When I called in to get assistance I was put to 4 different CS agents and sat on hold for over 30minutes.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: How is this app not fixed yet?
text: The app does absolutely nothing that would be remotely beneficial to have. You canâ€™t view your claims one pull up your ID card. Every time I try to access the site from the web browser and request desktop site, it still forces me to the app. I will be deleting it since itâ€™s just taking up precious space on my phone.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: How do they get away with calling this an App?
text: Wow, Iâ€™ve used some bad apps before but this one takes the cake! First of all it has VERY limited functionality, and is missing key health insurance functionality like â€œMy Coveragesâ€� and â€œEstimate costâ€�.  It has a feature â€œFind a doctorâ€� but searches often result in 0 doctors even though many doctors actually exist in the given area and discipline.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Does it ever work when I need it?
text: It might have worked once when I needed it.  There has been a history of trying to use it and getting messages that said I need to call. This is just to present the card. The latest is that I need to download a new version before I can use it.  The version is not that old.  It is not a very â€œusableâ€� app

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Unusable
text: Even after updates the app is still unusable. Whenever I try to access anything, from ID cards to provider information, I get an error message. It doesnâ€™t matter if Iâ€™m connected to WiFi or using cellular data, the app canâ€™t access anything it should. Incredibly frustrating and a waste of phone memory.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Update working great for me -faster
text: Wish I could see more claims (further back than 3 months), but everything else is great and useful. Haven't had problems with this version yet. (August 2017)

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Currently broken
text:
Seriously, Anthem, itâ€™s not hard to do basic functionality testing before you release updates to your premier application. 

TouchID is broken, user/password is broken, canâ€™t get claims info, and your tech support canâ€™t tell me when you expect to fix it. Admit the mistake, roll back to the previous version, and try again. 

Fail.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: All id cards not showing up
text: I have both medical and vision through Anthem, and like others having a digit ID card is why I downloaded the app and I can see the one for vision just not the one for medical, which I use more often. Wish it had both ID cards. Some one QA that for next release please.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Not useful
text: The only reason I got this was that I wanted to check progress toward this yearâ€™s deductible, because their mobile site doesnâ€™t show that and the â€œrequest desktop siteâ€� option does nothing on their site. The app just has the exact same stuff as the mobile site has, so thereâ€™s no point.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: I'm not even sure how they keep making this app worse
text:
It's clear this app has been outsourced by some exec getting a 400k salary per year.  

With every update, it somehow becomes slower, buggier, and more inadequate.  

It's not difficult to hire solid developers, you just have to pay market.  

This app is what happens when you hire on the cheap.  

It also seems BCBE execs don't care how bad their app is as long as they have one. No pride, no concern for customer experience.  A clear "let's have an app so we can say we have an app, but zero budget to make it worthwhile" project.  

People need to be fired over this, no questions asked.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: They donâ€™t care.
text:
Itâ€™s 2018 and they donâ€™t care about having a useful tool like a phone app. If youâ€™ve seen the Kaiser Permanente  app, it does EVERYTHING you thought this would do. 

No excuses why not to have this app working properly in this day and age and with the resources of this company...embarrassing.

Also it shows very little information for Teamsters & Food Employers Security Trust Fund.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: This app is so broken I canâ€™t tell them how broken it is
text: The doctor finder doesnâ€™t work, the message system doesnâ€™t work, basically nothing you might want to do in this app, including provide them feedback about how broken it is, is capable of functioning. This app is an embarrassment to the entire profession of software development.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Re- review
text: When I first used this app I could not do or see anything. But today this app was great for me. Just hope it up grades for the mess Iâ€™m about to receive from out new insurance of 2018.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worthless - Will not work... just tells you to call support
text: Not sure what the point of this app is. I've been trying to install it and use it for months now with the same results. They send out an update it does not allow you to login at all. Soon as you try to put in your credentials it'll tell you to call customer support for help. EPIC FAILURE

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless!!
text: Downloaded this app a year ago, didnâ€™t work then. Downloaded app again this year, still says the same thing!! Donâ€™t  waste your time, energy, or phone call trying to get it to work!! Tech support is â€œworking on the problem...â€�. Even after a year later... theyâ€™re still working on it!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Need more claim information and Security fix needed
text:
Not much info available on it.  Went to go check on claims but it just says approved, for what provider, date and how much member owes.  I would like to see how much was charged, how much insurance paid.

Also it stores my date of birth in clear text.  This should not be done for security reasons.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pointless
text: What is the point of this app? For the amount of money we pay in to Anthem and they don't pay out to health providers you would think there is plenty of money to spend on a functioning app or website that works on a mobile device. The only way I can get access to my claims is on a computer.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Doesnâ€™t work
text: Sad but true... just got the postcard in the mail today.  It seems to download fine but when I try to run it all it does is sit and spin the pretty little bubbles around the screen. Whoever decided to post that card out to all those subscribers... oh my. Please fix the app and let us know when it really works.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Slow....really slow. Not worth it
text: Useless app for help finding doctors. Still canâ€™t open the care and cost finder.  It does give you a digital copy of your card but you could also snap a pic and put it your favorites so it is just as easily accessible. Seems easier to go online and use the website.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Whatâ€™s up with this?

text: Too many anthem apps out there to know which is right for you. App doesnâ€™t â€œworkâ€� anymore. No ID cards available in app. Iâ€™d work on getting some decent developers that know what they are doing... or just keep launching new apps and new versions w/out listening to your customer base... that seems to be working just fine.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pathetic
text:
Not even able to display the login page! 
The website is not working either- â€œfind a doctorâ€œ kept loading. Called customer service said the website is not working but the app works fine, told me to download the app. What a bullsxxtï¼� thatâ€™s what you get when they offshore the development to INDIA! ğŸ‘�

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Works OK but limited
text:
The app works but has very limited features.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: WORST APP IVE EVER SEEN !
text: NOTHING ever works EXCEPT the constantly appearing ERROR MESSAGE that says something's not working and to CALL THEM BY PHONE.   Of course you can only call during certain hours and they don't help anyways.  You wait literally hours and then they hang up without even talking to a human !  Add to that I had my tongue surgically removed from Cancer and can barely speak at all !  Then if you try to email them through the app the subject drop down menu won't work so you CANNOT even send an email question !   Bill paying feature was ok for a couple months but last week it said $79 under Pay Bill. I checked again a few days later and now it says NO BILL DUE ?   I never made a payment so why did it change suddenly ?   Do I owe $79 or not ???   Of course I can't get in contact to ASK THEM because the email portion of the app doesn't work !    This is what happens when you have a monopoly situation.  They don't care because they don't have to !  There's no other competitors so you get ZERO QUALITY for the incredibly rediculous high premiums.  And in Connecticut their rates just INCREASED 31.7 % for 2018 !  IS THIS A CRUEL JOKE ? !   DONT WASTE TIME WITH THIS USELESS APP. Use the desktop website.  It's not great either but better than this virtually USELESS app that does nothing more than take up your iPhone storage space and frustrate users.  WISH I COULD RATE IT ZERO.   It's obvious they really don't care.  They don't have to !  What choice do we have ?  This app is rediculous and 95% of the functions don't work.  Bad enough being so sick and then dealing with more frustration from a terrible app.  Can't believe anyone would give it a good rating ?   VERY BAD APP. An $1,000 PER MONTH premium doesn't get you much these days.  Don't waste your time on this app.  They should be Ashamed and make at least some effort to improve their app.  A 5 year old kid could create a better app than this.  I seriously doubt it's SECURE either.  Who knows if our confidential info is being stolen ?   Probably is !  I rarely give a bad rating but people should know how horrible this is.  BEWARE and don't expect much from this app.
