name: Anthem Anywhere
title: When will this app work?
text:
What good is this app if I can't track current coverage and deductible values.  I was contacted by tech support appx. Two weeks ago to allow them access via a temp PW to review issues, was told by tech support last week to go ahead and reset PW to my choice as they were done review and an update was needed.  Now, cannot access account with new PW after it worked for about a week--the temp PW is being used again!!!  I changed my PW again, will see what happens, but now no ID card access, coverage/deductible access, and no prescription tab.  Security issues??? Pretty lame for such a large BCBS entity.
Update 3/3/16:  This app is getting more and more unusable each week.  While checking claims, the providers names are scrambled as they are shown on screen, as compared to website where names are properly shown.  Still cannot access deductible and coverage info, so far only card info available.  Tech support still has a temp PW to login as they are "investigating" issue.  Would rate zero stars if possible!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Much, MUCH better than previous version
text:
I almost don want to give it 4, BUT overall, 4 stars if is..  especially since the original version was 100% non-user-friendly an absolute CRAP! 

This version is leaps, bounds, and light years ahead of the previous one!  It allows you to do the basic stuff you SHOULD be able to do on a health insurance app: find doctors, see your ID card, estimate costs of procedures, etc.  However, a full list of procedures and surgeries can be 10's of thousands long, this app only has a several hundred of your most common & 'basic' procedures (and surgeries).  Overall, it's worth downloading just to have in case of emergencies, general info, and the like. 

Thanks, Tim, for making this app one MILLION times better than what it was. Can't wait to see how it continues to improve!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Works fine on my iPhone 7.
text: After receiving a postcard in the mail about the app I decided to look into it. The few reviews in the App Store made me very skeptical.  I only have dental and vision with Anthem, but I was able to log in, see my ID card, front and back, look up dental providers.  I just started coverage with them, so I was checking to make sure my current provider was listed.  It took a minute to realize that u can't just type in a zip code...you have to wait for it to process and then select the complete city, state and zip for it to work correctly.  Other than that, everything seemed to function correctly and timely. I only rated it a 3 because there isn't a lot to see when you select benefits.  Maybe after I have used my benefits and can see my claims I will be able to return and give a higher score.  ğŸ‘�

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Need a "zero stars" option!
text:
This is the most useless app I've ever seen. The only thing that sort of works is the provider search, but even that returns many duplicate results, often with differing and outdated information. The provider profiles are totally useless. Most have nothing more than gender and language spoken. I can figure out on my own whether a provider is male or female and speaks English. 
There is no digital ID card and no information on benefits or claims. My personal profile is currently inaccessible, returning an error message and a plea to be patient. When I tried to leave a review in the section asking what they could do better...I got an error message!
The ask "How can we make the app as healthy as possible?"  My advice? Get a defibrillator; the patient needs to be ALIVE before we even discuss HEALTHY!
I suspect there was some requirement or commitment to have an app available; I guess it forgot to specify that it had to work.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: I love it
text: I actually really enjoyed the app. I was able to easily sign in. The reason why I downloaded the app because I wanted to check  my claim status. So I click claim and then search and boom it pop up with all the info. I did have a question about the claim so I went to contact us. This is the reason why I gave it a four. I click on the call us option and a message came up stating that I can call but it didn't dial. After two attempts I decided to back out and I went to the chat option which was quite simple. There was no wait and I type and he replied immediately and was delightful. Then I used the search option for the doctor and it was simple and it worked fine. I am not having the same issues like everyone else.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Legitimately unhelpful and offensively useless
text: I don't care about the copy paste stuff, I don't care that it takes 30 seconds each time you touch anything.  End of the day I can't view any REAL information. I wanted to see how far I was from my MEDICAL OOP MAX since I'm considering surgery and it's nowhere. I'm in physical PAIN right now and need information about my coverage right NOW and it's NOWHERE TO BE FOUND in this application or on Their mobile website.  At least give me a freaking option to see the desktop version and wait 10 minutes per page load.  Should've gone Coventry or Aetna or anyone who would take the time to not be SO DARN opaque about where my money is going while not giving a CRAP about my health.  How can you expect me to manage my costs and your costs and manage my health and well being when you won't give me the info I need to do that????  This application is Fundamentally broken.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great Improvement
text: Wow! I can never find my health insurance card, but with this app I can show it on my phone anytime!  Even the reverse side with the phone numbers!  At the clinic, I handed the receptionist my phone with my card showing, and she started to write down the info, saying "I wish I could photocopy this!".  So I wondered if instead if I could email the card to her to print.  She gave me back my phone, and it was on the same page: "Text or email card".   Neither of us had ever emailed a card before.   All in all, so much easier than looking for my crumpled health insurance card that's probably out of date anyway!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless
text: The singe most important thing I want to see is how close I am to my deductible. With an HSA this is very important. The app shows none of that information. Besides not showing anything, it is an exact copy of their mobile webpage that you get if you to to anthem's website on your phone. You can't see your deductible there either. Instead they tell you have to request the full website on your phone. Oh but guess what happens then- anthem loads the full website, makes you log in again, and then forces you back to the mobile website. It is an endless loop that makes it impossible to know anything about your insurance if you are on the go. Who ever dreamed up this app should be fired. Last app allowed you to at least see your deductible.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Excellent app
text: I initially installed the app to have easy access to my ID card.  But after exploring around, I found lots of helpful functions.  The urgent care section provides a list of places near your current location, with the distances and phone numbers.  You can do the doctor search to check whether providers are in the network.  The best thing, though, is the health record.  It lists doctor visits, prescriptions, and procedures.  You can drill down to see full detail with dates, doctor names, prescription dosages/frequencies, etc.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Improved UI/Basic Functionality not currently working
text:
Update June 19: it's Monday morning and this app was updated on June 15. Guess what? I get error messages when I try to go to any option other than changing my password and accessing frequently asked questions. This is a serious hindrance that I can't even access my member ID. 

Prior feedback: Maybe it's because it's Sunday evening at 7:56 p.m. I'm not sure why none of the basic functionality like pulling up my member ID card is not working. I also tried the estimate functionality and it too wasn't working. In each instance I received a message that something isn't working and to check back later to see if you've fixed it. Please stop rolling out app updates without thoroughly testing.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless options
text: The app works fine, I can search for a provider etc. but it has these options to narrow your search by 'accepting new patients' and if a family med doc or internist, 'can act as PCP'. These seem incredibly useful but apparently they are useless as when I selected them I came up with zero providers. I had to call BCBS to figure out what was going on and the woman on the phone said "um there are doctors everywhere". Ok...I explained how I searched and she told me don't even bother selecting those, BCBS never collects the information. Then why have them!!! You made me panic and think I had to go states over to find a doctor. 3 stars.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Modern and user friendly design
text: I like the new simplified design.  The tile / menu format is much more helpful and I like that finding a doctor has a map view with click through to driving directions from where I am at. Although I haven't used the support features, I like having the option to schedule a customer service rep to call me.  Keep improving the app and I would love to be able to capture my regular doctor, dentist, etc  as favorites with the ability to call or click online to schedule an appointment.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Frustrating and worthless
text: Very befitting that a health insurance provider should release this garbage. So frustrating and terrible. The fact that they release this garbage while we pay them thousands of dollars is an offense. Fix this app. I can't even access my ID. Seriously the most basic of functions. Can't even make any appointments, check on my claims, anything. Every function shows a service error or a glitch. Fire the person who made this. The fact that that person is getting paid infuriates me. Get your act together, Anthem, fix this garbage. This experience has been so bad our family has decided to switch health insurance providers. What a joke.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Usability Issues
text:
As others have pointed out, the app does not allow pasting passwords which is an odd decision given that most people treat their financial and health data as paramount and have password managers generating long cryptic strings. At minimum I would expect pasting support, at reasonable I would ask for Touch ID support. 

It took a while but I went ahead and typed in my password. I tapped around a few screens before accidentally selecting "Search for Urgent Care". No matter what I tried to select from the app menu from then on it would not navigate away from this screen. 

Please have a user experience / interaction designer audit this app and make recommendations for improvement.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Working Now
text: I find this app really easy to use.  I just tried out all the buttons and everything seems to be working just fine.  I really like the fact that you can choose to email or fax your id card from the app.  I searched claims, benefits and urgent care, and the provider directory and they came up.  I canâ€™t see anything wrong with this app at the moment and it is easier to navigate than their regular website.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Can I give this 0 stars?
text: This app provides such a small amount of help or information at a huge rate of frustration. And you can't rely on their website to be much more helpful. Don't we give you enough money to create a useful customer portal? On top of being a waste of time and a huge test of my patience, I was recommended to a doctor through the find a doctor feature of the app that ended up not being covered. A 3 hour conversation (if I could call it that) to the customer service department resulted in not so much as an apology (let alone a reclaim) about having to pay money I don't have to a doctor that I was led to believe was in network. Boo, Anthem, boo.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Crappy app
text: This app has not worked since I registered and logged in. Asked if I want to use Touch ID to log in and I said yes... CANT use Touch ID to log in. Still have to use the password. Once logged in I CAN NOT access my ID cards. It has been telling me for a week there is an error try later... later comes and the issue is still not fixed. This app needs some major fixes done to it so we can use the app with no problems. Very inconvenient when I have not received me ID cards via mail and I can not access them on the app which is suppose to be the easier more convenient way... ANTHEM FIX YOUR APP!!! YOU HAVE THE MONEY!!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: USELESS APP - NOTHING WORKS IN APP
text: The app gives you two choices MENU or SUPPORT. MENU goes back to the main screen and SUPPORT shows commonly asked questions and nothing is listed. When you first download the app your card will be available to view but you cannot email your card (an invalid email will have an error message, a valid email will do nothing). Any search for medical care will result in a type of response that is similar to an error message. Returning to the app viewing the card is not even an option, so screen snap while you have a chance. I had BCBS of Illinois before and there app was amazing. I'm surprised CA's app is so terrible.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Best Insurance App
text: I just switched from Kaiser to Anthem. This app blows the Kaiser one out of the water. The best feature of the Anthem app is that you can calculate costs on the fly using your insurance plan. I am able to see at a glance how much it's going to cost me to have a baby at specific hospitals. It lists them each with their specific fees. You can see your ID card info, incase you forget to bring it to an appointment.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Please Not More Headaches!!
text: I don't write reviews period but....& there were many negative reviews on this site & they hv all completely disappeared.. where did they go?? Left a health provider last year who had horrible customer service for this .. Had a sales rep at my house 3 weeks ago who swore up & down & gv me his direct # on card which is now disconnected along w his email add...Just called Customer Serv cause I hv no ID card yet w a Drs appoint Jan 2nd..She matches my ID # & all is good...tells me about app & gvs me another phone # which I'm on hold forever & hang up..Needless to say when I sign into app it has no idea who I am ... Hope somehow this gets better..

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Ok
text: If you are only interested in looking for doctors and such things this app is for you but if you are like me and you are just looking to pay your bill, than this app is not for you. It would be helpful and convenient if paying your bill through this app was available and also being able to look at your policy and see what it covers and such but unfortunately, we can't... No matter how many times I've mentioned this to people it's just not happening yet.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worse than useless
text:
Can't view claims so what's the point?  And doesn't even do what it's supposed to do correctly.  

If I want to find a nearby urgent care center that my plan covers, it asks me to enter part of my ID before searching, so it can find providers whom my plan covers.  But, since I've already logged in, it should know exactly who I am already and not need me to re-enter my ID# to search for providers. 

It also does not find all urgent care providers within the designated radius who are covered by the plan.  There could be an urgent care center next door, and it would send me five miles away.  Awful.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great app
text: Very convenient if your like me and lose your card all the time. For those that spouse is using your insurance be sure to go to the main policy holder account and make sure you both create separate accounts then the main user has to allow viewing in profile setting then allow 25 hours to show. Love this app!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great for claim status updates
text:
Gives me easy access to our claims history so I can check status away from my computer. I'm not sure about functionality of the other features. I like the ability to login with my fingerprint, also. 

I wish they could process claims faster!! I'm still waiting for September claims to get processed!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Slow and insecure
text: They went to the trouble of writing a custom text input control just to disable paste into the password field. This makes the app LESS secure since I need to change the password to a shorter one that I can type effectively on a phone keyboard. They also wrote a custom menu control, which takes several seconds to render but accepts input immediately, so half the time I touch the menu icon, it immediately launches into "find urgent care". The app has promise but these bugs make it not worth installing.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pretty decent
text: I just downloaded the app and one of the reasons was so I could quit carrying my insurance card....the less crap I have in my wallet the better. What would make this awesome is if there was a way to take a pic of my prescription card front and back and upload it to the BCBS app. That would allow for all my insurance cards to be on my phone. And if there's not a place to put my blood type that would be awesome but it may be there and I haven't found it yet

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Just needs a little improvement
text: I really like the way it is easier to log in verses the web site and seems to work faster than the web site. Really nice layout. However a couple of things could make it better. I would like to see a way to print the EOB. I'm trying to keep my records in order to know what I owe the doctors and verify I'm being billed correctly. Also would like to see an iPad version of the app so it can be used in landscape mode.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Developer should be fired
text: Another example of a terribly designed app that wouldn't be useful even if it worked. The organization is awful and it doesn't give any details of claims or deductibles. Just amounts. This is like a bank app where you can only check your balance. Also if you like error messages, this app is for you. Select check your prescriptions- error. Select more information on a claim ( if you can find where to even do this) and you get an error. Needs to be scrapped and hire a decent app developer to give this a try. Maybe hire the company that wrote Aetna app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless for finding Doctor
text: Sure this nifty app has my ID card on it, but I was hoping to actually use it to find doctors within my network. I was told by my doctor today to go see an ENT and when I tried to use this App it tells me there are no ENTs (in Los Angeles!). I'm pretty sure there are ENTs in LA. Then I checked for other types of doctors and those searches came back empty too. So I guess I have to look up doctors on my computer, which I hate doing bc every time I use the "back" button it erases the doctor search criteria I've inputted.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Horrible. Useless.
text: This is the first time I've ever been so disappointed in an app that I felt the need to create a review. Most often I cannot log in, but even if I can, the information is entirely in accurate. It currently shows that we have had zero claims and therefore have met none of our deductibles. This is very interesting considering we have already met our out-of-pocket max for the year! The only thing worse than this app is dealing with the people when you have to call anthem which leaves a stuck between a rock and a hard place.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: It never works!
text: It worked maybe 2 times after I first downloaded the app. But every time I've tried to log in since I just get a message bubble that says 'We're here to help!' and shows a customer service number that isn't even an active link- to call the number you have to memorize it and dial it on the keypad yourself. (Highlighting the number to copy does not work). Super frustrating. Why have these issues not been fixed? I see the app has been updated several times but not to function obvs. Deleted it.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Works Fine â€” Needs Apple Wallet Feature
text: I added the app and reviewed my information, ID card and recent claim history.  I was pleased enough.  A big improvement would be to have the capability to add my ID card to Apple Wallet.  I've had BCBS insurance coverage for a while meaning I already had an account and password set up. I used the website login information to sign in to the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Another head-banging pile of awful
text: If you've ever had to deal with Anthem, on the phone or by mail, you know that "customer service" is not really in their lexicon. Don't expect this app to change anything: I would tell you more, but I never got very far, since the app does not allow pasting in a password. Since I use a password manager, all my passwords look like line noise; thus, there's no way I'm going to be able to type it in by hand. And of course they don't support touch ID. These things kind of make it a nonstarter for me so I've deleted it.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: BCBS
text: The app responds well. There are some added features as what is covered and not covered under your plan which should be available. I was at an office the other day and had to pay in full because they could not get through and asked me for my benefits in reference to chiropractor visit and didn't have access. Other than that it is good overall.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Nothing has worked for me
text:
Don't even bother downloading this app it doesn't even work. I've been trying to look for a doctor within network and both u phone, online, and even on the phone weren't helpful. Both the app and the website doesn't show any doctors. I changed the location too and nothing. I call customer service, the lady is sounding rude and says go to the website. I did, then she goes "oh well it's updating so it should work within 2-3 hours". Um. I told her I almost fainted so she sent me a list of doctors but sheesh

It's horrible

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Needs Work
text: Works great to avoid carrying your card. Otherwise not very useful to me.  Two big problems. First, you can only search for providers within 20 miles. I live in a rural area and most will be more than 20 miles from me.  Second, it does not select based on the plan I'm enrolled in.  If I'm lucky enough to find a nearby doc, I'm disappointed to see they are not in my plan.  These functions are fine on the website so I'm not sure why they weren't baked into the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Little more than a directory
text: This is a reasonable care provider directory with the benefit of being able to bring up your insurance card. You can't make payments, review history or do anything else with it related to your account. Might be handy, but Yelp and other directories will give much the same info with commentary instead of just contact info. Account management capability would make this much more useful.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Ehhh
text: The only reason this gets a star is for the fact that it can show a copy of your ID card if you don't have one on you, Everybody has their phone on them! But that's the only thing that actually works on the app. The search for providers is useless and it always says it can't find any results. It doesn't show the info I'm looking for, the summary is not helpful and anytime you go back you have to start all over. Completely pointless download if it isn't for downloading a copy of your ID card.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Best App I Have!
text: I am notorious for losing my ID cards, but yet seem to always find myself at a doctor for either myself or my kids. Using this app, I can pull up my ID cards and either email or fax directly to my doctor's office. I can find doctors, urgent cares, and hospitals around me as well as see my current claims. BCBS won with this one!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: So simple, easy and convenient!
text: Love that I can use Touch ID to access it quickly and it's so convenient to be able to fax or email my card right from the app! It works seamlessly and so quickly that I impress everyone with such easy access to my insurance card and information!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Needs some work
text:
I was excited to try this app for my health insurance. Unfortunately, while I haven't tried all the functionality yet, the things I have tried haven't worked for me. 

First off, the app won't let me paste in my password. It works with all my other apps, but not this one. Secondly, I'm getting an error message when I try to access my member ID card. I'd like to save my member ID card to Passbook, so hopefully that functionality will be added soon.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great app!
text: I love it that I can login using touchID, and that the app interfaces with my HSA acct without requiring a second login!  Couple ideas to make the app even better: Would it be possible to "favorite" the doctors you find in the provider finder, to essentially make it easier to find them again later?  What about PCP selection through the app?  In-app appointment booking?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Does not meet my needs
text: The primary reason I would want to use this app is to check on my claim statuses. The Find a Doctor feature is nice, but I already have my doctors. It's not often I need to try to find a new one. The other primary feature, View My ID Cards, makes no sense to me. Is it that hard to carry an insurance card around in your wallet? Are people really handing their iPhones over for the inevitable copy office staff needs to make of your card? This app is a waste of time until they beef it up with more useful content.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Literally useless.
text:
I gave this a try when it was first released. The "find care" search returned no results regardless of parameters, and it was unable to show my ID card, or do anything else. I figured it was new and buggy and forgot about it. 

Today I received an email from Blue Cross about how to decide between going to the ER or an urgent care center and encouraging customers to use the app (before they need it) to find locations. Sensible advice, and I had time to kill, so I did. 

And it's still completely and utterly useless. Search returns no results no matter what is selected in terms of specialty or location, and it can't even show an ID card. 

It's an embarrassment to the company, and rage-inducing to the customer given how much we pay for insurance that they can't even get a simple location search app right.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Surprisingly useful
text:
The app finds your plan, will show you a copy of your medical card, can find nearby urgent care centers and hospitals that are covered, AND can give you cost estimates for procedures. 

Unfortunately they don't let you transfer your ID card to Passbook (please implement this!!!) and it doesn't share any information with the new help app yet.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Very Buggy!
text:
I am not sure how one can be so sloppy with quality control, because this app crashes or gives me a "technical error" message every time I try to use it. I have never been able to see my ID card and the only function that works on occasion is the provider search.
UPDATE FOR VERSION 4.0
"Sorry, we can't access your data right now. Please try again later." Displaying this error message seems to be the only functionality of this app. If that's all you need, you'll be pleased.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: "Visit our full site from your PC"
text:
I was disappointed to see this message when I went to search for a physician. I am running this app on an iPhone 7 Plus which has more than enough screen real estate to handle Anthem's full site.

For comparison, I opened the full site in the Puffin browser on my phone and was able to use the Anthem full site to use the find a doctor and select a primary care physician functions.

--

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Wow
text:
While no app is perfect, this one saved me big time!
Didn't have my ID card on me and Doctor had to make a copy so the virtual ID cars wouldn't suffice. But wouldn't you know it...I could fax it to them from my phone. Worked perfectly and receptionist thought it was the coolest thing ever. 
Thanks!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Epic fail
text: I work in Mobil App development and this 'app' is the perfect example of what NOT to release. Just getting something out there is not a win. This is not the Internet. In the app world, you need to do some real research and deliver useful functionality. Sending out emails that suggest that you have EOB viewing functionality when you really don't is a death blow to your brand in the  mobil space. Customer app reviews are always read first and people are not interested in apps that fail to deliver on useful functionality.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Nice App - does what I need it to do. Very convenient and easy to navigate. They got this right!
text: Nicely designed. Easy to use. Limited functionality but it allows me to do what I need to do in a mobile environment. For more secure transactions I prefer to work from my desktop at home.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: It works, but it's not pretty and no pasting or touch id
text: Like other users, I use a password manager. My passwords are all long strings of numbers, text, and special characters. In a situation requiring an urgent care facility, logging in to check locations that accept my plan would take up a lot of precious time. Clean up your animations/navigation actions and add support for touch id and copy paste, and I'll give 5 stars.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Listen to customer feedback
text: Disappointed that they seem unwilling or unable to fix the simple problem of viewing the ID card on iOS. Have reported the issue twice. This would be a key benefit so I would not need to carry a physical card. Even better if they made it easy to share with or provide to provider via email and text. Every Dr office wants to see it and I don't want to carry it around with me.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: It's worked great!
text: So far I have enjoyed the app it's easy to use and I've maneuvered it with ease. I primarily use it to view claims, but it has helped me greatly. I would improve the transition from Anthem to express scripts because sometimes it will work and other times it won't.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Not thought out with real life use in mind
text:
As others have pointed out, the first flaw is not being able to paste passwords to login. For those of us using password managers to create and store random, complex passwords, this makes logging in painful.  

Secondly, any iPhone app that includes a membership card of some sort ought to support Passbook. I could lighten up on the password pasting if there was an easy and fast way to get to the ID card, but there isn't. 

Lots of room for improvement.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Limited with flaws
text: As others have already pointed out it doesn't let you view claims. It does let you search for doctors. However it doesn't do this well at all. You enter your search criteria and are given a list of doctors. You select one to see details and then hit the back button and instead of being returned to the list of doctors you have to start your search all over again. Was this tested?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Me
text: The update to the old app was seamless.  I was shocked I didn't have to log in all over again and could simply use my fingerprint.  I liked the old app; love this new one.  Even if all I do is use this for my ID card, then it's a win.  More than that, and I'll be ecstatic!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Much improved mobile app
text: It has come a long way in the past two years! It used to be useless, but now it provides good information. I like the claims (but wish there were more details), ID card, and dashboard features. Love the fingerprint login. Just wish it were faster.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Even easier to use
text: The updated app is easier to see. Big plus. You are able to flip your member card front to back. You have the ability to see a full screen view.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Still Useless App
text: Another update and still useless.  Log in is ok and touch ID works but if all you want is an electronic version of your medical ID card you carry in your wallet then this is the app for you.  Beyond that this app provides nothing of a use regarding your health insurance account.  Somethimes it will show you your claims and sometimes it won't.  But, when it does it does not provide any useful information.  I am not sure why Anthem spent money on an app that does nothing.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Angry Customer
text: It's January 10th, I paid my premium in time, and I still have no ID card. Customer service line says you can use the app to print one. To register and set up an account you need your member ID number...which is printed on your ID card.  Catch 22. It sure keeps costs down if your customers can't use the services and benefits they paid for.  I don't know what will happen to me if I end up in the emergency room.  I hope they take my word for it that I have insurance.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Good App - Areas to Improve
text:
Overall is good. 
The issues:
- Doctor Search is broken (returns no results regardless how you slice search parameters)
- Performance delays on initial app load after logging in.
- Medical record is not there. Not sure if it is there on their full site and not sure the procedure of having those records loaded.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Simple and fast
text: App has already saved me a few calls to customer service by giving me quick access to my info. Look forward to future improvements.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Very useful!
text: This app makes going to the doctor very convenient. It helps me have my insurance card on me at all times and also gives me the option to email it to my doctor. Couldn't ask for anything more!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Nice app layout, however ...
text: There doesn't seem to be an area to make payments with this app. There should at least be a link to the site where one can make online payment ( there is not). Anytime I've called a 'services' number-it takes 30+ minutes vs. Less than 2 minutes , just to make a payment.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Needs a Bill Pay Option
text: So far the app's features have worked fine for me, I just wish there was an option to pay your bill. It's such a hassle to do on the website due to the multiple required logins. An added 'pay my bill' feature would be a nice addition to the apps home screen!!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible
text: I never write reviews, but this app is so unbelievably awful, I am hoping someone at anthem is looking at these and will eventually get a clue.  There is NO WAY to get to the full desktop site on this app.  That is ridiculous.  Especially since there is also NO WAY to see your EOBs on the app.  Total waste of space on my phone.  But even when I try to use safari to get to the regular Anthem site, it puts me into this useless mobile version.  Hate. This. App.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Don't waste your time OHIO!
author_name: Why did I choose this company
text: This app has only worked once. Don't waste your time downloading it and entering your information. I'll just tell you (They care and call the customer service) which of course you have to wait over an hour to speak with someone. The only reason I chose this insurance was because I did not want to lose my primary care physician. Wait a minute didn't Obama say you won't lose your primary care physician. Liar!!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Insurance card glitch makes App useless
text: My goal was to lighten my wallet of as many cards as I possible could.  I installed this app and was immediately disappointed. My Vision benefits card is the only card that shows up. I contacted Anthem several times and also asked for help from my company's benefits coordinator. All I have found out that this is a known problem with some users and it is on their list. It must be a long list as it's been eight months.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Now has payment feature!
text: I've been rating this 2 stars for a long time because it had no payment feature. But now it does. And it was quick, easy to use and worked with no issue. Well done.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless
text:
The interface is functional, well proportioned for finger tapping and the app rarely crashes.

That said, considering it doesn't save your searches or login info is pretty painful.  All it does is help you find a doctor and show you images of your health cards.

That would be fine and good IF the information was even up to date.  I spent HOURS trying to find a pediatrician for my son.  If the numbers we called weren't outright disconnected they rarely reached their intended target.  If we even got to the right hospital we'd get random departments like billing let alone the actual doctor we were looking to reach.

The one thing this app would have been good for it didn't do.  God forbid you try to find a nearby facility for urgent care or any emergency.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Big improvement
text: Although I wouldn't give 5 stars based on the app alone, I feel I have to give it simply due to the improvement over the last version. It's a lot faster. I also love the dashboard.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App hasn't worked in weeks...
text:
It's currently April 15th, 2017 and I've literally been trying to log into this app with correct login info for 10 days-- it won't let me in. It's just keeps showing me an error message saying, "Were here to help. Call us at [insert phone number here]."

Anthem, please stop neglecting your app. People want to be able to use the app rather than having to login online. It would be great if you fixed this.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App love
text: I love this app, especially having my ID card readily available at a glance! You can do a lot with this app without having to use a phone with frustrating automations. Down load now, you won't regret it.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Security lags
text: Here is a company that got hacked and compromised millions of people's private data.  Yet still their signing feature is behind the times.  There is no support for Touch ID, or 1Password integration nor even the ability to paste in a password.  All of these features encourage the use of strong passwords.  Having to manually type in a password encourage the use of weak passwords.  I won't use this app until it supports Touch ID or 1Password integration.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: NEEDS CLAIMS REVIEW
text: So anthem is making it so much easier by sending an email telling me to log in about a new claims summary. They won't tell me anything in the email unless I sign on. Try to so this on a mobile device-impossible. And now this app also doesn't  give the option to view claims. Lame, makes me go home, get on desktop, access Internet, log into anthem and view claims. Please stop making me spend more time than calling cust service and waiting on hold.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Doesn't work
text: They wouldn't print cards for my whole family and said we needed to use the app. If the company is going to force you to download an app in order to have access to your health insurance card, they should probably make sure their app works. I need access to my card now and it just keeps saying an error occurred trying to load it. So I have 0 access to my health insurance. Completely useless app

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Fantastic Update
text: This appears to be a new app entirely, replacing their old. I see some folks having login issues, but for those without that problem, this is a fantastic update!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: So not helpful
text: This has to be the worst app I've used reliability wise. One day I can log in and the next I get that stupid pop up saying "give our customer support a call" and then after they answer my questions they have the nerve to suggest "you can get this same and like information through our interactive app" ....News flash it ain't interactive if it won't let me log in and actually use it!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: ðŸ˜•
text: Since the update I have not been able to access any of my information. The only thing on the home screen is my name and a menu button. When you click the menu button it goes to home (which is the same page) and support, which has nothing on the screen. Please fix soon! I loved it until now, and I might as well not even have it, no help at all.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Much needed app
text: In today's crazy world of medical care, insurance and expenses I need an app to quickly and easily show me all the answers. This app fits the bill. It's the only affordable care I've seen from this administration.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Why so negative? Works as advertised
text: Not sure what all the negative comments are all about...the app works as advertised.  Helpful for me when I went to the doc and didn't have my ID card on me.  Hope more features are added, but good for what it is.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: It's getting better...
text: The latest update makes this app more user friendly. The "view ID card" has NEVER worked, which is a bummer. I would also like to see an option to add more profiles. It's kind of silly I can only see my stuff. I only use this app to find doctors for now.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Can't Pay Your Bill With App
text: Decent app if you need the basic info about your account, medical info or need help finding a doctor (yawn). The biggest issue with this app is you can't pay your bill from the app. Every place I pay a monthly payment to has this included in their app. This should be a standard feature, get with the times Anthem!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Fast, Easy and Convenient
text: This app helps pulling out your insurance card much easier plus the ease of searching for a provider. Definitely recommend!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Still no copy and paste
text:
I still haven't been able to log in because I refuse to manually type in my password which is more that 30 characters long.

When will you see that most of the reviews complain about the app being not useful and how they can not input their secure password due to the app developer purposefully disabling the system-wide feature of pasting into text fields?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: So Far So Not Good
text: As of 2014 my company has switched to Anthem for our insurance needs.  Using my previous insurance companies App on a regular basis, Anthems app is absolutely useless!  Totally Useless!!!  You can not login to your account, can not search doctors, it always say null error or server error.  A complete waste!  If it even did a few things it may be useful.  I just moved to a new community and thought this app would be helpful, how wrong I was...

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Works for me
text: Hey gang, thanks for this.   Good work. I know some of the posters indicate the app does not function properly.  You may need to reset your password.  I did that and the app works great.  Looks good and is a great start to interface with the health plan.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Can't login to app - just remove from store pls
text:
I can login to my account through desktop website, but can't through this mobile app. When I tried, I'm prompted to call their tech support. Tech support has a recorded msg saying they're having issues with the mobile app right now.

Update: still can't log in months later. Just remove this app from the App Store pls. This is ridiculous.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great tracker
text: Quick and easy way to check every aspect of your insurance policy. Shows claims from submitted to sent status updating you in real time and don't have to waste paper or time in mailing the EOB!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: A+ App. Much better than the last, and improving.
text: Love this app! I can view the providers in my area that are participating, view my ID cards, print them, fax them, view my claims, and even my medical history. Love it!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Much improved but still in need of some basic functionality
text: The new update brings a host of new improvements sadly basic functionality like finding doctors by specialty is still not working in my area even though I know I am surrounded by multiple different specialties in Las Vegas.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: About time...
text:
CLAIMS CLAIMS CLAIMS. nice job guys. Only took years. 

A few things that are stopping me from giving this 5 stars (I'm at about 3.5 with this update, from 0 before):

A) need ability to use 4 digit pin to sign on, PITA to keep entering uid and complex password over and over,
B) need ability to copy and paste passwords in the fields, sometimes they are incredibly complex,
C) need ability to project procedure costs based on my plan - similar to your website. 

Do all of this while maintaining some semblance of stability and you have a 5 star app in my book.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Absolutely dismal with zero utility
text: This app allows you to log in, and that's about it. The ID cards, history, and anything you couldn't easily search online is completely non functional. For the thousands of dollars spent on their policy you would think having account access that works would be a high priority. This is a gigantic disappointment. Please contact me and I will write you a better app than this atrocity.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Awful!!!
text: This app is completely useless. This app doesn't deserve one star! You are so limited on the mobile site. If you need to check eligibility, drug cost, claims, basically anything besides "Find a Doctor" you can't. If you try to go to the full site and log in, it takes you back to the mobile site. I'm highly frustrated with Anthem. If I could go with a different insurance carrier, I would in a heartbeat!!!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Add claims or don't give me mobile version!
text: This app doesn't have claims. Plus, if you don't download it and go to the full site it returns you to the the mobile version which doesn't have claims! You press Full site, enter login and password again and it brings you to mobile version again!!! And mobile version doesn't have claims. And on and on it goes until you install the useless app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: "Sorry."
text:
This is the message I get most often when trying to use the app.
"Sorry, can't find any doctors"; "Sorry, can't access your medical benefits right now"; "Sorry, please call Customer service" etc. 

The reason I downloaded the app is to cut the middle man, and do it myself...Why bother having an application that fails to work 75% of the time?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Horrible App
text: This app. does not work at all. Get ready to spend hours on the phone with technical support in India. I've been waiting an hour to 3 hours on hold each time. I've been doing this everyday for last 2 weeks every single day. BCBS get it together. Should have never released this app. until it worked. Everyone save yourself the trouble and find a different insurance company .

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Fantastic App!!!!
text: I love the new look and design with the recent update. Simple to use, easy to navigate, yet very informative. Does everything I need it to do in a app by keeping me informed on my coverage and plan.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Error when logging in
text:
After seeing the poor reviews, I downloaded this app only because I found it to be convenient to have my ID Cards available. Unfortunately, it says "we are having technical issues, try again later". According to the other reviews it has been like this for months. 

Anthem - if you aren't going to fix it, why bother having an app?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Very Buggy
text:
Precious app versions were very stable and user friendly app. Since major app redesign/update the app is unstable and buggy at best--

When I attempt to view additional details on claims, gives an error message asking me to call customer service. I don't want to call customer service for additional details, that is one of the main reasons I originally downloaded the app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Awful - just like Health Insurance
text: I'm not sure why I was expecting a health insurance app to actually be useful or helpful considering health insurance as a whole is a cluster. I downloaded the app to see if a doctor was in network. I searched with the broadest settings and it said no doctors were available near me... Including one that I've seen before who is in network... Great job Anthem! Bad products are apparently your company's modus operandi.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Better than it was two years ago
text: You can paste the password in and it supports Touch ID. The app is a constant stream of errors but repeating the same thing over and over usually, eventually gets the info the app is looking for.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: So far so good
text: I've been able to access everything that I need so far. Much easier than calling customer service.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Legit ID & Password from Website doesn't Work Here
text: I have Medicare/Anthem and my ID and Password works great on their official website, but doesn't work on their Apple App. I was at my Doctors Office and my Doctor needed some information immediately about my Health Insurance, so I downloaded this app and it won't accept my Login Information. I rate this app no stars, but had to enter one star for JUNK! Deleted immediately, DO NOT RECOMMEND!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: This is the website Disguised as an app
text:
They didn't change anything about it when they put it in app form.  They annoying web survey stuff still pops up and even buttons that link out to other pages still do that.

I don't get the point.  I can just use this in safari or chrome and at least it would run faster.

Don't bother

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: "Service not available, please try again later".
text: I am not a fan of the regular website, very confusing and difficult to navigate. In the last week I have yet to view a single EOB, either on the regular website or via the mobile app. Isn't that one of yet main purposes of the site?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Seems fine
text: Has ID card on there. A neat feature. Not really sure what all the negatives were. No it doesn't have claims. It does not claim to. Simple app. Definitely has some features to work on, but it's a start.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worst App ever
text: Why do you even have an app? This is the worst app i have ever used. I cannot log in at all. It always says to call the customer service number. What's the point of having an app if it doesn't work? Every time i call support they say "we are working on it." I been hearing this for weeks. Theres multiple bad reviews on here. Is anyone even looking at it?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Super slow
text:
When tapping on things it takes a few seconds to react. And I have an iPhone 6. 

When clicking back in Doctor search, it forgets state and resets some of the fields but remembers others. But usually it just has a delay reaction so you keep pressing back, it doesn't respond. But when it finally does it goes back way further then you wanted.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Easy to use, like having the website at your fingertips
text: Great tool. Easy to pull up your ID card, search for doctors, etc.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible App
text: This app rarely works properly. Usually it won't even open, just gives an error message with a number to call. It never even updates with new bills. It always says "$0 is due, payment has been paid in full" even when I haven't yet paid for the month, etc. etc. The list goes on and on. It's terrible.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pretty good
text: I love the fingerprint ID, easy access to my insurance card & the search functions. Some of the information is less detailed than I would like but I'm still pretty impressed with this app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: The App Needs Emergency Surgery  - Use the Website
text: Even with the most recent update this app is still a complete POS. It takes forever just to process your sign in and then when you finally do get into the site it is very limited in its functionality. In contrast if I go to their website I can sign in with no delay and get much more claims information easily

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Awesome App, so convenient!!
text: LOVE this app!  I never know where my insurance card is ğŸ˜• and now I never have to know ğŸ˜�. I email/fax my car to the doctor right when I check in

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Touch ID means SECURITY!
text: That's what I call getting serious about security, addition of Touch ID is great! Love all the enhancements to the app, small things like full screen ID card, keep it up!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Good quick info
text: I like that I can see claims and that there is a mobile version of my ID card with this app. The claims don't have detailed explanations, but good if you just want to check the claim status and amounts.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Thankful
text: Love having the ability to have this within hands reach. It helps me understand what costs I might have

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Overall very good
text: This version seems to work really well. I specially like being able to fax my ID card to a provider.  This helps to make pre-registration really fast. Overall it's a very good app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Excellent app
text: Easy to use and awesome to have my card and account details available on my mobile device.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: So convenient!!!!!
text: I love the convenience of the app! Only concern is that some information is only visible on the full site. But I love having access to the Touch ID feature!!!!ğŸ‘�ğŸ‘�ğŸ‘�ğŸ‘�ğŸ‘�

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Works fine
text: My ID card works fine, not sure why all the complaints.  Seems like a basic good app and met what I expected.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great idea - not quite there yet!
text: I like the app; however, I can't access my ID card.  When I forgot my password, a blank box with "ok" as the only choice came up and would not let me past stage 2 of resetting the password, even though I entered correct answers to the security question.  Disappointing...please fix issue with ID cards - running iOS 7.1 on iPhone 4.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useful
text: This app. has helped me with: questions I had and finding medical professionals within my area, also their ratings.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: App doesn't work is poorly designed
text: The app barely works to provide any information whatsoever. Useful details appear to be accessible but links don't work. Is this an example of how a private business provides such superior service?  I would quickly take my business elsewhere but I'm locked into this loser for another year.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: I Like It!
text: The info I needed was right at my finger tips. Easy to navigate and understand. Not sure why so many would dislike it. I think it's great!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Promising
text:
Access to records and medical documents in an app is innovative and theoretically efficient; however, requests to preview medical records and claims are continuously met with an error message.

I would love to access these elements of the app, but will lose interest quickly if it simply remains a hassle.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Very decent
text: It allows you to do all what website can, but it is less cluttered, more useful and easier to use.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Much Improved
text: I love the Touch ID and having a card at my fingertips. Also the ability to call member services if I ever need to.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: TERRIBLE!!!
text: I can't even say how bad the app is when you get signed in, because it keeps crashing after I sign in. I can only assume by all the other reviews that it's garbage even if you can get signed in. Must be linked to their online site. I was on the site today to register, and of course it kept kicking me out there too. Don't waste your time with this app!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great at taking up space on my phone!
text: This app never updates deductibles or claims compared to online and I can't access my insurance card without receiving an error message. I wonder if not having an app would be a better choice. Although Anthem is an insurance company and they probably can't afford to create a competent app for their customers.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Crap!
text: It doesn't work and doesn't give an idea what's wrong. I tried to login and it says: call our help line! Seriously??? I'm a new user and I have to call you to make your app work? I'm not sure if the smart person, who created this app knows, how long it takes to make a call to it  insurance company but in January. Absolutely no respect to customers! Bad!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: zero stars
text: This is THE WORST app. No information is provided. If you try to look at your claims you get an error message that says they are working to fix a problem. It's almost impossible to look for providers because the location button doesn't work. I don't see the point of creating an app that does nothing helpful.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Easy to use
text: Touch ID works perfectly. Quick and easy way to get information.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Buggiest App I've Ever Encountered
text:
I can only imagine the pressure the development team was under to push something out the door for some arbitrary deadline. #deathmarch.  But I have never encountered something as buggy as this.  I am hopeful with deep pockets that at some point this will be usable.  But at this point...meh. 

Too many bugs to try to document here.  Sorry.  I know, not very helpful.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Finally!
text: Great app. Needs password protection and a couple more enhancements. 3D tech inclusion could he huge in this if applied properly. But very good app overall.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Electronic insurance card is awesome
text: It is great to have an electronic copy of my insurance card in the app. This feature has made my life much more convenient. Thank you.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Not useful
text: I can not use this app for anything that I want. I can't check to see what's covered under my insurance or send and read messages that I have sent on the web. I wanted to be able to quickly find out what was covered on my plan but I can't do that with being on the computer. No reason to download the app. Annoying!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worst app
text: This is probably the worst app in the store, doesn't do anything it says it will do! And when you call the help line, they are about as useless as the app and web login. Hope this doesn't represent how well they work for the people that they insure. Because they sure don't put any effort into helping anyone with the app and website

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: New User
text: I'm new to this app but so far, I like it. Having all my information right on my cell works very well for my organizational style.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: User Friendly
text: This is a very user friendly app. I like the ability to quickly access my Anthem card, benefits & claims. Kudos!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Easy to use
text: I like having the information at my finger tips. I can see progress of my claims, refill my Rx, see progress on my out of pocket expense.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Awful
text:
I have 3 BCBS plans through my employer, but there's no way to add all 3 plans. It only takes the first one, and there's NO support actually available. It's extremely frustrating.

Only reason I gave it 2 stars is because it's fast & it was easy to set up the one plan I was able to load.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Update removed access to needed info
text: Before this last update I could access EOBs, view the coverage that was current and in the past, long history of claims and status. This update has nothing useful data wise and became a bunch of graphical spinning icons to just stare at until the popup says anything failed to load.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Like app but has some flaws
text: I like it as it is convenient to have when looking up your Ins. Info. However, I can't get it to work today to upload my new cards and their info. Please fix this bug.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Informative & user friendly
text: Love this app! Never understood insurance until this app! Breaks everything down & logs you in quick!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible App
text: I would expect a company with as much resources as anthem to be able to put together a smoother running app. For logging in, please provide a TouchID option for the password because it is a real pain having to type in all your login info every time you want to show your virtual insurance card (the main reason I wanted the app)

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Terrible
text: Couldn't even get it to register me.  Spent 30 mins on the phone and delayed my appointment 30 mins trying to get a virtual copy of insurance card.  It kept telling me there is something wrong. Called help desk and they couldn't tell me why it was doing it but would report it.  Think anthem may need to try again with this app!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Solid, Covers the Basics
text:
I'm not a heavy user, but getting Messages, ID Card (can be emailed or faxed out), Find Doctor, Cost Estimator, change password, etc. is good enough for me. 

Seems to be easy and intuitive.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Pretty Genius Design - Team Should Feel Proud
text: Clearly some very good thought went into making navigation of healthcare simple.  Engaging, interactive and fun.  Nice job.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Classic
text: The new design of this application is outstanding. The updated color pallet and simplicity allows for easy navigation. Well done Anthem!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: They should be embarrassed
text:
Shouldn't one of the QC steps be, "Can the user log in?"
If that test doesn't pass don't commit to production. The entire system is janky. I couldn't register on the website, had to do that on this app but then I can't log in through the app, I have to go to the website to manage my account. What an embarrassment.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Shouldn't have to login for ID card
text: Great app when logged in. Should have the option to get basic info like ID card without logging into full app (see Geico).  Makes it cumbersome at the counter while in the doctors office.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Very Buggy
text:
This app is very buggy. It is essentially a clone of their mobile browser site.

The primary reason I wanted this app was a way to digitally card my ID card. However, the app is broken. I can't view my ID card at all.

Like others have said, it's annoying to not be able to use Touch ID nor paste in a password.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Where did the ID card go?
text: Please, please bring back the no log-in ID card! Just spent 15 minutes at the doctor trying to log-in (low signal) to get it! And the page that has the card information is incomplete for the ID. Print is so small on the card itself nearly impossible to read.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worst app ever!
text: Ok so this is a major issue, this app doesn't even work. You can't even log in, there is always a message that says we are having technical issues and it's been like this forever, it never worked and I have tried for over a year now. Do yourselves a favor and delete this app from the apple store. 100% piece of sh**.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Frustrating & waste of time!
text:
Information is not up to date. This app is a waste of time unless you prefer to use a mobile version of your Anthem Insurance card.
The main site is needed to accomplish tasks or obtain current/valuable  information.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: I wish they had included a payment option.
text: I have my policy through the ACA and the most annoying part is the monthly payments.  The online option is awkward.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: The worst app ever
text:
The worst app I've ever used.  I need proof insurance on the road.  Can't login to Anthem with app, app crashes, app is worthless.  

This app is worse than the Cox cable app, worse than the ING app and worse than the Squaretrade app.  I'm a developer and would be ashamed to work for Anthem.  It's not like they can't afford to write a decent app or build a reliable web page.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: like it!!
text: I like being able to search the database of providers on the go.  The search works fast and accurately.  There is no claim info... But the app description does not promise that.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Kind of works?
text: As far as operating as an app, it opens and has some buttons that you can push. Other than that, no information is useful. It cannot tell me costs, doctors in my area, or what is covered. You might as well write a letter to Santa asking any of these questions, you have better odds at getting a response.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Garbage
text: This app doesn't hardly work at all.  It takes forever to log in and you might as well forget reading your messages or moving around within the app, because nothing will open.  I've used this app on wifi and my phone data and neither have been successful.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Convenient
text: Very handy that you can access claims and your ID card right on your phone.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great app when sick
text: I landed in a different city and got really sick. Used it to find a local doctor and a pharmacy meds.  Thank you guys for providing this app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Love it!
text: I love that I can access my ID cards on the app in case I forget them at home. Easy to use all and really convenient.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Love it!
text: Could not ask for more current, fast and simple information at my fingertips! Great job, Anthem!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: It Never Works
text: I've tried to use it several times when I didn't have access to the full site. Simple things like prescription benefits and view ID card. Error messages every time. Love my insurance but use some of our premium dollars to improve the functionality of this app or scrap it all together Anthem.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Awful app
text: This app is worthless. There is no benefit to using it due to its lack of features and it's impossible to navigate. The password system is ridiculous. The only useful thing is being able to see your card (kind of) and it's not even passbook comparable. Don't waste time downloading it.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Should have known better
text: I work for WellPoint and every computer program whether it be payroll, consumer website, or internal programs, stink. Links don't work, the password system is ridiculous, and it's hard to find the information you are looking for. This app is par for the course and it's getting deleted now.  :)

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Get the job done
text: Wanted to find a local doctor and have a digital card. Done and done.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Not there yet
text: Read the other reviews, but downloaded the app hoping my experience would be different. It's not. Every time I try to review a claim, it says, "Something's not working." Pretty much useless. Very limited info available beyond deductible, and out of pocket expenses.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Easy and Convenient
text: I've used it a couple of times and never had a problem.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great
text: Im glad I have this app. I can see my benefits and my claims with a push of a button, its convenient and very easy to use.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Useless App
text: This app is exactly the same as the mobile site. The Information I want, is to be able to log into the site and see claims and deductibles. This app only allows to view cards, which I already have, and look up doctors. Needs more features added before it even comes close to the Aetna app.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Good concept. Horrible to use
text: Logging in is not reliable. At best, its slow but works. At worst, it's slow and doesn't work after wasting your time. At the end of the day, if you can't get in then I don't care how well the app is designed or what it can do.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Slow and limited
text: I don't expect much from an insurance app, but I don't expect the app to take 30 seconds or more to log in (sometimes a minute). I also would like more plan details and information and other resources.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Issues w/multiple policies
text: I have both medical and vision insurance.  On my computer, after logging in, I am prompted to chose medical or vision.  The app on the other hand just defaults to vision and there is no way to switch to medical. I called support and they did not seem to think this was an issue and said to just use the desktop.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: On-line ID Cards
text: That's one small step for a member, one giant leap for membership-kind. Hope the next leap is for Anthem to provide a way to keep the card on my desktop...

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Doesn't work
text:
I downloaded this two days ago and have tried logging in at least 8 times at different times of the day. Hasn't worked once. "Technical issues." 

And it doesn't look like you can get EOBs on here anyway, which makes it pretty useless even if it were working.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: COMPLETLY USELESS
text: Could not register. Had to call the help desk. They got me registered, provided a temp password that promptly didn't work. Three days later, total three hours on the phone with the help desk and I still cannot get past the login screen. Guess they are not making enough money to provide a functional app? ðŸ˜³ðŸ˜¡

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Don't Bother
text: If I can log in (which only happens randomly), the links don't work. Just go to the main site through your browser.  The app has no value when you can't look anything up on it. Would give it 0 stars if I could, but the review feature won't let me.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: And you thought their web site is slow
text: Horribly long waits for everything - login, each page. But then either incorrect information at every step of the way or pop up dialogues that say "problem, try again".

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Perfect
text: The app has just enough information for general questions and doesn't put you PHI in great risk!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great App.
text: Very easy to access claim details and view other plan Information. I feel that the app will only get better with time!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Finally 2015 has arrived to healthcare
text:
Nice app.  Works well

Ahead of the HC industry.  Most providers still getting comfortable with electronic Id but this work well.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Excellent Interface but wish for Passbook for ID cards
text: Great way to find a provider, modern interface, but would like to see passbook integration for easy access to Anthem ID cards.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Log in issues
text: Can't log in using the exact same user name and password that works online and is supposed to work in the app. I called the help number and after an hour the recommended solution was to use the web browser. Why make an app?

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Wallet is slimmer
text: good app. let me take another item out of my wallet. a little slow to load each page but not bad so far

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Great communication
text: Great having an app to keep up with insurance without having to go to computer.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Info at fingertips
text: Provides the access and information about benefits and claims instantly and right at your fingertips. It is a useful tool.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Disappointed
text: Can't get swipe buttons to work which makes it extremely difficult to filter claims.  Also, information loads slowly. I'll stick to using the website.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Worthless
text: The app will not let me update my password, so I can't log in. It directs me to the customer service line, which I called, and they took me through the password update but it only works for the website. It doesn't work for the app. So the app is 100% useless. Get it together Anthem!

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Super Handy
text: I'm loving this app so far. It's great having all the info I need without having to call a support line.

name: Anthem Anywhere
title: Location aware severely limits app
text: Want to find that urgent care facility nearby, great, the app will direct you to the nearest facility. Want find an urgent care facility for a family member injured on a trip out of the area, useless, because the app can only be used to find a nearby facility. You cannot enter an alternative location to search.

name: Capital BlueCross Virtual Care
title: Fast, friendly and easy!!
text: I used the app right before work and took a total of ten minutes from the time I open the app and the time my session was done. The doctor was very friendly and knowledgeable! I highly recommend using this app!

name: Capital BlueCross Virtual Care
title: Awesome!!
text: Saved me from hours waiting in urgent care to be seen. Able to see a provider in live by room and pick up my prescription within the hour.

name: Capital BlueCross Virtual Care
title: Horrible
text: All I need was a prescription my pharmacy never received my prescription the customer support was as clueless as my myself! Horrible Experience! This app is totally pointless if a minor prescription can’t  be faxed or called in correctly! The doctor just abruptly ended the video chat! Horrible App!!!
